src: "بوقت سابق، لاحظ جيمي سيمينوف، الرئيس التنفيذي لشركة رينغ، إنو الشركة بلشت لما ما كان جرس بابو مسموع من محلو بكاراج بيتو. قال إنه عمل جرس باب واي فاي. قال سيمينوف إنو المبيعات زادت بعد مشاركتو سنة 2013 بحلقة ""شارك تانك"" لما رفضت لجنة البرنامج تمويل الشركة الناشئة. بأواخر سنة 2017، ظهر سيمينوف على قناة التسوق التلفزيونية QVC. عملت رينغ تسوية لدعوى قضائية كمان مع شركة الأمن المنافسة آي دي تي."
mt: "Earlier, Jimmy Siminoff, Ring's CEO, noticed that the company had been ringing what sounded like a doorbell from a home in Carag Baito. He made a doorbell Wi-Fi. Siminoff said that sales increased after participating in the 2013 "Share Tank" program, which rejected the startup company's funding. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also settled a lawsuit with the security company's rival IDT."
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "حصل برنامج خدمة البث العام ('PBS 'Public Broadcasting Service) على أكتر من عشرين جايزة من جوايز ايمي، وكان أقل بشوي من الفلمين Sesame Street و Mister Rogers 'Neighborhood. كل حلقة من حلقات العرض رح تركز على موضوع بكتاب معين ومن بعدها استكشاف هيدا الموضوع من خلال عدة قصص. كل عرض رح يقدم كمان توصيات بخصوص الكتب يلّي لازم الأطفال يفتشوا عنها بس يروحوا على مكتبتهم. قال جون غرانت من دبليو أن إي دي بوفالو (محطة ريدنغ راينبو الرئيسية): ""علّمت ريدنغ راينبو الولاد ليش لازم يقرو وحب المطالعة وشجع [البرنامج] الولاد على أخذ كتاب وقرايتو."" بعض الناس بيعتقدوا، من ضمنهم جون غرانت، أن أزمة التمويل والتحول بفلسفة البرامج التلفزيونية التعليمية ساهمت بإنهاء المسلسل."
mt: "PBS won more than twenty Emmys, and was less than the films Sesame Street and Mister Rogers 'Neighborhood. Each episode will focus on a particular book and then explore this topic through several stories. Each show will also provide recommendations about books that children should search for but go to their library. John Grant of WGRZ Buffalo (the main Reading Rainbow station) said, ""Reading Rainbow taught children to read and love reading and encouraged [the program] children to take a book and read it."" Some people believed, including John Grant, that the financial crisis and the transition in philosophy of educational television programs contributed to the end of the series."
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: صرح المسؤولين عن مدينة أمستردام ومتحف آن فرانك إنو الشجرة مصابة بفطريات وبتشكل خطر على الصحة العامة وقالوا إنا كانت بخطر وشيك على السقوط. وكان من المقرر قطعها يوم التلاتا، بس تم تإجيلها لبعد حكم محكمة الطوارئ.
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank House said the tree was infected with fungi and posed a threat to public health and said it was imminent danger of falling. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was postponed for a ruling by the emergency court.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: تطالب منظمة تحرير الحيوانات والجمعية الملكية لمنع القسوة على الحيوانات (RSPCA) مرة تانية بالتثبيت الإلزامي لكاميرات المراقبة بكل المسالخ الأسترالية. صرح كبير مفتشي الجمعية الملكية لمنع القسوة على الحيوانات بنيو ساوث ويلز، ديفيد أوشانيسي لآي بي سي إنو المراقبة والتفتيش على المسالخ لازم يكون مألوف بأستراليا. من المؤكد أنّو الدوائر التلفزيونية المسكرة رح تبعت إشارة قوية للأشخاص يلّي بيتعاطوا مع شؤون الحيوانات إنّو رفاهيتن الها أولوية قصوى.
mt: The RSPCA and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for mandatory CCTV in all Australian abattoirs. NSW RSPCA chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspection of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. It is certain that the television networks will send a strong signal to people who take animal welfare seriously that it is a top priority.
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: انتشرت الأخبار بمجتمع ريد لايك اليوم، خلال تشييع جنازات جيف وايز وتلاتة من الضحايا التسعة، عن اعتقال تلميذ تاني بالحادث المتعلق بإطلاق النار بالمدرسة بـ 21 آذار. قالت السلطات رسمياً القليل بالإضافة لتأكيد اعتقال اليوم. ومع هيدا، قال مصدر مطلع على التحقيق لصحيفة مينيابوليس ستار تريبيون إن لويس جوردان، البالغ من العمر 16 سنية، ابن رئيس ريد ليك القبلي فلويد جوردان. ومش معروف بالوقت الحالي شو هي التهم يلّي رح يتم توجيهها أو شو يلّي وصل السلطات للصبي، بس بلّس إجراءات الأحداث القانونية بالمحكمة الفيدرالية.
mt: 21 March 2013: News spread in the Red Lake community today, during the funerals of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, of the arrest of a second student involved in the shooting at the school. Authorities officially said little in addition to confirming the arrest today. However, a source close to the investigation told the Minneapolis Star Tribune that Louis Jordan, age 16, is the son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is currently unknown what charges will be filed or what led authorities to the boy, but legal proceedings in the federal court were sealed.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: انتشرت الأخبار بمجتمع ريد لايك اليوم، خلال تشييع جنازات جيف وايز وتلاتة من الضحايا التسعة، عن اعتقال تلميذ تاني بالحادث المتعلق بإطلاق النار بالمدرسة بـ 21 آذار. قالت السلطات رسمياً القليل بالإضافة لتأكيد اعتقال اليوم. ومع هيدا، قال مصدر مطلع على التحقيق لصحيفة مينيابوليس ستار تريبيون إن لويس جوردان، البالغ من العمر 16 سنية، ابن رئيس ريد ليك القبلي فلويد جوردان. ومش معروف بالوقت الحالي شو هي التهم يلّي رح يتم توجيهها أو شو يلّي وصل السلطات للصبي، بس بلّس إجراءات الأحداث القانونية بالمحكمة الفيدرالية.
mt: 21 March 2013: News spread in the Red Lake community today, during the funerals of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, of the arrest of a second student involved in the shooting at the school. Authorities officially said little in addition to confirming the arrest today. However, a source close to the investigation told the Minneapolis Star Tribune that Louis Jordan, age 16, is the son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is currently unknown what charges will be filed or what led authorities to the boy, but legal proceedings in the federal court were sealed.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: قال منظمي الاحتجاج إنو حوالي 100 ألف شخص حضروا بمدن ألمانية متل برلين وكولونيا وهامبورغ وهانوفر. ببرلين ، قدرت الشرطة 6500 متظاهر. اندلعت الاحتجاجات كمان بباريس وصوفيا ببلغاريا وفيلنيوس بليتوانيا وفاليتا بمالطا وتالين بإستونيا وإدنبرة وغلاسكو باسكتلندا. بلندن، احتج 200 شخص تقريباً برّات مكاتب بعض أصحاب حقوق النشر الرئيسيين. صار في احتجاجات كبيرة ببولندا الشهر الماضي لما وقّعت الدولة على اتفاقية مكافحة التزوير التجارية، الشي اللي أدى لاتخاذ الحكومة البولندية قرار بعدم التصديق على الاتفاقية حالياً. أخّرت لاتفيا وسلوفاكيا عملية الانضمام لاتفاقية مكافحة التزوير التجارية.
mt: 100,000 people were reported to have attended in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests also occurred in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Valletta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia, Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside the offices of some of the main copyright owners. Large protests occurred in Poland last month after the country signed the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, which led the Polish government to decide not to ratify the agreement at this time. Latvia and Slovakia have postponed joining the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "تم التبليغ عن 60 حالة تقريباً من حالات السخونة الزايدة بأجهزة iPod المعطلة، يلّي سببت ستة حرايق إجمالاً وأصابت أربعة أشخاص بحروق خفيفة. صرحت وزارة الاقتصاد والتجارة والصناعة اليابانية إنا كانت على علم بـ 27 حادثة متعلقة بالأجهزة. أعلنت وزارة الاقتصاد والتجارة والصناعة اليابانية الأسبوع الماضي إنو آبل بلغّتها بـ 34 حادثة ارتفاع حرارة إضافية، واللي وصفتها الشركة بإنا ""غير خطيرة."" وردّت الوزارة بدعوة تأجيل أبل للتقرير بأنه ""مؤسف كتير."""
mt: 60 cases of overheating iPods have been reported, causing six fires in total and burning four people lightly. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, Apple reported an additional 34 overheating incidents to the ministry, which the company described as "not serious." The ministry responded by asking Apple to report that it was "very regrettable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "كشف ستيف جوبز، الرئيس التنفيذي لشركة آبل ، عن الجهاز بس طلع عالمسرح وطلَّع iPhone من جيب الجينز تبعه. خلال خطابه يلّي دام لساعتين، صرح بأن ""اليوم رح تعيد Apple اختراع التلفون، رح نصنع التاريخ اليوم""."
mt: "Steve Jobs, Apple's CEO, unveiled the device on stage and pulled an iPhone from his jeans pocket. During his two-hour speech, he said ""Today Apple will reinvent the phone, we will make history today."""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: أعلنت عضو مجلس الشيوخ الحالي والسيدة الأولى الأرجنتينية كريستينا فرنانديز دي كيرشنر ترشحها للرئاسة مسا امبارح بمدينة لا بلاتا، على بعد 50 كيلومتر (31 ميل) من بوينس آيرس. أعلنت السيدة كيرشنر نيتها للترشح للرئاسة بالمسرح الأرجنتيني، وهو نفس المطرح اللي بلشت فيه حملتها الانتخابية سنة 2005 لمجلس الشيوخ كعضو بوفد مقاطعة بوينس آيرس.
mt: Current Argentine Senator and former First Lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidency this morning in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.  Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for the presidency on the Argentine stage, the same stage where she launched her 2005 Senate campaign as a representative of the Buenos Aires Province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: لاقت هيئة الاتصالات والاعلام الاسترالية (ACMA) كمان إنّو على الرغم من بث الفيديو على الانترنت، ما انتهك موقع بيغ براذر (Big Brother) قوانين الرقابة على المحتوى لإنو ما تم تخزين الوسائط على موقع الويب تبع بالــ Big Brother بنص قانون خدمات البث على تنظيم محتوى الانترنت، بشرط إنّو يكون فعلياً على الخادم.
mt: The Australian Communications and Media Authority (ACMA) also found that, despite the video being posted online, the Big Brother site breached the content regulation rules because it stored the media on the website under the Internet Content Service Provider Code of Conduct, provided it was actually on the server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "بيتر كوستيلو، أمين الخزانة الأسترالي والرجل اللي رح يخلف رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد على الرجح كزعيم للحزب الليبرالي، عبّر عن دعمو لصناعة الطاقة النووية بأستراليا. قال السيد كوستيلو إنو لما يصير توليد الطاقة النووية مجدي اقتصاديًا، لازم أستراليا تكفي استعمالها. قال السيد كوستيلو: ""إذا صارت تجارية، لازم نحصل عليها، ما في اعتراض من حيث المبدأ على الطاقة النووية."""
mt: "Peter Costello, the Australian Treasurer and the man who will succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, expressed support for nuclear power production in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power production becomes economically viable, Australia should be able to use it. Mr Costello said: "If it becomes commercially viable, we should get it, there is no principled objection to nuclear power.""
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: مع توفر 18 ميدالية بس باليوم ، لا إنو عدد من البلدان فشلوا بالوصول لمنصة التتويج. ومن بين هيدي الفرق هولندا، احتلت آنا يوكيمسن المركز التاسع بجدول السيدات بالسوبر جي، وفنلندا احتلت كاتيا سارينن المركز العاشر. احتل ميتشل جورلي الاسترالي المركز الاحدعش ببطولة سوبر-جي للرجال. واحتل المنافس التشيكي اولدريك جيلينيك المركز الستعش ببطولة سوبر-جي للرجال. احتل المكسيكي ارلي فالسكيز المركز الخمستعش ببطولة سوبر-جي للرجال. احتل النيوزيلندي ادام هال المركز التاسع ببطولة سوبر-جي للرجال. فاز المتزلج البولندي ماسيج كريزل عن فئة الرجال الضعاف النظر والمرشدة آنا أوغارزينسكا بالمركز الـ13 بسباق سوبر جي. فاز جونغ سورك بارك الكوري الجنوبي بالمركز الـ24 ببطولة سوبر جي المخصصة للرجال.
mt: 18 medals were awarded today, with several countries failing to reach the podium. Among them, the Netherlands, Anna van Vleuten finished ninth in the women's super G, and Finland, Katja Seppälä finished tenth. Mitchell Gorley of Australia finished 15th in the men's super G. Oldrich Jirasek of the Czech Republic finished 16th in the men's super G. Arli Valerio of Mexico finished 19th in the men's super G. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished 20th in the men's super G. Polish skier Maciej Kot won the men's visually impaired category and guide Anna Ogrodzka finished 13th in the super G. South Korean skier Jung Seok Park finished 24th in the men's super G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "وعُقدت المحاكمة بمحكمة برمنغهام كراون واختتمت بـ3 آب. نفى المذيع، يلّي تم اعتقاله بمكان الحادث، الهجوم وزعم أنه اشتعمل العصا لحماية نفسه من الزجاجات يلّي عم بتم رميها عليه من قبل ما يوصل لتلاتين شخص. كمان بليك متهم بمحاولة إفساد مسار العدالة. قام القاضي باخبار بليك أن الأمر ""ما في منّو مفر"" إنّو رح يحبسو."
mt: "The trial was held at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on 31 July. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the stick to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by thirty people. Black is also accused of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Black that the matter was ""not in dispute"" that he would be punished."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: "وعُقدت المحاكمة بمحكمة برمنغهام كراون واختتمت بـ3 آب. نفى المذيع، يلّي تم اعتقاله بمكان الحادث، الهجوم وزعم أنه اشتعمل العصا لحماية نفسه من الزجاجات يلّي عم بتم رميها عليه من قبل ما يوصل لتلاتين شخص. كمان بليك متهم بمحاولة إفساد مسار العدالة. قام القاضي باخبار بليك أن الأمر ""ما في منّو مفر"" إنّو رح يحبسو."
mt: "The trial was held at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on 31 July. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the stick to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by thirty people. Black is also accused of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Black that the matter was ""not in dispute"" that he would be punished."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: وبتشمل الموضوعات التانية المدرجة على جدول أعمال بالي إنقاذ الغابات الباقية بالعالم، وتبادل التقنيات لمساعدة الدول النامية على النمو بطرق أقل تلويثًا. وبتأمل الأمم المتحدة بحطّ اللمسات الأخيرة على صندوق لمساعدة البلدان المتضررة من الاحتباس الحراري حتى يقدروا يتعاملوا مع الآثار السلبية. من الممكن إنّو هيدي المصاري تموّل البيوت المقاومة للفيضانات ولإدارة أفضل للمي ولتنويع المحاصيل.
mt: Other topics on the agenda include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing countries grow in less polluting ways. The United Nations is finalizing a fund to help climate-vulnerable countries cope with negative effects. It is possible that the money will be used to build flood-resistant homes, better manage water and diversify crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "أعلنت نيجيريا بوقت سابق إنا عم تخطط للانضمام لمنطقة التجارة الحرة القارية الأفريقية بالأسبوع اللي بيسبق القمة. أعلن مفوض التجارة والصناعة بالاتحاد الأفريقي ألبرت موشانجا أن بنين رح تنضم. قال المفوض: ""بعد ما اتفقنا على قواعد المنشأ وأساسيات التعريفة الجمركية ، بس الإطار يلّي عنّا ياه بيكفي لبدء التداول بـ 1 تموز 2020."""
mt: "Nigeria earlier announced it was planning to join the Continental Free Trade Area in the week before the summit. Albert Muchanga, the African Union's trade and industry commissioner, said Benin would join. The commissioner said: "After we agreed on the rules of origin and the customs basics, but the framework that we have is not enough to start trading on July 1, 2020.""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: حصلت على إشادة من النقاد خلال فترة وجودها بأتلانتا وتم الاعتراف فيها للتعليم الحضري المبتكر. سنة 2009 حصلت على لقب المشرفة الوطنية لهيدي السنة. بوقت الجايزة، شهدت مدارس أتلانتا تحسن كبير بدرجات الامتحان. بعد فترة قصيرة، نشرت ذا أتلنتا جورنال إنستتيوشن تقرير بيكشف مشاكل بنتايج الاختبار. أظهر التقرير أن درجات الاختبار زادت بسرعة مش معقولة، وزعم أن المدرسة اكتشفت مشاكل داخلية بس تصرفت بحسب النتايج. أظهرت الأدلة بعد هيك إنّه تم التلاعب بأوراق الاختبار مع هول، لجانب 34 من غير مسؤولين بالتعليم، سنة 2013.
mt: It received praise during its tenure in Atlanta and was recognized as the National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools saw significant improvement in test scores. Shortly after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reported a study that revealed test score increases were too fast to be credible, and that the school system discovered internal problems and responded to them based on the scores. Evidence later showed that the test scores were manipulated with the help of 34 non-educators, in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: انفجرت قنبلة برات مكتب الحاكم العام. انفجرت عدة قنابل بالقرب من المباني خلال ساعتين. وقدرت بعض التقارير العدد الرسمي للقتلى بتمانة، وبتأكد التقارير الرسمية إصابة شي 30 شخص؛ بس الأرقام النهائية مش معروفة بعد.
mt: 1. A bomb exploded at the Governor General's office. Several bombs exploded near buildings within two hours. Some reports estimated the official death toll at 20, and official reports confirmed that 30 people were injured; but the final numbers are not known yet.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: انضم جيسوس البالغ من العمر 21 سنة لمانشستر سيتي السنة الماضية بكانون التاني 2017 تارك نادي بالميراس البرازيلي مقابل 27 مليون جنيه إسترليني. من هيداك الوقت، شارك البرازيلي بـ53 مباراة للنادي بكل المسابقات وأحرز 24 هدف.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last January 2017 from Brazilian side Palmeiras for £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games for the club in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: انهار اوتيل بمكة المكرمة، المدينة الإسلامية المقدسة اليوم حوالي الساعة عشرة الصبح بالتوقيت المحلي. وكان ساكن بالمبنى عدد من الحجاج يلّي إجوا لزيارة المدينة المقدسة عشية الحج. كان ضيوف الاوتيل بالغالب من مواطنين دولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة. عدد القتلى ما بقل عن 15 قتيل، وهو رقم من المتوقع أنّو يزيد.
mt: 15 people were killed when a hotel in Mecca, the Islamic holy city, collapsed around 10 am local time. The hotel was occupied by many pilgrims who were about to visit the holy city before the Hajj. Most of the hotel's guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: اصطدم القمرين، يلّي وزن كل واحد منهم أكتر من 1000 رطل، على ارتفاع 491 ميل فوق الأرض ويسيران بسرعة 17500 ميل بالساعة تقريبًا، . بيقول العلما إنو الانفجار الناجم عن الاصطدام كان كتير كبير. وبعدهم عم يحاولوا يحددوا حجم الانهيار ومدى تأثيرو على الأرض. وعم تشتغل القيادة الإستراتيجية الأمريكية التابعة لمكتب وزارة الدفاع الأمريكية على تتبع الأنقاض. رح يتم نشر نتيجة تحليل التخطيط على موقع ويب عام.
mt: The two moons, each weighing more than 1,000 pounds, collided at an altitude of 491 miles above the Earth and were traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour. Scientists say the resulting explosion was huge. They are now trying to determine the size of the collapse and the extent of its impact on Earth. The US Strategic Command, part of the US Department of Defense, is tracking the debris. The results of the analysis will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

mt: 190th on the Forbes 400 list of richest Americans in 2008 with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a major donor to the Heid Foundation.

src: "وقع حاكم ولاية كاليفورنيا أرنولد شوارزنيجر على قانون بيمنع بيع أو تأجير ألعاب الفيديو العنيفة للقاصرين. بيتطلب مشروع القانون وضع ملصق على ألعاب الفيديو العنيفة يلّي عم تنباع بولاية كاليفورنيا مع ملصق مكتوب عليه ""‎18"" ويعاقب على بيعا لقاصر بغرامة قدرا 1000 دولار لكل مخالفة."
mt: "Governor of California Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires a label on violent video games sold in California with the label "18" and fines up to $1000 for each violation of selling to a minor."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "دوفال المتزوج وعنده ولدان بالغان، ما ترك انطباع كبير عند ميلر، يلّي كانت القصة متعلفة في. لما طلبوا من ميلير التعليق قال: ""مايك حكى كتير خلال الجلسة...كنت عم جهز حالي فما سمعت شو كان عم يحكي""."
mt: "Dove was married and had two adult children, which left Miller unimpressed. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talked a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready for my turn when I heard what he was saying.""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "وافق رئيس الوزرا ستيفن هاربر على إرسال ""قانون الهوا النضيف"" للحكومة للجنة من كل الأحزاب للمراجعة قبل قرايتو مرة تانية، بعد اجتماع يوم التلاتا اللي دام 25 دقيقة مع زعيم الحزب الوطني الديمقراطي جاك لايتون بمكتب رئيس الوزرا. طلب لايتون إجراء تغييرات على مشروع قانون البيئة للمحافظين خلال الاجتماع مع رئيس الوزراء، وطلب ""إعادة صياغة شاملة وكاملة"" من مشروع قانون البيئة لحزب المحافظين. من الوقت يلّي تدخلت فيه الحكومة الفيدرالية لتولي تمويل مستشفى ميرسي بديفونبورت، تسمانيا، انتقدت حكومة الولاية وبعض النواب الفيدراليين هيدا الشي باعتباره حيلة للتمهيد للانتخابات الفيدرالية يلّي رح يتم الدعوة لإلها بحلول تشرين التاني. بس رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد قال إن هيدا القانون يهدف بس لحماية مرافق المستشفى من التقليل من قيمتها من قبل حكومة تسمانيا، من خلال منح 45 مليون دولار أسترالي إضافية."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" to the government for review by a committee of all parties before it is read again, after a meeting on Monday that lasted 25 minutes with National Democratic Party leader Jack Layton in the Prime Minister's office. Layton asked for changes to the environmental project during the meeting with the Prime Minister, and asked for a "complete and comprehensive rewording" of the environmental project for the Conservative Party. From the time the federal government took over funding for the Mercy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs criticized this as a ploy for the federal election to be called by the end of October. But Prime Minister John Howard said this law is only intended to protect the hospital facilities from the depreciation of the Tasmanian government, by giving an additional 45 million Australian dollars."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: "وافق رئيس الوزرا ستيفن هاربر على إرسال ""قانون الهوا النضيف"" للحكومة للجنة من كل الأحزاب للمراجعة قبل قرايتو مرة تانية، بعد اجتماع يوم التلاتا اللي دام 25 دقيقة مع زعيم الحزب الوطني الديمقراطي جاك لايتون بمكتب رئيس الوزرا. طلب لايتون إجراء تغييرات على مشروع قانون البيئة للمحافظين خلال الاجتماع مع رئيس الوزراء، وطلب ""إعادة صياغة شاملة وكاملة"" من مشروع قانون البيئة لحزب المحافظين. من الوقت يلّي تدخلت فيه الحكومة الفيدرالية لتولي تمويل مستشفى ميرسي بديفونبورت، تسمانيا، انتقدت حكومة الولاية وبعض النواب الفيدراليين هيدا الشي باعتباره حيلة للتمهيد للانتخابات الفيدرالية يلّي رح يتم الدعوة لإلها بحلول تشرين التاني. بس رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد قال إن هيدا القانون يهدف بس لحماية مرافق المستشفى من التقليل من قيمتها من قبل حكومة تسمانيا، من خلال منح 45 مليون دولار أسترالي إضافية."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" to the government for review by a committee of all parties before it is read again, after a meeting on Monday that lasted 25 minutes with National Democratic Party leader Jack Layton in the Prime Minister's office. Layton asked for changes to the environmental project during the meeting with the Prime Minister, and asked for a "complete and comprehensive rewording" of the environmental project for the Conservative Party. From the time the federal government took over funding for the Mercy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs criticized this as a ploy for the federal election to be called by the end of October. But Prime Minister John Howard said this law is only intended to protect the hospital facilities from the depreciation of the Tasmanian government, by giving an additional 45 million Australian dollars."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: لاقوا حمض السيانوريك والميلامين بعينات البول من الحيوانات الأليفة يلّي ماتت بعد ما أكلت أكل ملوث للحيوانات. وقال باحثين بالجامعة إن المركّبيْن بيتفاعلوا مع بعضهم لتكوين بلورات ممكن تعيق وظايف الكلى. لاحظ الباحثين بلورات تتشكل ببول البسينات بإضافة الميلامين وحمض السيانوريك. بتطابق تكوين هيدي البلورات مع يلّي موجودة ببَول الحيوانات الأليفة المصابة عند مقارنتها بالتحليل الطيفي بالأشعة تحت الحمرا (FTIR).
mt: Researchers at the University of Guelph found that cyanuric acid and melamine react with each other to form crystals that can block kidney function. The researchers observed crystals forming in the urine of cats given melamine and cyanuric acid. The crystals matched those found in the urine of sick cats when compared to Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "ذكرت Xinhua إنو محققين حكوميين لاقوا ""صندوقين أسود"" من سجلات الرجلة يوم الأربعا. كمان عبروا المصارعين الزملا عن تقديرهم للونا. قال تومي دريمر: ""كانت لونا أول ملكة مصارعة ومديرتي الأولى.وماتت بليلة ظهر فيا قمرين وهي ليلة فريدة من نوعها متلها تمام. كانت لونا سيدة قوية."" علَّق داستن ""غولدست"" رونلز وقال أن ""لونا كانت مرعبة متلي ... ويمكن أكتر ... بحبها ورح اشتقلها ... بتمنى تكون بمكان أفضل."""
mt: "Xinhua reported government investigators found "black boxes" from the plane on Monday. They also conveyed condolences to the family. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first queen of wrestling and my first boss. She died on a full moon night, which is a unique night like that. Luna was a strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented, "Luna was scary like... and maybe more... I loved her and I miss her... I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: على الرغم من وجود ثلاثة أشخاص بالبيت بس ضربته السيارة، ما حدا منهم انصاب بأذى. إلا أن السايق انصاب بجروح خطيرة براسه. تم تسكير الطريق يلّي صار فيه الحادث مؤقتاً لكانت قامت خدمات الطوارئ بتطليع السايق من سيارة Audi TT الحمرا. تم نقله أولاً لمستشفى جيمس باجيت بغريت يارماوث. تم نقله من بعدها لمستشفى أدينبروك بكامبريدج.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car hit it, but none of them were injured. However, the driver was seriously injured. The road was closed temporarily while emergency services extracted the driver from his red Audi TT. He was first taken to James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth, then to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: بدأت الألعاب الساعة 10:00 الصباح وكان الطقس رائع بصرف النظر عن زخّات المطر الصبح يلّي سرعان ما توقفت، فكان يوم مثالي للرجبي 7. بلشت جنوب أفريقيا المصنفة الأولى بالبطولة بطريقة صحيحة لما حققت ربح مريح بنتيجة 26 -00 على زامبيا المصنفة الخامسة. بينت جنوب إفريقيا ضعيفة بالمباراة ضد الدول الجنوبية الشقيقة، بس تحسنت بثبات مع تقدم البطولة. دفاعهم المنضبط ومهاراتهم بالتعامل مع الكرة وعملهم الجماعي الممتاز جعلهم متميزين وكان من الواضح أنّو هيدا هو الفريق يلّي لازم يربح.
mt: 7s rugby started at 10:00 am and the weather was great despite morning showers which soon stopped, making it a perfect day for 7s rugby. South Africa, ranked first in the tournament, won correctly by a comfortable margin of 26 -00 against Zambia, ranked fifth. South Africa was weak in the match against the southern sister countries, but improved steadily as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball skills and excellent teamwork made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team that had to win.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: بالعقود التلاتة الماضية، على الرغم من بقائها رسميًا دولة شيوعية، طورت الصين اقتصاد السوق. تم إجراء الإصلاحات الاقتصادية الأولى تحت قيادة دنغ شياو بينغ. من وقتها نما حجم إقتصاد الصين 90 مرة. لأول مرة، صدرت الصين بالسنة الماضية عدد سيارات أكتر من ألمانيا وتفوقت على الولايات المتحدة كأكبر سوق لهيدي الصناعة. ممكن يصير الناتج المحلي الإجمالي للصين أكبر من الولايات المتحدة خلال عشرين سنة.
mt: In the past three decades, despite remaining officially a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, the size of China's economy has grown 90-fold. For the first time, China last year produced more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market for the industry. China's gross domestic product may become larger than the United States within twenty years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: "قال هو جيناتو:""""عم نسعى لنقلل انبعاثات تاني أوكسيد الكربون لكل وحدة من الناتج المحلي الإجمالي بهامش مهم بحلول سنة 2020 عن مستوى 2005"". ما حدد رقم للتخفيضات، وقال إنها رح تتم بناء على الناتج الاقتصادي للصين. شجع هو جين تاو الدول النامية على ""تجنب المسار القديم للتلويث اولاً ومن بعدها التنضيف."" وأضاف أنه ""ما لازم أن يُطلب منهم تحمُّل التزامات بتتخطى مرحلة تطورهم وسؤولياتهم وقدراتهم."""
mt: "He said: 'We are aiming to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 compared to 2005.' He did not set a target for reductions, saying it would be based on China's economic growth. He urged developing countries to 'avoid the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up.' He added that 'they should be asked to take on commitments that go beyond their stage of development, responsibilities and capabilities.'"
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "وبتقول منظمة مانجولا الخيرية الطبية ومنظمة أطباء بلا حدود ومنظمة الصحة العالمية إنّو هيدا هو أسوأ تفشِّ مسجل بالبلد. قال المتحدث بإسم منظمة أطباء بلا حدود ريتشارد فيرمان: ""الوضع بعدو سيئ بأنغولا ومن المرجح أن تتجه لأسوأ انتشار على الاطلاق"""
mt: "And the medical charity Médecins Sans Frontières, the World Health Organization and the Angolan government say this is the worst outbreak ever in Angola. Médecins Sans Frontières spokesman Richard Fuller said: "The situation in Angola is bad and it is likely to get worse than ever before.""
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: أدلى مدير النيابة العامة، كير ستارمر كيو سي، ببيان اليوم الصبح أعلن فيه محاكمة هوهني وبرايس. استقال هوهني ورح يحل محله عضو البرلمان إد ديفي. من المتوقع أن يتولى النائب نورمان لامب منصب وزير الأعمال يلّي يتركه ديفي. ومن المقرر أن يمثل هون وبرايس قدّام محكمة وستمنستر الابتدائية بـ 16 شباط.
mt: Attorney General Sir Keir Starmer QC issued a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of Huhne and Pryce. Huhne resigned and will be replaced by MP Chris Huhne. It is expected that Norman Lamb will take the role of Business Secretary after Huhne leaves. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear before Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "كانت القصة لكاميل سانت ساينز يلّي عُرِضت بدار الأوبرا الفرنسية، عن فنان ""بيشغل حياته بحب المخدرات واليابان."" ونتيجة عن هيدا الشي، بدخنوا المغنيين القنب على المسرح، وبيشجع المسرح الجمهور على الانضمام."
mt: "The story was about Camille Saint-Saëns, who was performing at the Opéra de Paris, about an artist "who spends his life in love with drugs and Japan." As a result, the musicians smoked cannabis on stage, and the theater encouraged the audience to join."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

mt: "The story was about Camille Saint-Saëns, who was performing at the Opéra de Paris, about an artist "who spends his life in love with drugs and Japan." As a result, the musicians smoked cannabis on stage, and the theater encouraged the audience to join."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "ليونوف المعروف كمان بإنو ""رائد الفضاء رقم 11""، كان من ضمن فريق رواد الفضاء الأصلي للاتحاد السوفيتي. بـ18 آذار 1965، تم أول نشاط مأهول خارج المركبة أو ""سير فضاء""، وضل وحيد خارج المركبة الفضائية لأكتر من 12 دقيقة بشوي. حصل على ""بطل الاتحاد السوفيتي الأول""، أعلى وسام شرف للاتحاد السوفيتي ، لعمله. بعد عشر سنين ، قاد الجزء السوفيتي من مهمة أبولو سويوز، يلّي بيرمز لانتهاء سباق الفضاء."
mt: "Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the original Soviet cosmonaut team. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA) outside a spacecraft, and was alone outside the spacecraft for more than 12 minutes. He was awarded the title of "Hero of the Soviet Union", the highest honor of the Soviet Union, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which symbolized the end of the Space Race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "بعد الحادث، نقلوا جيبسون على مستشفى بس توفي بعدها بوقت قصير. ما انصاب شوفير الشاحنة اللي عمرو 64 سنة خلال حادث السيارة. وتم نقل السيارة نفسها من مكان الحادث بحوالي الساعة 12:00 بتوقيت جرينتش من اليوم نفسه. قال شخص يشتغل بجراج بالقرب من مكان الحادث: ""كان في أولاد ناطرين يقطعوا الطريق وكانوا كلهم عم يصرخوا ويبكوا."" وهربوا كل الولاد من مكان وقوع الحادث."
mt: "After the accident, Gibson was taken to a hospital where he later died. The truck driver, who was 64 years old, was also injured in the crash. The truck itself was removed from the scene of the accident at around 12:00 GMT on the same day. A man who works at a garage near the scene of the accident said, ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" The children ran away from the scene of the accident."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: كان العمل المنجز بالغالب نظري، إلا إنو تمت كتابة البرنامج لمحاكاة الملاحظات اللي تم إجراؤها لمجرة (ساجيتاريوس). كان التأثير يلّي كان يبحث عنه الفريق ناتج عن قوى المد بين المادة المظلمة بالمجرات عامةً والمادة المظلمة بمجرة درب التبانة خاصةً. تمامًا متل ما القمر بيأثر على الأرض وبيسبب بحدوث المد والجزر، كمان مجرة درب التبانة بتأثر على مجرة القوس. قدروا العلما يستنتجوا أنّو المادة المظلمة بتأثر على المادة المظلمة التانية بنفس الطريقة يلّي بتأثر فيها المادة العادية. بتعتبر هالنظرية إنو معظم المادة المعتمة اللي حول المجرة ​​بتكون على شكل حفرة، وبتتكون من عدّة جسيمات صغيرة.
mt: The work was largely theoretical, but the team wrote a program to simulate observations of the Sagittarius galaxy. The team was looking for the effect of dark matter on dark matter in general and dark matter in the Milky Way in particular. Just as the moon affects the Earth and causes tides, the Milky Way affects the Sculptor galaxy. Scientists concluded that dark matter affects the other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter is affected. This theory considers that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in the form of a hole, and is made up of several small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "بعد إعصار كاترينا بالولايات المتحدة الاميريكية، قام نقاش وجدل كبير بخصوص كلفة الاغاثة وإعادة الاعمار وبطريقة فكاهية وصفها بعض المحافظين الماليين على إنها ""صفقة بوش بــ نيو أورليانز."" ركز النقد الليبرالي لجهود إعادة الإعمار على منح عقود إعادة الإعمار للمطلعين على بواطن الأمور بواشنطن."
mt: "After Hurricane Katrina in the United States, there was a great debate and controversy about the cost of relief and reconstruction, and in a humorous way some conservative financiers described it as "Bush's deal in New Orleans." The liberal criticism of reconstruction efforts focused on the granting of reconstruction contracts to insiders in Washington."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "لما توصل الكبسولة عالأرض وتدخل بالغلاف الجوي، عحوالي الساعة 5 الصبح (بالتوقيت الشرقي)، من المتوقع إنو تقدم عرض بسيط للناس بشمال كاليفورنيا وأوريجون ونيفادا ويوتا. رح تظهر الكبسول على شكل شهب عم يمرق بالسماء. رح تقطع الكبسول سرعة 12.8 كيلومتر يعني ما يعادل 8 أميال بالثانية، وهي سرعة كافية للانتقال من سان فرانسيسكو للوس أنجلوس بدقيقة وحدة. رح تحقق ستارداست رقم قياسي جديد على الاطلاق لتكون أسرع مركبة فضائية بترجع على الارض، وبتكون بهيك حطمت الرقم القياسي السابق المسجل بــ أيار 1969 بوقت رجعة وحدة قيادة أبولو أكس. قال توم دوكسبري، مدير مشروع ستاردست: ""رح تتحرك فوق الساحل الغربي لشمال كاليفورنيا ورح تنوّر السما من كاليفورنيا عبر وسط أوريغون وعبر نيفادا وأيداهو وصولاً ليوتا""."
mt: "When the capsule re-enters the atmosphere and enters the atmosphere, around 5 a.m. (Eastern Time), it is expected that a brief show will be presented to people in northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will appear as a meteor moving through the sky. The capsule will travel at a speed of 12.8 kilometers, which is equivalent to 8 miles per second, which is sufficient to travel from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new record for the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, and will break the previous record set in May 1969 by one minute and 48 seconds of Apollo X. Tom Doxberry, director of the Stardust project, said: "It will move over the west coast of northern California and will illuminate the sky from California through central Oregon, through Nevada, Idaho and Utah." "
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: قالت السلطات بولاية أوهايو إن طبيبة كانت تشتغل بمستشفى الأطفال ببيتسبرغ بولاية بنسلفانيا رح تُتهم بجريمة القتل العمد بعد لقية أمها ميتة بصندوق سيارتها الأربعاء. الدكتور مالار بالاسوبرامانيان، 29 سنة ، وُجد ببلو آش، أوهايو، وهي ضاحية على بعد 15 ميل تقريباً شمال سينسيناتي ممدد على الأرض بجانب الطريق بقميص وتياب داخلية تحت تأثير الدوا يبدو. دلت الضباط على سيارتها الأولدزموبيل إنتريغ السودا اللي كانت على بعد 500 قدم. ولاقوا هنيك جثة ساروجا بالاسوبرامانيان، 53 سنة، مغطاية ببطانيات ملطخة بالدم. وقالت الشرطة إنو الجثة بينت إلها هونيك من شي يوم تقريباً.
mt: Authorities in Ohio said a doctor who worked at a children's hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, was charged with murder after finding her mother dead in her car on Wednesday. Dr. Malarka Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the ground next to the road in a shirt and pajamas under the influence of drugs. Police found her Oldsmobile Intrigue sedan about 500 feet away. They found the body of Saroj Balasubramanian, 53, covered in bloody sheets. Police said the body indicated that she had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: هيدي أكبر عملية استحواذ بتاريح eBay. تأمُل الشركة بتنويع مصادر أرباحها واكتساب شعبية بالمناطق يلّي بيحتل فيها سكايب (Skype) مكانة قوية متل الصين وأوروبا الشرقية والبرازيل.
mt: It was eBay's largest acquisition to date. The company had been considering diversifying its revenue sources and gaining popularity in areas where Skype had a strong presence, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: لما توقف القتال بعد نقل الجرحى عالمستشفى، بقي حوالي 40 من المساجين بالساحة رافضين يرجعوا لزنازينهم. حاول المفاوضين تصحيح الوضع بس مطالب الأسرى مش واضحة. بين الساعة 10:00-11:00 بالليل من التوقيت الصيفي للجبال، ولَّع السجنا حريق بالحديقة. فاتوا ضباط مجهزين بمعدات مكافحة الشغب على الفناء وحاصروا المساجين بالغاز المسيل للدموع. طفّوا فرق الإنقاذ الحريق أخيرًا بحلول الساعة 11:35 مساءً.
mt: 40 of the prisoners remained in the yard after the fighting stopped, refusing to return to their cells. The negotiators tried to correct the situation, but the demands of the prisoners were unclear. At around 10:00-11:00 pm local time, the prison set fire to the garden. Armed officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and surrounded the prisoners with tear gas. The fire brigade finally arrived at around 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: لما توقف القتال بعد نقل الجرحى عالمستشفى، بقي حوالي 40 من المساجين بالساحة رافضين يرجعوا لزنازينهم. حاول المفاوضين تصحيح الوضع بس مطالب الأسرى مش واضحة. بين الساعة 10:00-11:00 بالليل من التوقيت الصيفي للجبال، ولَّع السجنا حريق بالحديقة. فاتوا ضباط مجهزين بمعدات مكافحة الشغب على الفناء وحاصروا المساجين بالغاز المسيل للدموع. طفّوا فرق الإنقاذ الحريق أخيرًا بحلول الساعة 11:35 مساءً.
mt: 40 of the prisoners remained in the yard after the fighting stopped, refusing to return to their cells. The negotiators tried to correct the situation, but the demands of the prisoners were unclear. At around 10:00-11:00 pm local time, the prison set fire to the garden. Armed officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and surrounded the prisoners with tear gas. The fire brigade finally arrived at around 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "بعد تصريحاتو يلّي كانت قد بُثت على الهوا مباشرةً، كانت المرّة الاولى يلّي بتعترف فيها مصادر ايرانية رفيعة المستوى بأن العقوبات بتشكل أي تأثير. وبتشمل العقوبات القيود المالية والحظر المفروض من الإتحاد الأوروبي على تصدير البترول الخام اللي بيربح الإقتصاد الإيراني من خلاله 80 بالمية من دخله الأجنبي. وقالت أوبك بأحدث تقاريرها الشهرية إن صادرات الخام تراجعت لأدنى مستوى الها من عقدين بمعدل 2.8 مليون برميل يومياً. وكان وصف المرشد الأعلى للبلاد، آية الله علي خامنئي، بإنّو الاعتماد على النفط هو""فخ"" بيرجع تاريخو لما قبل الثورة الاسلامية الايرانية سنة 1979 ويلّي لازم تتحرر منو البلاد."
mt: "After his statements, which were broadcast live, it was the first time that Iranian officials of high level admitted that sanctions were having any effect. The sanctions include financial restrictions and an oil export ban imposed by the European Union, which earns Iran 80 percent of its foreign income. OPEC reported in its latest monthly report that oil exports had fallen to their lowest level in two decades, at 2.8 million barrels per day. The Supreme Leader of the country, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described the dependence on oil as a ""trap"" that dates back to before the Islamic Revolution of Iran in 1979, and that the country must be freed from it."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: بفرنسا كان التصويت عادةً تجربة بتقنية بسيطة: بيعزل الناخبين حالهم بكشك، وبحطّوا ورقة مطبوعة مسبقاً محددين فيها مرشحهم المفضل بظرف. بعد ما يتحقق المسؤولين من هوية الناخب، بحط الناخب الظرف بصندوق الاقتراع وبيوقع على قائمة التصويت. قانون الانتخاب الفرنسي بتدوّن الإجراءات بدقة. من سنة 1988، لازم تكون صناديق الاقتراع شفافة حتى يقدر الناخبين والمراقبين يشوفو إنو ما في ظروف ببداية التصويت وما ينضاف ظروف غير ظروف الناخبين اللي انفرزت حسب الأصول والناخبين المخولين. يمكن للمرشحين إرسال ممثلين ليحضروا كل جزء من العملية. بالمسا، بتم عد الأصوات من قبل المتطوعين تحت إشراف مشدد مع اتباع إجراءات محددة.
mt: In France, voting was traditionally a simple process: voters were isolated in booths, and a pre-printed ballot was handed to them in which they were to indicate their preferred candidate. After the officials verified the voter's identity, the voter was to place the ballot in the ballot box and sign the voting list. The French electoral law meticulously details the procedures. Since 1988, ballot boxes have had to be transparent so that voters and observers could see what was in the box at the beginning of voting and what was added during the voting of eligible voters. Candidates can send representatives to attend each part of the process. In the evening, the votes are counted by volunteers under strict supervision with specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: إذا تم تأكيده، فالاكتشاف بيكمل بحث ألين لمدة تمان سنين عن موساشي. بعد رسم خرائط لقاع البحر، لاقوا الحطام بواسطة جهاز. يُزعم إنو ألين، واحد من أغنى أثرياء العالم، استثمر كمية كبيرة من ثروتو بالاستكشاف البحري وبلش يسعى للتفتيش عن موساشي من خلال اهتمامو الدايم بالحرب.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery would complete a 28-year search for the Musashi. After mapping the ocean floor, they found the wreckage using a device. It is claimed that Allen, one of the world's richest philanthropists, invested a large amount of his fortune in maritime exploration and is seeking to search for Musashi through his constant interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: بتظهر تقارير تلفزيونية دخان أبيض عم يطلع من المصنع. بتحذر السلطات المحلية السكان بمحيط المصنع إنو لازم يبقوا ببيوتن وما يشغلوا المكيفات وما يشربوا مي من الحنفية. وفقًا للوكالة النووية اليابانية، تم التعرف على السيزيوم المشع واليود بالمصنع. بتتكهن السلطات بأن هيدا بدِل على أن الحاويات يلّي فيها وقود اليورانيوم بالموقع ممكن تكون انفجرت وعم تتسرب.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities warn residents near the plant to stay in their homes and not to use air conditioning or drink tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were detected at the plant. Authorities speculate that the containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have exploded and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "اكتشف الدكتور توني مول مرض السل شديد المقاومة للأدوية (XDR-TB) بمنطقة كوازولو ناتال بجنوب إفريقيا. بمقابلة، قال إن الشكل الجديد كان ""مقلق ومهول كتير بسبب معدل الوفيات الكتير المرتفع."" بيعتقد الدكتور مول إنو بعض المرضى يمكن يكونوا انصابو بالفيروس بالمستشفى، وكان تنين منن على الأقل من العمال الصحيين بالمستشفى. بسنة وحدة، ممكن الشخص المصاب يعدي من 10 إلى 15 شخص مخالط معه. النسبة المئوية لمرض السل الشديد المقاومة للأدوية بالمجموعة الكاملة من المصابين بالسل بعدها منخفضة؛ أصيب 6000 من إجمالي 330.000 شخص بأي لحظة معينة بجنوب إفريقيا."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered a new strain of drug-resistant tuberculosis in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa. In an interview, he said the new strain was ""very alarming and disturbing because of the high mortality rate."" Dr. Moll believed some patients may have contracted the virus in the hospital, and at least one of the hospital's staff was infected. One year later, a person infected with the disease could infect between 10 and 15 people with whom he came in contact. The percentage of drug-resistant tuberculosis in the entire group of TB patients was then low; 6,000 of 330,000 people in South Africa were infected at any given time."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: نكستجن هو نظام بتدعي إدارة الطيران الفيدرالية إنو رح يسمح للطيارات بالطيران بمسارات أقصر وبيوفر ملايين الليترات من الوقود كل سنة وبيقلل من انبعاثات الكربون. بتستعمل تقنية بتعتمد على الأقمار الصناعية بدلاً من التكنولوجيا القديمة القائمة على الرادار الأرضي للسماح لمراقبين الحركة الجوية بتحديد الطيارات بدقة أكبر وتقديم معلومات أكثر دقة للطيارين.
mt: NextGen is a system the Federal Aviation Administration says will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel per year and reduce carbon emissions. It uses satellite technology instead of the old ground-based radar to allow air traffic controllers to identify aircraft more accurately and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: انتقد المؤرخين سياسات مكتب التحقيقات الفيدرالي السابقة لتركيز الإمكتنيات على القضايا يلّي حلّها هيّن، وخاصة قضايا السيارات المسروقة، بهدف تعزيز معدل نجاح الوكالة. بلّش الكونجرس بتمويل مبادرة الفحش بالسنة المالية 2005 وحدد أن مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي لازم يخصص 10 وكلا للمواد الإباحية للبالغين.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's previous policies of focusing its resources on issues that were easily solved, especially stolen car cases, in order to boost the agency's success rate. Congress funded the Porn Initiative in fiscal year 2005 and required the FBI to allocate 10 percent of its resources to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: تحطمت الطيارة JAS 39C Gripen وانفجرت على المدرج بحوالي الساعة 9:30 الصباح بالتوقيت المحلي و02:30 بالتوقيت العالمي، يلّي أدى لتسكير المطار للرحلات التجارية. تم التعرف على الطيار على أنّو قائد السرب ديلوكريت باتافي. ذكرت وسائل الإعلام المحلية إنو عرباية الإطفاء بالمطار انقلبت هي وعم تستجيب.
mt: 9:30 local time (02:30 UTC) the aircraft JAS 39C Gripen crashed and exploded on the runway, leading to the closure of the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader Deloach Batavia. Local media reported that the airport fire brigade had turned over and was responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: تحطمت الطيارة JAS 39C Gripen وانفجرت على المدرج بحوالي الساعة 9:30 الصباح بالتوقيت المحلي و02:30 بالتوقيت العالمي، يلّي أدى لتسكير المطار للرحلات التجارية. تم التعرف على الطيار على أنّو قائد السرب ديلوكريت باتافي. ذكرت وسائل الإعلام المحلية إنو عرباية الإطفاء بالمطار انقلبت هي وعم تستجيب.
mt: 9:30 local time (02:30 UTC) the aircraft JAS 39C Gripen crashed and exploded on the runway, leading to the closure of the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader Deloach Batavia. Local media reported that the airport fire brigade had turned over and was responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: وطول فترة الستينيات من القرن الماضي، اشتغل بريجنسكي مع جون كينيدي كمستشاره وانتقل بعدين لإدارة ليندون جونسون. خلال انتخابات سنة 1976، نصح كارتر بخصوص السياسة الخارجية، ومن بعدها عمل مستشار للأمن القومي (NSA) من سنة 1977 لسنة 1981، بعد هنري كيسنجر. بصفته وكالة الأمن القومي، ساعد كارتر بالتعامل الدبلوماسي مع الشؤون العالمية، متل اتفاقيات كامب ديفيد، 1978؛ تطبيع العلاقات الأمريكية - الصينية بأواخر السبعينيات. الثورة الإيرانية يلّي سببت أزمة الرهائن الإيرانية 1979. والغزو السوفيتي لأفغانستان 1979.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Jimmy Carter on foreign policy, and later served as Carter's National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger. As National Security Advisor, he helped manage the diplomatic negotiations that led to the Camp David Accords, 1978; the normalization of American–Chinese relations in the late 1970s. The Iranian Revolution of 1979 led to the Iran hostage crisis. The Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: انولد بوبيك بالعاصمة الكرواتية، زغرب، وانشهر بس لعب مع بارتيزان بلغراد. انضم لإلهم سنة 1945 وبقي حتى سنة 1958. بالفترة يلّي قضاها مع الفريق، سجل 403 هدف بـ 468 مباراة. ما سجل أي شخص تاني ظهور أو أهداف للنادي أكتر من بوبيك. سنة 1995 تم اختياره كأفضل لاعب بتاريخ بارتيزان.
mt: Born in Zagreb, Croatia, he began his career with Partizan Belgrade. He joined Dinamo in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the club, he scored 403 goals in 468 matches. No one else has scored more appearances or goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was named the best player in Partizan's history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae هو فصيلة من عيلة Dromaeosauridae وهو ابن عم Velociraptor. ومن المرجح إنو هالطير الجارج اللي بيتميز بحرارته الثابة والمغطى بالريش كان يمشي هو وواقف على مخالبو متل الديناصور ""فيلوسيرابتور"". كان مخلبها التاني أكبر، يلّي أدى لظهور اسم Hesperonychus يلّي بيعني ""مخلب غربي."""
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a genus of dromaeosaurid theropod dinosaur. It is likely that this bird-like creature with its thick coat of feathers was bipedal like the dinosaur Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw.""
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: حضر 100 شخص على الأقل حفلة الاحتفال بالذكرى السنوية الأولى لزوجين تزوجزوا السنة الماضية. وقال المسؤولين إنه تم تحديد موعد رسمي للاحتفال بالذكرى السنوية لوقت تاني. تزوج الثنائي بتكساس قبل سنة بعد هيك إجوا على بوفالو للاحتفال مع الأصدقاء والأقارب. كان الزوج البالغ من العمر 30 سنة، ويلّي ولد ببوفالو، واحد من القتلى الأربعة بإطلاق النار، بس زوجته ما نصابت بأي بأذى.
mt: 100 or more people attended the first anniversary party of a couple who married last year. Officials said a formal date for the anniversary party was set. The couple married in Texas last year after a trip to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: كانت لونو حاملة 120- 160 متر مكعب من البانزين لمّا تعطلت ودفشتها الرياح والأمواج على كاسر الأمواج. وأنقذت طيارات الهليكوبتر الفريق المؤلف من 12 شخص وكانت الإصابة الوحيدة هي كسر بالمنخار. كانت السفينة يلّي بيبلغ طولها 100متر بطريقها لالتقاط حمولتها المعتادة من الأسمدة، وكان المسؤولين متخوفين بالبداية من أن السفينة ممكن توقِّع الحمولة.
mt: 120-160 cubic meters of benzene was on board when it caught fire and was blown ashore by wind and waves. Helicopters rescued the crew of 12 people, with the only injury being a broken nose. The ship was on its way to collect its usual load of fertilizer, and officials were initially concerned that the ship might explode.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: بتشمل إنجازات فوتييه غير التوجيه إضراب عن الأكل بسنة 1973 ضد ما اعتبره رقابة سياسية. تم تغيير القانون الفرنسي. رجع نشاطه لسن 15 بعد انضمامه للمقاومة الفرنسية بالحرب العالمية التانية. وثق نفسه بكتاب سنة 1998. بالستينيات رجع على الجزائر المستقلة حديثًا لتعليم الإخراج السينمائي.
mt: In addition to his direction of the 1973 hunger strike against what he considered political censorship, the French law was changed. He returned to active duty at age 15 after joining the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a book in 1998. In the 1960s, he returned to newly independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: سافر أكتر من 4 ملايين شخص على روما ليحضرو الجنازة. كان عدد الحاضرين كبير لدرجة أنّو ما مش الكل قدروا يوصلوا للجنازة بساحة القديس بطرس. تركبت عدة شاشات تلفزيون كبيرة بمطارح مختلفة بروما للسماح للجمهور بحضور الحفل. بعدة مدن تانية بإيطاليا وببقية العالم، بالأخص ببولندا، عملوا تحضيرات مماثلة، ويلّي حضرها عدد كبير من الناس.
mt: 4 million people traveled to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of attendees was so large that not all could reach the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were set up in different parts of Rome to allow the public to attend the ceremony. Several other cities in Italy and around the world, especially in Poland, made similar preparations, and a large number of people attended.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
