src: بحسب التقارير، انفجرت شقة بشارع ماكبث بسبب تسرب غاز. كان مسؤول بشركة الغاز عم ينقل الخبر من مكان الحادث بعد أن اتصل أحد الجيران بخصوص تسرب غاز. انفجرت الشقة لما وصل المسؤول. ما وصل أي أخبار عن وقوع إصابات خطيرة، بس خمس أشخاص على الأقل كانوا بالموقع وقت الانفجار واتعالجو من أعراض الصدمة. ما كان في حدا جوات الشقة. بهيداك الوقت تم إجلاء 100 مواطن تقريباً من المنطقة.
mt: According to reports, a flat on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. The gas company employee was on his way to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. The flat exploded when the employee arrived. There were no reports of serious injuries, but at least five people were at the scene at the time of the explosion and were treated for shock. No one was in the flat at the time. At the time of this writing, about 100 residents have been evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: والقتلى هنّي نيكولاس ألدن، 25 سنة، وزاكاري كوديباك، 21 سنة، وكان كودباك هو السايق. انصاب إدغار فيجويلا بجروح بالدراع والفك بينما ترك كريستوفر شنايدر بحاجة لجراحة ترميمية لوجهه. فشل أوكا بالتصويب على راس رجل خامس. و عم يعاني شنايدر من وجع مستمر، وعمى بعين واحدة، وجزء مفقود من الجمجمة ووجه تم معالجته من التيتانيوم. شهد شنايدر عبر رابط فيديو من قاعدة القوات الجوية الأمريكية ببلدو.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cudnik were killed. Cudnik was the driver. Edgar Vigil sustained arm and jaw injuries while Christopher Sneddon required facial reconstructive surgery. Oku failed to hit a fifth man in the head. Sneddon is still suffering from constant pain, has lost an eye, and has a portion of his skull and face replaced with titanium. Sneddon testified via video link from the United States Air Force Base at Beale.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: من المقرر أن يرجعوا الجولف والرجبي على الألعاب الأولمبية. صوتت اللجنة الأولمبية الدولية على إدراج الرياضة باجتماع مجلسها التنفيذي ببرلين اليوم، وتم اختيار لعبة الرغبي، وتحديداً اتحاد الرغبي، والجولف على خمس رياضات تانية للمشاركة بالأولمبياد. حاولت رياضات الاسكواش والكاراتيه والكرة الدوارة تفوت بالبرنامج الأولمبي بالإضافة للبيسبول والكرة اللينة، يلّي تم التصويت عليهم برّات الألعاب الأولمبية بسنة 2005. بيتوجب التصديق على التصويت من قبل اللجنة الأولمبية الدولية الكاملة باجتماعها بتشرين الأول بكوبنهاجن.
mt: Golf and rugby are to return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today, with rugby union and golf selected as the five additional sports to participate in the Olympics. The sports of squash, karate, baseball and softball had also tried to make the Olympic program, and were voted out in 2005. The full International Olympic Committee must approve the vote at its meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: بـ24 أيلول 1759، وقع آرثر غينيس عقد إيجار لمدة 9000 سنة لمصنع البيرة ساينت جايمس غايت بروري بدبلن، أيرلندا. بعد 250 سنة، تحولت جينيس لشركة عالمية تدر أكتر من 10 ميليار يورو (14.7 مليار دولار) كل سنة.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease for the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. After 250 years, Guinness became a global company earning more than 10 billion euros (14.7 billion dollars) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: تم التأكد من إصابة سلالة إنفلونزا الطيور القاتلة للإنسان، H5N1، بعد ما لاقوا بطة برية ميتة، يوم التنين بمستنقعات بالقرب من ليون بشرق فرنسا. تعتبر فرنسا سابع دولة بالاتحاد الأوروبي بتعاني من هيدا الفيروس. بعد النمسا وألمانيا وسلوفينيا وبلغاريا واليونان وإيطاليا. بعدها الحالات المشتبه بإصابها بفيروس H5N1 بكرواتيا والدنمارك غير مؤكدة.
mt: H5N1 avian influenza was confirmed after a dead wild duck was found on Monday in marshes near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh European Union country to be affected by the virus. After Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. After suspected cases of H5N1 virus in Croatia and Denmark are not confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: تم إلقاء اللوم على قوات حفظ السلام التابعة للأمم المتحدة اللي وصلوا عهايتي بعد زلزال سنة 2010، بسبب انتشار المرض اللي بلّش بالقرب من معسكر القوات. بحسب الدعوى القضائية، ما تم تطهير الزبالة من معسكر الأمم المتحدة بشكل صحيح، يلّي سبب دخول البكتيريا على روافد نهر أرتيبونيت، واحد من أكبر روافد هايتي. قبل وصول القوات، ما واجهت هايتي مشاكل بتتعلق بالمرض من القرن التسعتعش. أشار المعهد الهايتي للعدالة والديمقراطية لدراسات مستقلة بتشير لأن كتيبة حفظ السلام النيبالية التابعة للأمم المتحدة جابت المرض بلا ما تعرف لهايتي. دانييل لانتاني، خبيرة الأمم المتحدة بهيدا المرض، قالت إن تفشي المرض كان على الأرجح بسبب قوات حفظ السلام.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake peacekeepers are blamed for the spread of cholera in the area near their camp. According to the lawsuit, the UN peacekeeping camp's waste was not properly cleaned, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest tributaries. Before the arrival of the peacekeepers, Haiti had not faced major health problems in the 20th century. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy cited independent studies that indicated that the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion brought the disease to Haiti. Daniel Lantagne, a UN cholera expert, said the spread of the disease was likely due to the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "وبتأكد الحكومة الأيرلندية على الضرورة الملحة لسن تشريع برلماني لتصحيح الوضع. قال متحدث باسم الحكومة ""من المهم هلأ من منطلق الصحة العامة والعدالة الجنائية أن يتم سن التشريعات بأقرب وقت ممكن."" وعبَّر وزير الصحة عن قلقه بخصوص رفاهية الأشخاص يلّي عم يستغلوا الشرعية المؤقتة للمواد المعنية، وللإدانات المتعلقة بالمخدرات يلّي صدرت من لحظة ما صارت التغييرات غير الدستورية حيز التنفيذ."
mt: "And the Irish government has confirmed the urgent need for a parliamentary bill to correct the situation. A government spokesman said, "It is important from the perspective of public health and criminal justice that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible." The health minister expressed concern about the welfare of people who are taking advantage of the interim legality of the substances, and the condemnations related to drugs that were issued at the moment the changes became unconstitutional."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "قال كريستوفر جارسيا، المتحدث باسم إدارة شرطة لوس أنجلوس، إن المجرم الدكر المشتبه فيه عم يخضع للتحقيق بتهمة التعدي على ممتلكات الغير ومش التخريب. ما تتضررت العلامة مادياً؛ وتم التعديل باستعمال القماش المشمع الأسود المزين بعلامات السلام والقلب لتغيير ""O"" لقراية الأحرف الصغيرة ""e""."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect is being investigated for burglary and vandalism. No damage was done; the suspect used black spray-painted fabric with peace and heart symbols to change the "O" to the lowercase "e". "
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "كارنو إستاذ لغة إنغليزية مشهور بس مثير للجدل، علّم بمعهد مودرن إدوكايشن وكينغز غلوري وادعى إنو كان عندو 9000 تلميذ بذروة حياتو المهنية. استعمل بملاحظاته كلمات اعتبرها بعض أولياء الأمر بذيئة، وانقال إنه استعمل الألفاظ النابية بالصف. اتهمو معهد مودرن إدوكايشن بطباعة إعلانات كبيرة على الباصات من دون إذن وبالادعاء كذباً إنو كان إستاذ لغة إنغليزية رئيسي. كمان اتهم سابقًا بانتهاك حقوق الطبع والنشر، بس ما تم توجيه أي تهمة له. قال تلميذ سابق إنه ""استعمل اللغة العامية بالصف، وعلَّم مهارات المواعدة بالملاحظات ، وكان صديق للتلاميذ""."
mt: "Karno, a famous and controversial English teacher, taught at Modern Education Institute and Kings Glory, and claimed to have had 9,000 students at the peak of his career. He used his notes with words that some parents considered vulgar, and went on to say that he used slang in class. He was accused of printing large ads on buses without permission and falsely claiming to be a main English teacher. He was also previously accused of copyright infringement, but no charges were filed against him. A former student said he ""used slang in class, taught dating skills in his notes, and was a friend to students."" "
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: حجز شرطي فلبيني سابق سائحين من هونج كونج كرهينة من خلال اختطاف باصهم بمانيلا، عاصمة الفلبين. قوّص رولاندو ميندوزا من بندقيته الأم 16 على السواح. تم إنقاذ عدد من الرهاين وتأكد وفاة ستة على الأقل لحد هلق. تم إطلاق سراح ستة رهاين، بينهم أطفال وكبار بالعمر وكمان المصورين الفلبينيين. أخذوا المصورين بعدين مكان سيدة ختيارة لأنها كانت بحاجة أنها تروح على الحمام، بعد ما تم إطلاق النار على مندوزا.
mt: A former Filipino police officer took tourists from Hong Kong hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Roland Mendosa, armed with an M16, took the tourists hostage. A number of hostages were rescued and at least six were confirmed dead. Six hostages, including children and elderly, and Filipino photographers were released. The photographers were taken to a woman's place to use the bathroom, after Mendosa was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: البرازيل هي أكبر دولة كاثوليكية رومانية على وجه الأرض، وعارضت الكنيسة الرومانية الكاثوليكية باستمرار تشريع زواج المثليين بالبلاد. ناقش الكونغرس الوطني للبرازيل إضفاء الشرعية لمدة 10 سنوات، ومتل هيدي الزيجات المدنية تعتبر حاليًا قانونية بس بريو غراندي دو سول. تمت صياغة مشروع القانون الأصلي من قبل عمدة ساو باولو السابق، مارتا سوبليسي. وهيدا التشريع المقترح، بعد تعديله، صار هلأ بإيد روبرتو جيفرسون. بيأمل المحتجين بجمع عريضة من 1.2 مليون توقيع لتقديمها للكونغرس الوطني بتشرين التاني.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and has consistently opposed the Roman Catholic Church's legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil discussed the legalization of same-sex marriage for ten years, and civil unions are currently legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. This proposed legislation, after being amended, was then presented by Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to be presented to the National Congress in October.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: البرازيل هي أكبر دولة كاثوليكية رومانية على وجه الأرض، وعارضت الكنيسة الرومانية الكاثوليكية باستمرار تشريع زواج المثليين بالبلاد. ناقش الكونغرس الوطني للبرازيل إضفاء الشرعية لمدة 10 سنوات، ومتل هيدي الزيجات المدنية تعتبر حاليًا قانونية بس بريو غراندي دو سول. تمت صياغة مشروع القانون الأصلي من قبل عمدة ساو باولو السابق، مارتا سوبليسي. وهيدا التشريع المقترح، بعد تعديله، صار هلأ بإيد روبرتو جيفرسون. بيأمل المحتجين بجمع عريضة من 1.2 مليون توقيع لتقديمها للكونغرس الوطني بتشرين التاني.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and has consistently opposed the Roman Catholic Church's legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil discussed the legalization of same-sex marriage for ten years, and civil unions are currently legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. This proposed legislation, after being amended, was then presented by Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to be presented to the National Congress in October.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: بعد خمس دقايق من العرض بلَّشت الرياح تطلع، وبعد دقيقة تقريباً، وصلت سرعة الرياح لـ 70 كم / ساعة... ومن بعدها بلَّش المطر بغزارة وبقوة كتير لدرجة أنه يضرب بشرتك متل الإبرة، ثومن بعدها بينزل البرد من السما، وبحسوا الناس بالرعب وببلشوا يصرخوا ويدعسوا على بعضهم البعض. قال أرماند فيرساتشي، فقدت أختي وصديقتها، وبطريقي كان في شخصان معاقان على كرسي متحرك، كانوا الناس عم ينطوا من فوقهم ويدفعونهم.
mt: 5 minutes after the show started, the wind picked up, and about a minute later, the wind speed reached 70 km/h... and then the rain came down in buckets and with great force, so hard it felt like needles, then the cold came down from the sky, and people were scared and screaming and hitting each other. Armand Versace said his sister and her friend were lost, and two disabled people in wheelchairs were being pushed over by people.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: وبقولوا خبرا الأرصاد إنّو العاصفة، يلّي موجودة على بعد حوالي 645 ميل أي 1040 كم غرب جزر الراس الأخضر، من المرجح أنّو تتبدد قبل ما تهدد أي مناطق برية. فريد حاليًا بتبلغ سرعته 105 أميال بالساعة (165 كم / ساعة) وبيتجه نحو الشمال الغربي. فريد هو أقوى إعصار استوائي تسجّل لحد هلأ بجنوب وشرق المحيط الأطلسي من وقت اختراع تصوير الأقمار الصناعية، وتالت أكبر إعصار تسجّل من الشرق بزاوية 35 درجة.
mt: The storm, currently about 645 miles (1,040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is expected to dissipate before threatening any land areas. Currently moving at 105 mph (165 km/h), Fred is heading northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone on record in the southern and eastern Atlantic Ocean since satellite imagery began, and the third strongest on record from the east at 35 degrees.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: بيشتغل معيار الــ 802.11 n على الترددات 2.4 جيغا هرتز و 5.0 جيغا هرتز. وهيدا بيمسحلها تكون متطابقة مع التعديلات 802.11a و802.11b و802.11g، بشرط تحتوي المحطة الأساسية على أجهزة راديو مزدوجة. سرعات 802.11n أسرع بكتير من يلّي قبلها مع أقصى سرعة نظرية بتوصل لـ 600 ميجابت / ثانية.
mt: 802.11n operates on the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands. This is compatible with the 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g amendments, provided the base station has dual radio capability. 802.11n is faster than its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum speed of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: وكان من المقرر أن يسبح الرابح بالميدالية الدهبية الأولمبية بسباقين 100 متر و 200 متر سباحة حرة وتلات سباقات بدورة ألعاب الكومن وَلث، بس بسبب شكواه، صارت لياقته موضع شك. ما قد ياخد الأدوية اللازمة للتغلب على آلامه فتم منعهم من المشاركة بالألعاب.
mt: 100 and 200 meter freestyle swimmer and three time Commonwealth Games gold medalist was due to compete in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle and three events at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaint, his fitness was questioned. What may have been the necessary drugs to overcome his pain were banned from competing.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: أظهرت خريطة الزلازل الدولية للمسح الجيولوجي بالولايات المتحدة عدم وجود زلازل بأيسلندا الأسبوع الماضي. كمان أبلغ مكتب الأرصاد الجوية الآيسلندي عن عدم وجود نشاط زلزال بمنطقة هيكلا خلال الـ 48 ساعة الماضية. نشاط الزلزال الكبير يلّي أدى لتغيير المرحلة بــ 10 آذار صار على الجانب الشمالي الشرقي من قمة البركان كالديرا. تم الإبلاغ عن غيوم سودا ما الها علاقة بأي نشاط بركاني بقاعدة الجبل. عملت الغيوم هلع بسبب شكلها يلّي دل على امكانية أن يصير انفجار بركاني.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no seismic activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The major earthquake activity shifted the phase of the 10 March to the northeast of the peak of the caldera. Dark clouds were reported to have no relation to any volcanic activity at the base of the mountain. The clouds were formed due to their shape which indicates the possibility of a volcanic eruption.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: أطلقت المركبة المدارية القمرية غير المأهولة Chandrayaan-1 مسبار تأثير القمر (MIP) اللي انطلق عبر سطح القمر بسرعة 1.5 كيلومتر بالثانية (3000 ميل بالساعة)، ونجح بالهبوط بالقرب من القطب الجنوبي للقمر. بالإضافة لحمله تلات أدوات علمية مهمة، حمل المسبار القمري كمان صورة العلم الوطني الهندي مرسوم من كل الجهات.
mt: The lunar orbiter and uncrewed moon lander Chandrayaan-1 successfully deployed its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which impacted the moon's surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour), near the moon's south pole. In addition to carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar lander also carried an image of the Indian national flag, drawn from all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: تم الإبلاغ عن أولى حالات الإصابة بالمرض هيدا الموسم بأواخر تموز. الخنازير مصابة بهيدا المرض يلي بعدين بينتقل للإنسان عن طريق البرغش. دفع تفشي المرض، الحكومة الهندية لأخد تدابير متل نشر صيادين الخنازير بالمناطق المتضررة بشكل خطير، وبتوزيع الآلاف من برادي البرغش ورش المبيدات. وعدت الحكومة كمان بعدة ملايين من قوارير لقاح التهاب الدماغ، الشي اللي رح يساعد بإعداد الوكالات الصحية للسنة الجاي. تأجلت خطط تسليم اللقاحات للمناطق الأكتر تضررًا تاريخيًا هيدي السنة بسبب نقص التمويل وانخفاض الأولوية بالنسبة للأمراض التانية.
mt: 2010 was the first year that the disease was reported in late July. Pigs infected with this disease then spread to humans through mosquitoes. The spread of the disease prompted the Indian government to take measures such as distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying pesticides. The government also distributed millions of doses of encephalitis vaccine, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Delivery plans for the vaccine to the most affected areas this year were delayed due to funding shortages and lower priority for other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: تم تمرير التعديل المقترح بالسابق على المجلسين سنة 2011. صار في تغيير بهيدي الجلسة التشريعية بس تم حذف الجملة التانية من قبل مجلس النواب بالأول ومن بعدها أقرها مجلس الشيوخ بشكل مشابه يوم الاثنين. ممكن يؤدي فشل الجملة التانية، يلّي بتقترح حظر الزيجات المدنية من نفس الجنس، لفتح الباب قدّام النقابات المدنية بالمستقبل. بعد هيدي العملية، رح يتم مراجعة HJR-3 مرة تانية من قبل الهيئة التشريعية المنتخبة التالية بـ 2015 أو 2016 للبقاء بالعملية
mt: 2011 proposed amendment was passed by both houses. In a change during the current legislative session, the second sentence was deleted by the House first and then passed by the Senate in a similar fashion on Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which would have proposed a ban on same-sex marriages, could open the door to civil unions in the future. After the process, the HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in 2015 or 2016 to remain in the process
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: أوراق بنما هو مصطلح شامل لحوالي عشرة ملايين وثيقة من شركة المحاماة البنمية موساك فونسيكا، تم تسريبها للصحافة بربيع سنة 2016. وبيّنت الوثايق أنّو أربعتعش بنك ساعدوا العملا الأغنيا تيخفوا مليارات الدولارات من ثرواتهم لتجنب الضرايب والقوانين التانية. ذكرت صحيفة الجارديان البريطانية أن بنك دويتشه مسيطر تقريباً على تلت 1200 شركة وهمية تُستعمل لتحقيق هيدا الشي. كانت في احتجاجات بكل أنحاء العالم والكتير من المحاكمات الجنائية واستقال قادة حكومتي آيسلندا وباكستان.
mt: The Panama Papers is the name given to a collection of 11.5 million confidential documents released by the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which were leaked to the media in April 2016. The documents showed that fourteen major banks helped wealthy clients evade taxes and laws. The British newspaper The Guardian reported that Deutsche Bank had control of over 1,200 shell companies used to achieve this. There were protests in every corner of the world and criminal trials and resignations of government leaders in Iceland and Pakistan.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: الحوادث الجوية شائعة بإيران، يلّي عندها أسطول قديم ما بتم صيانته بشكل منيح للعمليات المدنية والعسكرية. فرضت العقوبات الدولية أنه ممنوع شراية طيارات جديدة. ببداية هيدا الأسبوع، سبب تحطم مروحية تابعة للشرطة مقتل تلات أشخاص وإصابة تلاتة تانيين. وشهدت إيران الشهر الماضي أسوأ كارثة جوية إلها من سنين لما تحطمت طيارة ركاب كانت متوجهة لأرمينيا، الشي اللي أدى لمقتل 168 راكب كانوا على متنها. وبالشهر نفسه، اجتاحت طيارة ركاب تانية مدرج بمشهد واصطدمت بحيط، يلّي أدى لمقتل سبعتعشر شخص.
mt: Air accidents are common in Iran, where it has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained for both civilian and military operations. International sanctions have prohibited the purchase of new aircraft. Last week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and injured three others. Last month, Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years when a passenger jet bound for Armenia crashed, killing all 168 people on board. The same month, a passenger jet overshot a runway and crashed into a building, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: قدمت مجموعة دراسة العراق اليوم تقريرها الساعة 12.00 بتوقيت جرينتش. وبيحذر من أنه ما حدا بيقدر يضمن أن أي إجراء بالعراق بهيدي المرحلة رح يوقف الحرب الطائفية، أو العنف المتزايد، أو اللجوء للفوضى. ببلّش التقرير بدعوة لإجراء نقاش مفتوح وتشكيل إجماع بالولايات المتحدة بخصوص السياسة تجاه الشرق الأوسط. بينتقد التقرير بشدة كل جانب تقريبًا من جوانب السياسة الحالية للسلطة التنفيذية تجاه العراق وبشجع على تغيير فوري بالاتجاه. من بين الـ78 توصية تبعها الأولى هي أن لازم أخد مبادرة دبلوماسية جديدة قبل نهاية هيدي السنة لتأمين حدود العراق ضد التدخلات العدائية وإعادة العلاقات الدبلوماسية مع جيرانه.
mt: 12:00 GMT, a study group from Iraq Today submitted its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this stage will stop the sectarian war, or the increasing violence, or the chaos. The report criticizes almost every aspect of the current executive policy towards Iraq and urges an immediate change in direction. Among the 78 recommendations, the first is that a new diplomatic initiative must be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "بحسب وكالة أنسا، ""الشرطة حسّت بقلق بسبب ضربات عالية المستوى ممكن تولّع حرب شاملة على الخلافة. قالت الشرطة إنو لو بيكولو مسؤول لإنو كان الإيد اليمين لبروفنزانو بباليرمو وخبرتو الكبيرة ربحتوا إحترام الجيل الأكبر سناً من الرؤساء هني وعم يتبعوا سياسة بروفنزانو المتمثلة بالحفاظ على أدنى مستوى ممكن مع تعزيز شبكة الطاقة عندن. تم كبح جماح هودي الرؤسا من قبل بروفينزانو لمّا حطّ حد للحرب يلّي قادتها رينا ضد الدولة يلّي أودت بحياة صليبي المافيا جيوفاني فالكون وباولو بورسيلينو بسنة 1992"""
mt: "According to Ansa, the police were concerned about high-level blows that could lead to a civil war on the succession. The police said that if a leader were to be elected, the right hand of Provenzano in Palermo and the big news won the respect of the older generation of presidents and followed Provenzano's policy of maintaining the lowest possible level with the strengthening of the energy network. Provenzano's presidents were curbed when the war led by Rina against the state led to the death of Sicilian Mafia boss Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992"
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: توفى لاعب الجودو الياباني هيتوشي سايتو الفائز بميداليتين ذهبيتين أولمبيين بعمر 54 سنة. تم الإعلان عن سبب الوفاة على أنّو بسبب سرطان القناة الصفراوية بالكبد. وتوفى بأوساكا يوم التلاتا. بالإضافة لبطل أولمبي وعالمي سابق، كان سايتو رئيس لجنة التدريب باتحاد الجودو الياباني بوقت وفاته.
mt: 54-year-old judo player Hitoshi Saito, an Olympic gold medalist, died of bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. In addition to being a former Olympic and world champion, Saito was the chairman of the training committee of the Japan Judo Federation at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: خلال رحلته، واجه إيواساكي مشاكل عدة مرات. سرقوه القراصنة، وهاجمه كلب مسعور بالتبت، وهرب من الزواج بنيبال واعتقل بالهند.
mt: During his journey, he was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, and escaped a marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: فقد جيانكارلو فيسيكيلا السيطرة على سيارته وخلص السباق بعد وقت قصير من البداية. زميله بالفريق فرناندو ألونسو بالصدارة بمعظم السباق، بس أنهى السباق مباشرة بعد محطة توقفه، يمكن بسبب دولاب الأمامي اليمين محطوط بشكل سيء. خلّص مايكل شوماخر السبق بعد ألونسو بوقت قليل، بسبب ضرر التعليق بالمعارك العديدة خلال السباق.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and crashed out shortly after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was leading most of the race, but he finished the race directly after his pit stop, due to a badly mounted right front wing. Michael Schumacher finished the race after Alonso in a short time, due to damage from multiple collisions during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: بالأشهر التلاتة الماضيين، تم الإفراج عن أكتر من 80 معتقل من منشأة Central Booking بدون توجيه تهم رسمية لإلهم. بنيسان هيدي السنة، أصدر القاضي جلين أمر مؤقت بالحبس المؤقت ضد المنشأة لفرض إطلاق سراح المحتجزين بعد أكتر من 24 ساعة من قبولهم ويلّي ما حصلوا على جلسة استماع من قبل مفوض المحكمة. بحال منح الكفالة على التهم يّلي وجّها الضابط يلّي قام بالاعتقال، بقوم المفوض بتحديدها بيضفي عليها الطابع الرسمي، وبتم تتبع الحالة عبر ادخال الرسوم بنظام الكمبيوتر تبع الولاية. كمان بتحدد جلسة الاستماع، تاريخ حق المشتبه فيه بمحاكمة سريعة.
mt: 80 or more detainees have been released from Central Booking in the last three months without formal charges being filed against them. In January, Judge Glenn issued a temporary restraining order against the facility to compel the release of the detainees after more than 24 hours of their being held, and they were given a hearing before the court. If bail is granted on the charges, the officer who arrested them is then identified and the official stamp is placed on them, and the case is tracked through the state computer system by entering the charges. A hearing date is also set, giving the suspect a speedy trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: وقال لودين كمان إنو المسؤولين قرروا إلغاء جولة الإعادة لإنقاذ الأفغان من المصاريف والمخاطر الأمنية لانتخابات تانية. قال دبلوماسيون إنهم لاقوا ما يكفي من الغموض بالدستور الأفغاني لتقرير أن جولة الإعادة غير ضرورية. بيتناقض هيدا مع تقارير سابقة أفادت بإنو إلغاء جولة الإعادة ممكن يتعارض مع الدستور.
mt: The official said the decision to cancel the runoff was made to save Afghanis money and security risks for another election. Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine that a runoff was not necessary. This contradicts earlier reports that canceling the runoff could violate the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: وقال لودين كمان إنو المسؤولين قرروا إلغاء جولة الإعادة لإنقاذ الأفغان من المصاريف والمخاطر الأمنية لانتخابات تانية. قال دبلوماسيون إنهم لاقوا ما يكفي من الغموض بالدستور الأفغاني لتقرير أن جولة الإعادة غير ضرورية. بيتناقض هيدا مع تقارير سابقة أفادت بإنو إلغاء جولة الإعادة ممكن يتعارض مع الدستور.
mt: The official said the decision to cancel the runoff was made to save Afghanis money and security risks for another election. Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine that a runoff was not necessary. This contradicts earlier reports that canceling the runoff could violate the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "من وقت استقلال باكستان عن الحكم البريطاني سنة 1947، عيّن الرئيس الباكستاني ""وكلا سياسيين"" لحكم المناطق القبلية وسيطرو سيطرة شبه كاملة على المناطق. هودي العملا هنّي المسؤولين عن تقديم الخدمات الحكومية والقضائية بموجب المادة 247 من الدستور الباكستاني."
mt: "Since Pakistan's independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed "civilian administrators" to govern the tribal areas and exercised near-total control over the region. These officials are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: تلقى الفيلم، يلّي ظهر فيه رايان جوسلينج وإيما ستون، ترشيحات من كل التصنيفات الرئيسية. تم تسمية جوسلينج وستون لأفضل ممثل وممثلة على التوالي. بتشمل الترشيحات التانية أفضل صورة وأفضل مخرج وأفضل تصوير سينمائي وأفضل تصميم أزياء وأفضل تحرير فيلم وأفضل درجة أصلية وأفضل تصميم الإنتاج وأفضل تحرير الصوت وخلط الصوت وأفضل سيناريو أصلي. تلقت كل من أغنية (Audition (The Fools Who Dream وأغنية (City of Stars) من فيلم La la land ترشيحات لأفضل أغنية أصلية. وتلقى استوديو ليونزغايت 26 ترشيح أكتر من أي ستوديو تاني.
mt: The film, which stars Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, Best Original Screenplay. Both "Audition (The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars" from La la land were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: ذكرت أن آيش كاي كمان إنو محطة كاشيوازاكي كاريوا للطاقة النووية بمحافظة نيغاتا كانت شغالة بشكل طبيعي. شركة هوكوريكو للطاقة الكهربائية ما بلَّغت عن أي آثار للزلزال وأنه تم تسكير المفاعلين رقم 1 و 2 بمحطة Shika للطاقة النووية. ذكروا أن 9400 بيت تقريباً بالمنطقة بدون مي و100 بيت تقريباً بدون كهربا. تضررت شوية طرق، ووقفت خدمة السكك الحديدية بالمناطق المتضررة، وبعدو مطار نوتو بمحافظة إيشيكاوا مسكر.
mt: Ishikawa Prefecture's Kashiwazaki-Kariwa Nuclear Power Plant was operating normally, according to the utility Hokuriku Electric Power Company. The utility said there were no effects from the earthquake and that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Shika Nuclear Power Plant were shut down. About 9,400 households were without water and about 100 without electricity. Some roads were damaged, and train service was suspended in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture was closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: ورح تتشير الوثيقة بحسب التسريبات للخلاف الحدودي يلّي بتريده فلسطين على أساس الحدود قبل حرب سنة 1967. ومن الموضوعات التانية اللي تمت تغطيتا بحسب ما ورد، حالة القدس المستقبلية المقدسة لدى الشعبين وقضية وادي الأردن. بتطالب إسرائيل بوجود عسكري مستمر بالوادي لمدة عشر سنين بمجرد توقيع اتفاق بينما بتوافق السلطة الفلسطينية على ترك هيدا الوجود لمدة خمس سنين بس.
mt: The document reportedly addresses the border dispute, which Palestinians want to be based on the borders before the 1967 war. Other issues covered according to the leaks include the future status of Jerusalem as a holy city for both peoples and the Jordan River. Israel demands a continuous military presence in the river for ten years after signing an agreement, while the Palestinian Authority agrees to leave this presence for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "انولد ما بهونغ كونغ، ودرس بجامعة نيويورك وبكلية الحقوق بجامعة هارفارد، وحصل مرة على إقامة أمريكية دائمة""البطاقة الخضرا"". ألمح هسيه خلال الانتخابات إلى أن ما ممكن يهرب من البلاد بأوقات الأزمات. قال هسيه كمان أن الطابع الجذاب كان شكل أكتر من مضمون. على الرغم من هيدي الاتهامات، ربح ما بسهولة على منصة بتدعي لتوثيق العلاقات مع البر الرئيسي الصيني."
mt: "Born in Hong Kong, educated at New York University and Harvard Law School, he once held a permanent U.S. "green card." He hinted during the campaign that he could flee the country during crises. He also said his attractive appearance was more than just a campaign slogan. Despite the allegations, he won easily on a platform to document relations with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: بعد ما أصبح واضح أن الكتير من العائلات كانت تطلب المساعدة القانونية لمكافحة عمليات الإخلاء، عُقد اجتماع بـ20 آذار بمركز قانون المجتمع بالخليج الشرقي لضحايا عملية احتيال الإسكان. لما بلش المستأجرين بمشاركة اللي صار معهم عرفت أغلب العيل فجأة إنو كارولين ويلسون من OHA (الاتحاد المتفوح للتلفونات النقالة) سرقت ودائع التأمين الخاصة فيهم، وهربت من المدينة. ممكن يكون في 40 تانية تقريباً وأكت من المستأجرين بــ لوكورد غاردنز رح يقوموا بالاخلاء، وهيدا بعد ما عرفوا أنّو شرطة هيئة الاسكان باكلاند (OHA) عم تحقق كمام بممتلكات الاسكان العام التانية بأوكلاند يلّي من المرجح إنها تكون متورطة بعملية إحتيال الاسكان.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the Community Law Center in the Eastern Gulf for victims of the housing scam. After the tenants were informed of what happened to them, most of the families suddenly realized that Carol Wilson of OHA (the Open Handset Alliance) had stolen their insurance deposits, and fled the city. It is likely that in about 40 minutes, the tenants of Lockwood Gardens will be evicted, after they learned that the Oakland Housing Authority Police (OHA) is investigating the second public housing property in Oakland, which is likely to be involved in the housing scam.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: بعد السباق، بقي كيسيلوفسكي قائد بطولة السائقين بـ 2250 نقطة. جونسون بالمركز التاني برصيد 2243 وفرق سبع نقط. بالمركز التالت، هاملين خلفهم بعشرين نقطة، بس متقدم خمس نقاط عن بوير. احتلوا كاهني وتروكس جونيور المركز الخامس والسادس على التوالي برصيد 2220 و2207 نقطة. مع بقاء أربع سباقات بالموسم، عم يحتلوا السائقين ستيوارت وجوردون وكينسيث وهارفيك المراكز العشرة الأولى بالبطولة.
mt: After the race, Kovalainen led the drivers' championship with 2250 points. Johnson was second with 2243 and seven points behind. Hamlin was third with 2220, five points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex Jr. were fifth and sixth with 2220 and 2207 points respectively. With four races remaining in the season, the drivers' championship standings were completed by Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick in positions seven through ten.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: ومن المرجح إنو هيدي هي المرة الخامسة بالتاريخ اللي بيلاحظ فيها الناس وقوع مادة من المريخ تم تأكيدها كيمائيا على الأرض. من بين 24 ألف نيزك معروف وقع على الأرض تقريباً، تم التحقق من حوالي 34 بس على إنن من المريخ. خمستعش من هيدي الصخور هي بسبب تساقط النيزك بتموز السنة الماضية. انباعت بعض الصخور، النادرة جدًا على الأرض، من 11000 دولار أمريكي لـ22500 دولار أمريكي للأونصة، يعني حوالي عشر أضعاف تكلفة الدهب.
mt: 24,000 known meteorites have fallen on Earth, and about 34 of them have been confirmed to be Martian. Five of the rocks are from the meteorite that fell in August 2012. Some of the rare rocks on Earth have sold for between $11,000 and$22,500 per ounce, or about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: كان المفروض إنو يحل شوماخر اللي اعتزل سنة 2006 بعد فوزو ببطولة الفورمولا 1 سبع مرات، محل المصاب فيليبي ماسا. تعرض البرازيلي لإصابة خطيرة براسو بعد حادث تحطم بسباق الجايزة الهنغارية الكبرى 2009. ومن المقرر إنو تضهر ماسا لبقية موسم 2009 على الأقل.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Michael Schumacher was supposed to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury in a crash at the Hungarian Grand Prix 2009. Massa is expected to return to the 2009 season at least.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

mt: 2006 Formula One champion Michael Schumacher was supposed to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury in a crash at the Hungarian Grand Prix 2009. Massa is expected to return to the 2009 season at least.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: لحد اليوم كانت شركة إيه أو أل (AOL) قادرة على تحريك وتطوير سوق الرسايل الفورية بوتيرتها الخاصة، نظرًا لاستعمالها على نطاق واسع بقلب الولايات المتحدة. بوجود هيك ترتيب ممكن تنتهي هالحرية. عدد مستخدمي موقع Yahoo! وخدمات Microsoft مجتمعة رح تنافس عدد عملاء AOL.
mt: To date, AOL has been able to move and develop the instant messaging market with its own service, due to its widespread use in the heart of the United States. With this new order, this freedom may end. The number of users of the Yahoo! site and Microsoft services combined will not compete with AOL's customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: انفجرت سيارة مفخخة بمقر الشرطة بمدينة غازي عنتاب بتركيا امبارح الصبح، يلّي سبب مقتل ضابطي شرطة وإصابة أكتر من عشرين تانيين. وقال مكتب المحافظ إنّو تسعطش من المصابين كانوا من ضباط الشرطة. قالت الشرطة إنها بتشتبه بمسؤولية أحد مقاتلي داعش المزعومين عن الهجوم.
mt: A car bomb exploded at a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty others. The governor's office said nine of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected the attack was carried out by suspected ISIS militants.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: ربح حاكم ولاية ماساتشوستس السابق ميت رومني بالانتخابات التمهيدية الرئاسية للحزب الجمهوري بفلوريدا يوم التلاتا بأكتر من 46 بالمية من الأصوات. وحل نيوت جينجريتش رئيس مجلس النواب الأمريكي السابق بالمرتبة التانية بنسبة 32٪. كولاية عندها كل شي، منحت فلوريدا كل مندوبيها الخمسين لرومني، يلّي خلاه يصير المرشح الأول بتسمية الحزب الجمهوري.
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote.  Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.  Florida, which has all the delegates at stake, gave all 50 of its delegates to Romney, making him the party's front-runner.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "رئيس مجلس النواب السابق نيوت جينجريتش وحاكم تكساس ريك بيري وعضوة الكونجرس ميشيل باخمان احتلوا المركز الرابع والخامس والسادس على التوالي. بعد ظهور النتايج ، مدح غينغريتش بسانتوروم، بس وجه كلمات قاسية لرومني، يلّي بث إعلانات حملته السلبية بولاية أيوا ضد غينغريتش. صرّح بيري إنو رح ""يرجع على تكساس لتقييم نتايج المؤتمر الحزبي الليلة، وتحديد إذا في طريق للتقدم بهيدا السباق""، بس قال لاحقًا إنو رح يستمر بالسباق والمنافسة بإنتخابات 21 كانون التاني التمهيدية بساوث كارولاينا. قررت باخمان، يلّي ربحت بانتخابات أميس سترو بحزيران، إنهاء حملتها."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich and Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann came in fourth, fifth and sixth, respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but then launched a blistering attack on Romney, who had aired negative ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas to assess the results of the Republican caucuses tonight and determine whether to move forward in the primary race," but later said he would continue to compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in June, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "بيوصف موقع المحطة على شبكة الإنترنت العرض بأنّو ""مسرح إذاعي مدرسي قديم مع دوران جديد وشائن غريب الأطوار!"" بأيامه الأولى، تم عرض البرنامج بس على موقع راديو طويل المدى على الإنترت TogiNet Radio، وهو موقع بيركز على الراديو الحواري. بأواخر سنة 2015، أنشأت TogiNet راديو AstroNet كمحطة فرعية. كان العرض بالأصل بضم ممثلين صوتيين هواة، محليين بشرق تكساس."
mt: "The site's website describes the show as a "dusty old school radio drama with a new spin and a strange, twisted twist!" In its early days, the program was aired on TogiNet Radio's longwave website, a site that focuses on radio drama. In late 2015, TogiNet launched AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: وصل مهاجمو مومباي عبر قارب بــ 26 تشرين التاني 2008، حاملين معهم قنابل يدوية وأسلحة آلية وضربوا أهداف متعددة بما فيها محطة سكة حديد شاتراباتي شيفاجي المزدحمة واوتيل تاج محل الشهير. ساعد الاستطلاع وجمع المعلومات يلّي عمله ديفيد هيدلي تمكين العملية من قبل 10 مسلحين من الجماعة الباكستانية المسلحة لشكر طيبة. شكَّل هيدا الهجوم ضغط كبير على العلاقات بين الهند وباكستان.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived by boat, carrying hand grenades and automatic weapons, and struck multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. Intelligence and information gathering by David Headley enabled the operation by 10 militants from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. This attack put great pressure on the relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "نتيجة نادال وجهاً لوجه ضد اللاعب الكندي هي 7-2. خسر من فترة قريبة قدّام راونيتش ببطولة بريسبان المفتوحة. حصل نادال على 88٪ من النقط الصافية بالمباراة وربح بـ 76 نقطة بالإرسال الأول. بعد المباراة، ""كينج أوف كلاي"" قال، ""أنا متحمس للرجوع للجولات النهائية لأهم حدث أنا هون لمحاولة الربح."""
mt: 7-2 score in a tiebreak against the Canadian player. Recently lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the points in the match and won 76 points in the first set. After the match, "King of Clay" said, "I'm excited to return to the finals of the most important event I've ever played to try to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: "أعلنت ""نايكد نيوز"" السبوع الماضي إنا رح تزيد بشكل كبير من تفويضها اللغوي الدولي للتقارير الإخبارية بأربع عمليات بث جديدة. بتقدم المنظمة العالمية بالفعل تقارير باللغتين الإنجليزية واليابانية، وبتطلق برامج باللغة الإسبانية والإيطالية والكورية للتلفزيون والويب والأجهزة المحمولة."
mt: "Last week, "Naked News" announced it would greatly increase its international newsgathering operations with four new broadcast operations. The organization already produces reports in both English and Japanese, and launches programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, web and mobile devices."
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "بعد حدث الأربعاء، تنافس كاربانيدو بسباقين منفردين بالبطولة. أول سباق لالها كان سباق التعرج، يلّي ربحت فيه جايزة ""Did Not Finish"" بأول جولة لالها. 36 من أصل 116 متنافس حصلوا على نفس النتيجة بهيدا السباق. وسباقها التاني، سباق التعرج العملاق، احتلت فيه المركز العاشر بمجموعة الجلوس للسيدات مع وقت تنفيذ مشترك يلّي هو 4:41.30 دقيقة، أبطأ بـ2:11.60 دقيقة من صاحبة المركز الأول النمساوية كلوديا لوش، وأبطأ بـ1:09:02 دقيقة من جيونجي داني المجرية يلّي احتلن المركز التاسع. فشلت أربعة متزلجات بمجموعة جلوس السيدات بإنهاء جولاتهن، وفشلت 45 من إجمالي 117 متزلجة بسباق التعرج العملاق من تحقيق أعلى المراتب بالسباق."
mt: "After Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races in the championship. The first race for her was the downhill, which she won the "Did Not Finish" award in the first round of the downhill. 36 of the 116 competitors received the same result in this race. Her second race, the giant slalom, she finished tenth in the sitting women's group with a shared execution time of 4:41.30 minutes, slower by 2:11.60 minutes than the first-place Austrian Claudia Lösch, and slower by 1:09:02 minutes than the ninth-place Hungarian Jóni Dáni, who both finished in the sitting women's group. Four skiers in the sitting women's group failed to complete their rounds, and 45 of the 117 skiers in the giant slalom failed to achieve the highest rankings in the race."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: علّق الاتحاد الوطني لكرة السلة بالولايات المتحدة يوم الأربعا موسمو الاحترافي لكرة السلة بسبب مخاوف بشأن كوفيد 19. إجا قرار الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين بعد ما أجرَ الاعب يوتا جاز إختبار لفيروسCOVID-19 وكانت النتيجة إيجابية.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its 2019–20 season on Wednesday, March 11, after Utah Jazz player Rudy Gobert tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: وحصل على جايزة أفضل لاعب لليوم أليكس أوفشكين لاعب فريق واشنطن كابيتالز. كان عنده هدفين وتعاون بـ2 بفوز واشنطن بنتيجة 5-3 على أتلانتا ثراشرز. شكلت التمريرة الحاسمة الأولى لأوفشكين الليلة هدف الربح بالمباراة اللي حققو اللاعب الصاعد نيكلاس باكستروم. كان هدفه التاني بهيدي الليلة هو رقم 60 له بهيدا الموسم، ليصير أول لاعب بيسجل 60 هدف أو أكتر بموسم واحد من 1995-1996، بس حققوا يارومير جاغر وماريو ليميو هيدا الإنجاز.
mt: Alex Ovechkin, a Washington Capitals forward, was named the NHL's first star of the day. He had two goals and two assists in a 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's assist on the game-winning goal was the first of the night for the rookie Nicklas Backstrom. His second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-1996, but he did it in fewer games than Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux did that.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "تم تأميم بنك نورثرن روك بسنة 2008 بعد الكشف عن أن الشركة تلقت دعم طارئ من حكومة المملكة المتحدة. احتاجت شركة نورثرن روك للدعم بسبب تعرضها خلال أزمة الرهن العقاري سنة 2007. قدمت مجموعة سير ريتشارد برانسون عرض للبنك انرفض قبل تأميم البنك. سنة 2010، بوقت تأميمه، تم فصل بنك Northern Rock plc الحالي عن ""البنك السيئ""، Northern Rock (إدارة الأصول). اشترت شركة فيرجن ""الأصول المربحة"" لورثن روك بس بدون شركة إدارة الأصول."
mt: 2008, Northern Rock was nationalised after the bank was found to have received emergency support from the British government. Northern Rock needed support because of its exposure during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. Richard Branson's Virgin Group made an offer for the bank which was rejected before the bank was nationalised. In 2010, at the time of nationalisation, the current Northern Rock plc was separated from the "bad bank", Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin bought the "profitable" assets of Northern Rock without the bad bank.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: قرار السيد رود بالتوقيع على اتفاقية كيوتو للمناخ بيعزل الولايات المتحدة، واللي رح تكون هلق الدولة المتقدمة الوحيدة اللي مش رح تصادق على الاتفاقية. رفضت الحكومة الأسترالية المعتدلة السابقة التصديق على بروتوكول كيوتو، وقالت إنها رح تضر بالاقتصاد بسبب اعتمادها الكبير على صادرات الفحم، بينما دول متل الهند والصين مش ملتزمين بأهداف الانبعاثات.
mt: President Bush's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol on climate change isolates the United States, the only advanced country to reject the treaty. The previous Australian government, a moderate, refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol, saying it would harm the economy because of its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries such as India and China are not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: كان لازم حراس الغابات بتجربة مكافحة الآفات التكميلية يشرفو عن قرب على عمال الرش خلال مراقبة التجربة وتقييم فعاليتها. بشراكة بين NPWS و Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc، تم تعيين متطوعين مؤهلين، ببرنامج الصيد التابع لجمعية الرماة الرياضيين. بحسب ما قاله ميك أوفلين، المدير المكلف بالحفاظ على الحديقة والتراث مع NPWS، إن الرماة الأربعة يلّي تم اختيارهم لعملية إطلاق النار الأولى تلقوا تعليمات شاملة بخصوص السلامة والتدريب.
mt: Forest rangers had to closely monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of the experiment while workers sprayed. In partnership with the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were appointed, through the association's shooting program. According to Mick O'Farrell, NPWS manager of conservation and heritage, the four shooters were selected for the first shooting operation to receive general safety instructions and training.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "بحسب هيدي الحفرية، هيدا بيعني أن الانقسام أبكر بكتير مما توقعه الأدلة الجزئية. قال برهاين أصفاو وهو باحث بخدمة أبحاث الوادي المتصدع بأثيوبيا والمؤلف المشارك بالدراسة: ""إن هيدا بيعني أنه لازم ترجيع كل شي."""
mt: "According to the drilling, this means that the rift is opening faster than previously thought. Co-author Brenna Auffenberg, a researcher with the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, said: "This means that everything needs to be rethought."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: بالعرض التقديمي الرئيسي يوم الخميس لمعرض طوكيو للألعاب، كشف ساتارو ايواتا رئيس نينتيندو عن تصميم وحدة التحكم للوحة المفاتيح الجديدة لشركة نينتيندو ريفولوشن. يستعمل جهاز التحكم اللي بيشبه جهاز التحكم عن بعد بالتلفزيون، مستشعرين محطوطين حد تلفزيون المستخدم لتثليث موقعو بالفضاء الثلاثي الأبعاد. وهيدا بيسمح للاعبين يتحكموا بالإجراءات والحركات ألعاب الفيديو عن طريق تحريك الجهاز بالهوا.
mt: At the main press conference on Thursday at the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata revealed the design of the new controller for the Nintendo Revolution's keyboard. The controller, which resembles a remote control for a television, has two built-in sensors that are placed in the same position as the television's screen. This allows players to control the actions and movements of video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: وذكرت وكالة الأنباء الصينية شينخوا بوقت سابق خطف طيارة. أفادت تقارير لاحقة إنو الطيارة تلقت تهديد بوجود قنبلة وتحولت على أفغانستان، ونزلت بقندهار. بتشير التقارير الأولية لإنّو تم تحويل مسار الطيارة لأفغانستان بعد ما مُنعت من الهبوط الاضطراري بأورومكي.
mt: Earlier, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane hijacked. Subsequent reports indicated the plane was diverted to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Urumqi. The initial reports indicated the plane was diverted to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Urumqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "يوم التنين، أعلنت سارة دانيوس السكرتيرة الدايمة للجنة نوبل للأدب بالأكاديمية السويدية خلال برنامج إذاعي على راديو سفيريجيس بالسويد، إنو اللجنة اللي ما قدرت توصل مباشرة لبوب ديلان بخصوص ربحو جايزة نوبل بالأدب لسنة 2016، تخلت عن جهودهل لتوصل إلو. قال دانيوس، ""بالوقت الحالي نحن ما عم نعمل شي. اتصلت وأرسلت رسايل بريد إلكتروني لأقرب مساعديه وتلقيت ردود كتير ودية. هيدا أكيد بيكفي للوقت الحالي."""
mt: On Monday, Sarah Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, announced on a radio program on Swedish Radio Sveriges, that the committee had given up on trying to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016. Danius said, "At this time we are not doing anything. I called and sent e-mails to his closest aides and received very friendly replies. This is certainly enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "رحب الرئيس الأمريكي جورج بوش الابن بالإعلان. ووصف المتحدث باسم بوش، جوردون جوندرو، تعهد كوريا الشمالية بأنه ""خطوة رئيسية نحو هدف تحقيق نزع السلاح النووي يلّي ممكن تحقيقه بشبه الجزيرة الكورية""."""
mt: "President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe described the North Korean pledge as "a significant step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula,""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "سنة 1956، انتقل سانيا للسويد، وين بلَّش بعد تلات سنين الشغل بمكتب البريد السويدي وصار النقاش الرئيسي تبعهم. أنتج أكتر من 1000 طابع للسويد و 28 دولة تانية. يتميز عمله بجودة وتفاصيل معترف فيها لدرجة أنه واحد من ""الأسماء المألوفة"" بين هواة جمع الطوابع. البعض يتخصص بجمع عمله وحده. كان طابعه رقم 1000 هو ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" من تأليف ديفيد كلوكر إهرنسترال بسنة 2000، والمدرج بموسوعة غينيس للأرقام القياسية. كمان كان يشتغل بنقش الأوراق النقدية لعدة بلدان، ومن الأمثلة الحديثة على عمله هي صور رئيس الوزراء على مقدمة الأوراق النقدية الجديدة من فئة 5$ و 100$."
mt: 1956, Sanya moved to Sweden, and after three years of work at the Swedish Post Office, became the main topic of them. He produced more than 1000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is known for its quality and details, to the extent that he is one of the "well-known names" among stamp collectors. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His stamp number 1000 was "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, and is listed in the Guinness Book of Records. He also worked in engraving banknotes for several countries, and recent examples of his work are the images of the Prime Minister on the front of the new banknotes of the 5$ and 100$ denominations.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: تم تسكير 800 ميل من نظام خط أنابيب ألاسكا بعد تسرب آلاف البراميل من النفط الخام بجنوب فيربانكس، ألاسكا. انقطعت الكهربا بعد عمل اختبار روتيني لنظام أمر إطلاق النار يلّي سبب فتح صمامات التنفيس وفيض الزيت الخام حد محطة الضخ Fort Greely 9. سمح فتح الصمامات بإطلاق ضغط للنظام وتدفق البترول على منصة لخزان بيقدر يحتفظ بـ 55 ألف برميل (2,3 مليون غالون). من بعد ضهر الأربعاء، كانت فتحات الخزان بعدها عم تتسرب على الأرجح من التمدد الحراري بقلب الخزان. منطقة احتواء ثانوية موجودة تحت الخازات القادرة على استيعاب 104،500 برميل ما تم ملؤها بعد.
mt: 800 miles of Alaska pipeline was shut down after the release of thousands of barrels of crude oil in south of Fairbanks, Alaska. Power was cut after a routine test of the fire system caused the opening of relief valves and oil flow from the Fort Greely pump station 9. The opening of the valves allowed pressure to build up in the system and crude oil to flow into a storage tank capable of holding 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). After Wednesday, the tank openings were then likely to be leaking due to thermal expansion in the tank's heart. A secondary containment area is located under the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels and was filled after.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: قدّر فيلق المهندسين الأمريكي إنو سقوط الأمطار بحجم 6 إنش ممكن يخترق السدود المتضررة سابقًا. الجناح التاسع، يلّي شهد فيضانات بيصل ارتفاعها لــ 20 قدم خلال إعصار كاترينا، هلاأ صار بيوصل ارتفاعها لعند الخصر لأن تم تجاوز السد المجاور. بينسكب المي فوق السد بعرض 100 قدم.
mt: 6 inches of rain could breach damaged levees, the Ninth Ward, which saw floodwaters rise to chest level during Hurricane Katrina, could see floodwaters rise to waist level if the nearby levee is breached. The water would spread over the levee 100 feet wide.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
