src: الأنهار الجليدية مش مستقرة، بس تتدفق لأسفل الجبل، يلّي بسبب تشققات وتصدعات ممكن تحجبها الجسور الجليد. وممكن تنهار حيطان وأسقف الكهوف الجليدية وممكن تتسكر الشقوق. على حافة الأنهار الجليدية، بتتفكك كتل ضخمة، وبتوقع وممكن تنط أو تتدحرج بعيد عن الحافة.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain, due to cracks and crevasses that can be blocked by bridges. And the walls and ceilings of ice caves can collapse, and cracks can open and slide away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: الأنهار الجليدية مش مستقرة، بس تتدفق لأسفل الجبل، يلّي بسبب تشققات وتصدعات ممكن تحجبها الجسور الجليد. وممكن تنهار حيطان وأسقف الكهوف الجليدية وممكن تتسكر الشقوق. على حافة الأنهار الجليدية، بتتفكك كتل ضخمة، وبتوقع وممكن تنط أو تتدحرج بعيد عن الحافة.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain, due to cracks and crevasses that can be blocked by bridges. And the walls and ceilings of ice caves can collapse, and cracks can open and slide away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: غوما هي مدينة سياحية بجمهورية الكونغو الديمقراطية بأقصى الشرق بالقرب من رواندا. سنة 2002 تدمَّرت غوما بسبب حمممن بركان نيراجونجو يلّي دفنت معظم شوارع المدينة، وخاصة وسط المدينة. بما إنو غوما آمنة بشكل معقول، لازم نفتش عن أي زيارات برات غوما لفهم حالة القتال المستمر بمقاطعة شمال كيفو. تعتبر المدينة كمان قاعدة لتسلق بركان نيراغونغو بجنب بعض من أرخص الترشيدات بجبال الغوريلّا بإفريقيا. ممكن استعمال بودا بودا (موتوسيكل تاكسي) للتجول بغوما. والسعر العادي (المحلي) هو حوالي 500 فرنك كونغولي للرحلة القصيرة.
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in the east near Rwanda. In 2002, Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano, burying most of the city's streets, especially the city center. Because Goma is relatively safe, we need to check for any visits to Goma to understand the ongoing fighting in North Kivu province. The city is also a base for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano at a reasonable price from the gorilla mountains in Africa. You can use a boda boda (motorcycle taxi) to tour Goma. The local price is about 500 Congolese francs for a short trip.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: أي مخيم تحت الحافة يجراند كانيون بحاجة لتصريح. بتقتصر التصاريح على حماية الوادي، وبتصير متوفرة بأول يوم من الشهر، قبل أربع تشهر من شهر البداية. وهيك بصير تصريح بلد الرجعة لأي تاريخ بلّش بأيار متاح بأول كانون التاني. مساحة المناطق الأكتر شعبية، متل Bright Angel Campground المجاورة لـمزرعة فانتوم، صارت مليانة بفضل الحجوزات يلّي تلقتها من اليوم الأول لإستقبال الحجوزات. في عدد محدود من التصاريح المحجوزة لطلبات الحضور المتوفرة على أساس أسبقية الحضور.
mt: Any campsite within the canyon requires a permit. Permits are limited to protecting the canyon, and are available on the first day of the month, four months before the month of the start of the stay. The return permit for any date available on the first of February. The most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground near Phantom Ranch, are booked up due to reservations received on the first day of availability for reservations. A limited number of permits are available on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: بعض الأوتيلات عندها تراث من العصر الذهبي للسكك الحديدية البخارية وخط محيطات؛ قبل الحرب العالمية التانية، بالقرن التستعش أو أوائل القرن العشرين. كانت هيدي الاوتيلات هي المكان يلّي رح يسكنوا فيه الأغنيا والمشاهير، وعادةً بكون عندهن أكل رائع وحياة ليلية. تعتبر التجهيزات القديمة الطراز ونقص أحدث وسايل الراحة جزء من طابعها. بالرغم من إنها عادة بتكون ملكية خاصة، إلا إنها بتستضيف أوقات رؤساء الدول وغيرهم من الشخصيات المهمة. ممكن يفكر المسافر يلّي معه كتير مصاري أن يروح رحلة حول العالم، منفصلة عن الإقامات بالعددي من هيدي الاوتيلات.
mt: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and the Great Circle Line; before World War II, in the late 19th or early 20th century. They were the place where the rich and famous stayed, and usually had excellent food and nightlife. The old-fashioned fittings and lack of modern amenities are part of their character. Although they are usually privately owned, they have hosted heads of state and other important personalities. A traveler who has a lot of money may think of taking a world tour, separate from the stays at the famous hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "بفضل روابط كبلات الألياف الضوئية بأوروبا والأقمار الصناعية يلّي نطاقها عريض، غرينلاند متصلة منيح بنسبة 93 ٪ بالسكان يلّي عندن إمكانية بالوصول للإنترنت. من المحتمل إنو يكون بالأوتيل أو عند الناس اللي مستضيفينك (إذا بقيت ببيت مع ناس أو بيت خاص) wifi أو كمبيوتر متصل بالإنترنت، وكل المستوطنات بكون فيها قهاوي إنترنت أو مطارح بيتواجد فيها wifi عام. متل ما ذكرنا فوق، على الرغم من أن كلمة ""إسكيمو"" بعدها مقبولة بالولايات المتحدة، إلا أنه عدد من شعوب القطب الشمالي غير الأمريكيين بيعتبروها تحقير، وخاصة بكندا. ممكن تسمع هيدي الكلمة من سكان جرينلاند الأصليين إلا إنو لازم تتجنب استعمالها مع الأجانب. لسكان الأصليين بجرينلاند بسمّوا حالهن الإنويت بكندا وكالاليك (الجمع كالاليت)، وهنّ من سكان جرينلاند، بجرينلاند. الجريمة وسوء النية تجاه الأجانب بشكل عام هنّي شبه مش معروفين بجرينلاند. حتى بالبلدات ما في ""مناطق خطيرة."" ممكن يكون الطقس البارد هو الخطر الحقيقي الوحيد يلّي رح يواجهه الأشخاص المش مستعدين. إذا زرت جرينلاند بالمواسم الباردة (مع الأخد بعين الاعتبار أنه كلما اتجهت شمالاً، كلما صار الجو أبرد) ، فمن الضروري تجيب تياب دافية كافية. ممكن تسبب الأيام الصيفية الطويلة لمشاكل بالنوم بينتج عنها مشاكل صحية. بفصل الصيف، انتبه كمان من البرغش الاسكندنافي. على الرغم من أنه ما بينقل أي أمراض، إلا أنه ممكن يكون مزعج."
mt: "Thanks to fiber-optic cables to Europe and satellites with wide coverage, Greenland is connected to the Internet at a rate of 93 percent of the population, allowing access to the Internet. It is likely that in the hotel or with the people you are staying with (if you are staying with people or a private house) there is Wi-Fi or an Internet-connected computer, and all settlements will have Internet cafes or public houses where there is public Wi-Fi. As mentioned above, although the word "Eskimo" is accepted in the United States, many indigenous peoples of the Arctic outside of the United States consider it to be derogatory, especially in Canada. You may hear the word from the original inhabitants of Greenland, but you must avoid using it with foreigners. The original inhabitants of Greenland are called Inuit in Canada and Kalaallit, who are Greenlanders in Greenland. Crime and hostility towards foreigners in general are not well known in Greenland. Even in the towns there are no "dangerous areas." The cold weather may be the only real danger you will face, unless you are prepared. If you visit Greenland in the winter (taking into account that the further north you go, the colder the weather gets), you will need to bring enough down jackets. The long summer days can cause sleep problems that lead to health problems. In the summer, be aware of the Scandinavian bug. Although it does not transmit any diseases, it can be annoying."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: جاردان دولا يونيون. تعمرت هيدي المساحة كمدخل لدير من القرن الـ17، وبيعتبر تيمبلو دي سان دييغو المبنى الوحيد الباقي منو. بتستغل هلأ كساحة مركزية، ودايماً فيها كتير اشيا عم تصير، بالليل وبالنهار. في عدد من المطاعم حوالا الحديقة، بفترات بعد الضهر والمسا، عادةً بيعملوا حفلات موسيقية مجانية من شرفة المراقبة المركزية. كاليجون ديل بيسو (زقاق القبلة). شرفتان تفصل بينهما 69 سم فقط هي موطن لأسطورة حب قديمة. رح يخبرك بعض الأطفال القصة مقابل قروش قليلة.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. The area is occupied by a 17th-century cloister, and the only remaining building of the temple of San Diego. It is always used as a central square, and there are always many things happening, both at night and during the day. In some restaurants around the garden, at times after the afternoon and before the evening, free musical performances are usually held from the central observation deck. Callejon del Beso (alley of the kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 cm are the home of an old love story. Some children will tell you the story for a few coins.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

In some restaurants around the garden, at times after the afternoon and before the evening, free musical performances are usually held from the central observation deck. Callejon del Beso (alley of the kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 cm are the home of an old love story. Some children will tell you the story for a few coins.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: المشي لمسافات طويلة هو نشاط بالهوا الطلق عبارة عن المشي ببيئات طبيعية ، عادةً على مسارات المشي لمسافات طويلة. رياضة المشي لمسافات طويلة بالنهار هي المشي لمسافات أقل من ميل واحد لمسافات أطول ممكن تقطعها بيوم واحد. للتنزه ليوم واحد على طول طريق سهل، بيلزم شوية استعدادات، وممكن لأي شخص عنده لياقة معتدلة الاستمتاع فيها. ممكن تحتاج العيل يلّي عنها أطفال صغار لاستعدادات أكتر، بس من السهل قضاء يوم بالهواء الطلق حتى مع الأطفال الرضع والأطفال بعمر قبل المدرسة.
mt: Long-distance hiking is a recreational activity involving the long-distance walking in natural environments.  Long-distance hiking is often a form of walking, and is sometimes called backpacking, through hiking, or bushwalking. Day hiking is hiking for less than a day. Day hiking is a popular outdoor recreation activity, which is generally accessible to anyone with a moderate level of physical fitness. Young children, infants, and preschoolers can also enjoy day hiking with appropriate preparation.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "عادةً بالنرويج وجود المضايق والوديان المنحدرة واللي بتفسح فجأة مجال للتلال العالية. عادةً تُسمى هيدي الهضاب ""فيد Vidde"" الشي يلّي بيعني مساحة واسعة ومفتوحة بلا شجر، ومساحة ما الها حدود. بروجالاند وأغدر، عادة بسموهم ""hei"" يعني أن المستنقعات الخالية من الأشجار عادةً بتكون مغطاية الهيذر."
mt: "Usually in Norway, there are the fjords and valleys that suddenly open up to the highlands. Usually they are called "Vidde" which means an open and treeless area with no limits. Børgeland and Ådnera, usually called "hei" means that the marshes without trees are usually covered with heather."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: وبيوصل الموسم السياحي بمحطات التلة لذروته بشكل عام خلال الصيف الهندي. عندهم نوع مختلف من الجمال والسحر بفصل الشتا، فعدة محطات التلال بينزل عليها كميات منحية من التلج وبتقدم أنشطة متل التزلج والتزلج على الجليد.
mt: The tourist season peaks at hill stations in general during the Indian summer. They have a different kind of beauty and charm in the winter season, as some hill stations receive a healthy amount of snowfall and advance activities such as skiing and ice skating.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: كن مطمن أنه بمجرد وصولك للمراسي، رح يكون كل شي كتير واضح. رح تلتقي بتنين مسافرين تانيين بالقوارب ورح يشاركوا معلوماتهم معك. بالأساس رح تحط إخطارات بتعرض فيها مساعدتك، وتخطي الأرصفة، واتقرب من الأشخاص يلّي عم ينضفوا يخوتهم، وتحاول الاتصال بالبحارة بالبار، وغير هيك. حاول تتواصل مع أكبر عدد ممكن من الناس. بعد فترة ، رح يعرفك الكل ويصيروا يعطوك تلميحات عن القارب اللي عم يفتش عن شي شخص.
mt: As soon as you arrive at the docks, everything will be very clear. You will meet other travelers in boats and they will share information with you. Basically, you will receive alerts about helping you, bypassing the piers, approaching people who are packing their tents, and trying to contact sailors at the bar, and so on. Try to communicate with as many people as possible. After a while, everyone will know you and will give you tips about the boat that is looking for something personal.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: جزيرة هونغ كونغ عاطية إقليم هونغ كونغ اسمها وهو المحل يلّي بيعتبروا الكتير من السائحين محور التركيز الرئيسي. شبهوا موكب المباني يلّي بتشكل أفق هونغ كونغ بمخطط شريطي لامع بيّنت من خلال وجود مي مينا فيكتوريا. لتشوف أجمل المناظر بهونج كونج ، اترك الجزيرة واتجه لواجهة كولون البحرية المقابلة. الغالبية العظمى من التنمية الحضرية لجزيرة هونغ كونغ مكتظة بأراضي مستصلحة على طول الشط الشمالي. هيدا هو المكان اللي استقر فيه المستعمرين البريطانيين. فإذا كنت عم تفتش على دليل على الماضي الاستعماري للمنطقة فيك تبلش من هالمكان.
mt: Hong Kong Island is the main tourist destination of Hong Kong, and is often referred to as Hong Kong. The skyline of Hong Kong is dominated by the Victoria Harbour. To see the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head to the waterfront of Kowloon. Most of the urban development of Hong Kong Island is on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is where the British colonialists settled. If you are looking for a sign of the region's colonial past, you will find it here.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: الركب هي دعامات لأقدام الفارس تتدلى على جانبي السرج. بتوفر قدر كبير من الاستقرار للراكب. إلا إنه ممكن تسبب مشاكل بتتعلق بالسلامة إذا علقت رجلين الفارس فيها. إذا وقع الفارس عن الحصان وعلقت اجرو بالرِّكاب، فممكن يتم جره إذا هرب الحصان بعيد. لتقليل هيدي المخاطر، ممكن أخد عدد من احتياطات السلامة. أولاً، بيلبسوا معظم الدراجين أحذية ركوب بكعب ونعل أملس وضيق لحد ما. تالياً، بتحتوي بعض السروج وخاصة السروج الإنكليزية على قضبان أمان بتسمح لجلد الطوق ينزل عن السرج إذا انسحب لورا بواسطة راكب عم يوقع.
mt: The stirrup is a piece of equipment for the rider's feet that hangs on either side of the saddle. It provides a great deal of stability for the rider. However, it can cause problems related to safety if both feet are caught in it. If the rider falls off the horse and his feet are caught in the stirrups, he may be dragged if the horse runs away. To reduce the risks, several safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth and narrow sole. Next, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety bars that allow the girth to slide off the saddle if it is pulled by a rider who falls off.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: شبكة تبادل الضيافة هي المنظمة بتربط المسافرين بالسكان المحليين بالمدن يلّي رح يزورونها. بيتطلب الانضمام لمتل هيدي الشبكة عادة تعباية نموذج عالإنترنت؛ بالرغم من إنو بعض الشبكات بتقدم أو بتتطلب تحقق إضافي. من بعدها بتم تقديم قائمة بالمضيفين المتوفرين إما مطبوعة و / أو من الإنترنت، وأحيانًا مع مراجع وتعليقات من غير مسافرين. تأسست Couchsurfing بكانون التاني 2004 بعد ما لاقى مبرمج الكمبيوتر كيسي فينتون رحلة رخيصة لأيسلندا بس ما كان عند ه محل للإقامة. بعت بريد إلكتروني للتلاميذ بالجامعة المحلية وتلقى عدد كتير كبير من العروض للحصول على سكن مجاني.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with local residents in cities they visit. Typically, joining a network requires a nominal fee, although some networks offer or require additional verification. After joining, a list of available hosts is provided either in print or online, sometimes with references and reviews from non-travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in December 2004 after software engineer Casey Fenton took a cheap trip to Iceland and found no local lodging. He sent an email to the local university students and received a large number of offers for free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: بتخدم المساكن الشباب بالدرجة الأولى - ضيف مثالي بالعشرينات من عمرو - بس ممكن تلاقي أحياناً مسافرين كبار بالعمر كمان هنيك. تعتبر العيل يلّي عندها أطفال شي كتير نادر، بس بعض المساكن بتعطيهم غرف خاصة.
mt: 20-something singles are the primary target - a perfect guest for the 20s - but you can sometimes find older travelers as well. The hotel has a few rooms with children, but some hotels offer special rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: يعتبر رمي بوميرانغ مهارة شائعة عدد كبير من السياح بحبوا يكسبوها. إذا بدك تتعلم رمي ذراع بومرانج وبرجع لإيدك، فتأكد من أن يكون عندك بومرانج المناسب للرجعة. معظم البوميرانغ بأستراليا ما يترجع ومن الأفضل للمبتدئين ما يحاولو رميا بالهوا القوي
mt: Throwing boomerangs is a popular pastime for many tourists who want to learn it. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang and get it back, make sure you have the right boomerang for the return. Most boomerangs in Australia don't return and it is best for beginners to try with a light wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: مع وجود 17000 جزيرة للاختيار من بينها، بيعتبر الأكل الإندونيسي مصطلح شامل بيغطي مجموعة واسعة من الأكلات الإقليمية الموجودة بكل أنحاء البلاد. بس إذا تم استعماله بدون صفات أكتر ، فالمصطلح بيميل لأن يعني الأكل يلّي أصله من الأجزاء الوسطى والشرقية من جزيرة جاوة الرئيسية. المطبخ الجاوي منتشر على نطاق واسع بكل أنحاء الأرخبيل، وبيتميز بمجموعة من الأطباق المحضرة بشكل بسيط والنكهات السائدة اللي بيفضلها الجاويين هي الفول السوداني والحر والسكر (خاصة جوز الهند الجاوي).
mt: 17000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is a term that covers a wide range of regional cuisines from all over the archipelago. However, if used without further qualification, the term tends to refer to the cuisine of the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Javanese cuisine is widespread throughout the archipelago, and is characterized by a group of simple dishes and dominant flavors that Javanese prefer are peanuts, hot and sweet (especially Javanese palm sugar).
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: بالنسبة للأشخاص يلّي ما بيعرفوا المصطلحات الطبية، فالكلمات معد ومسبب للعدوى عندن معنى مختلف. المرض المعدي هو المرض يلّي بسببه باثوجين ، متل الفيروس أو البكتيريا أو الفطريات أو غير الطفيليات. المرض المعدي هو مرض بينتقل بسهولة عن طريق التواجد بالقرب من شخص مصاب. بيطلب عدد كبير من الحكومات من الزوار اللي بيفوتو أو بيضهرو من بلدها بالتطعيم ضد مجموعة من الأمراض. ممكن تعتمد هيدي المتطلبات غالبًا على البلدان يلّي زارها المسافر أو ناوي يزورها.
mt: For people who are not familiar with medical terminology, the words "infectious" and "contagious" have different meanings. An infectious disease is a disease caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus, or non-parasitic organism. An infectious disease is a disease that is easily transmitted by being in close proximity to an infected person. Many governments require visitors to their country to be vaccinated against a group of diseases. These requirements may often be based on the countries that the traveler has visited or plans to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: بيُعتبر متعهدي الشبكة الافتراضية الخاصة طريقة ممتازة للتحايل على الرقابة السياسية والتصفية الجغرافية التجارية لبروتوكول الإنترنت. وبتتفوق على بروكسيات الويب لعدة أسباب: إنها بتعيد توجيه كل حركات السير على الإنترنت مش بس http. وهي بتقدم عادةً تردد أعلى وخدمة بجودة أحسن. وبيتم تشفيرها لهيم بيصعب التجسس عليها.
mt: VPNs are considered an excellent way to circumvent political and geographical commercial filtering of the Internet. They surpass web proxies for several reasons: they redirect all Internet traffic, not just HTTP. They usually provide a higher speed and better quality of service. They are encrypted, making them difficult to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: بيُعتبر متعهدي الشبكة الافتراضية الخاصة طريقة ممتازة للتحايل على الرقابة السياسية والتصفية الجغرافية التجارية لبروتوكول الإنترنت. وبتتفوق على بروكسيات الويب لعدة أسباب: إنها بتعيد توجيه كل حركات السير على الإنترنت مش بس http. وهي بتقدم عادةً تردد أعلى وخدمة بجودة أحسن. وبيتم تشفيرها لهيم بيصعب التجسس عليها.

src: لأنه يتم توجيه المكالمات عبر الإنترنت، فما رح تحتاج لإستعمال شركة تلفون موجودة بالمحل العايش فيه أو وين مسافر. ما في كمان أي شرط بالحصول على رقم محلي من المجتمع يلّي بتعيش فيه. فيك تحصل على اتصال إنترنت عبر الأقمار الصناعية ببراري تشيكن، بألاسكا واختيار رقم بيدعي أنك بولاية أريزونا المشمسة. أوقات كتير بتضطر تشتري رقم عالمي منفصل بيسمح لتلفونات شبكة التلفون العامة المحولة تتصل فيك. المطرح اللي بيجي منو الرقم بيشكل فارق للناس اللي بيتصلو فيك.
mt: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you don't need to use a local phone company that's based where you live or travel. You can get Internet access via satellite in Alaska and pretend to be in Arizona. There are times when you have to buy a separate international number that allows public switched telephone network calls to reach you. The cost of the number you buy makes a difference to people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: النطق هيّن نسبيًا بالإيطالي لأنو معظم الكلمات بتنقال بالطريقة اللي بتنكتب فيها بالضبط الحروف الرئيسية يلّي لازم إنّو ننتبهلها هي c و g، لأن بيختلف نطقها بحسب حرف العلة يلّي بيجي بعدها. تأكد كمان من لفظ r و rr بشكل مختلف: caro تعني غزال، بينما carro بتعني سيارة.
mt: The pronunciation is relatively easy because most words are spelled exactly as they are pronounced, except for the letters c and g, which have different pronunciations depending on the vowel that follows them. Also, be sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means deer, while carro means car.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: إزمير تالت أكبر مدينة بتركيا وبيبلغ عدد سكانها حوالي 3.7 مليون نسمة، وهي تاني أكبر مينا بعد اسطنبول، ومركز نقل جيد جدًا. كانت مدينة سميرنا القديمة من زمان، وصارت هلق مركز تجاري حديث ومتطور ومزدحم، موجود حول خليج ضخم وبتحيط فيه الجبال. تنتشر الجادات الواسعة والمباني يلّي واجهاتها إزاز ومراكز التسوق الحديثة مع الأسقف التقليدية يلّي عندها قرميد الأحمر وسوق القرن التمنتعش والمساجد والكنايس القديمة على الرغم من أن أجواء المدينة أقرب لأوروبا المتوسطية أكتر من تركيا التقليدية.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey and has a population of about 3.7 million. It is the second largest port after Istanbul, and a very good transportation center. The ancient city of Smyrna was once the center of commerce, and is now a modern and busy commercial center, located around a large bay and surrounded by mountains. The wide streets and buildings with traditional facades are interspersed with modern shopping centers with traditional roofs with red tiles, the old bazaar and the old mosques and churches, despite the fact that the atmosphere of the city is closer to the Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: تعتبر مشاهدة أزهار الكرز، المعروفة باسم هانامي، جزء من الثقافة اليابانية من القرن التامن. اجا هيدا المفهوم من الصين لأن كانت أزهار البرقوق هي الزهرة المفضلة. باليابان، استضاف الإمبراطور حفلات أزهار الكرز الأولى له ولغير أعضاء من الطبقة الأرستقراطية حول البلاط الإمبراطوري.
mt: The viewing of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been part of Japanese culture since the eighth century. This concept originated in China as the favorite flower was the plum blossom. In Japan, the first cherry blossom viewing parties were held by the emperor for himself and non-aristocratic members of the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: "القدس هي عاصمة ""إسرائيل"" وأكبر مدنها، رغم إنو معظم الدول التانية والأمم المتحدة ما بتعترف فيها كعاصمة لـ""إسرائيل"". المدينة القديمة بتلال يهودا الها تاريخ رائع بيمتد عبر آلاف السنين. المدينة مقدّسة للأديان التوحيدية التلاتة - اليهودية والمسيحية والإسلامية، وهي بمثابة مركز روحاني وديني وثقافي. نظرًا للأهمية الدينية للمدينة، وبالأخص المواقع العديدة بمنطقة المدينة القديمة، تعتبر القدس واحدة من الوجهات السياحية الرئيسية بإسرائيل. في بالقدس مواقع تاريخية وأثرية وثقافية كتيرة، ومراكز تسوق نابضة بالحياة ومليانة عجقة ومقاهي ومطاعم."
mt: "Jerusalem is the capital of Israel, and its largest city, although most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as such. The Old City of Jerusalem has a long and rich history spanning thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three Abrahamic religions—Judaism, Christianity, and Islam—and is a center of religious and spiritual life. Due to the city's religious importance, and especially the numerous sites within the Old City, Jerusalem is one of Israel's main tourist destinations. In Jerusalem there are many historical and archaeological sites, lively shopping centers, crowded markets, cafes, and restaurants."
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: حديقة كروجر الوطنية (KNP) موجودة بالشمال الشرقي من جنوب إفريقيا وبتمتد على طول حدود موزمبيق بالشرق وزيمبابوي بالشمال والحدود الجنوبية هي نهر التمساح. بتبلغ مساحة الحديقة 19500 كيلومتر مربع وبتنقسم لـ 14 منطقة بيئية مختلفة، بتدعم كل منطقة حياة برية مختلفة. هي وحدة من مناطق الجذب الرئيسية بجنوب إفريقيا وتعتبر من أبرز المنتزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا (SANParks). متل ما هو الحال بكل المتنزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا، في رسوم المحافظة ودخول يومية للحديقة. ممكن يكون من المفيد كمان شراية بطاقة Wild Card، يلّي بتوفر الدخول لمجموعة مختارة من المتنزهات بجنوب إفريقيا أو كل المتنزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa and extends along the borders of Mozambique to the east and Zimbabwe to the north, with the southern boundary being the Sabie River. The park covers an area of 19,500 square kilometres and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, each supporting a different wildlife. It is one of the main tourist attractions in South Africa and one of the largest national parks in South Africa (SANParks). Like all the national parks in South Africa, there is an entrance fee and daily fee for the park. It may be useful to also purchase a Wild Card, which gives access to a selected group of parks in South Africa or all the national parks in South Africa.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: حديقة كروجر الوطنية (KNP) موجودة بالشمال الشرقي من جنوب إفريقيا وبتمتد على طول حدود موزمبيق بالشرق وزيمبابوي بالشمال والحدود الجنوبية هي نهر التمساح. بتبلغ مساحة الحديقة 19500 كيلومتر مربع وبتنقسم لـ 14 منطقة بيئية مختلفة، بتدعم كل منطقة حياة برية مختلفة. هي وحدة من مناطق الجذب الرئيسية بجنوب إفريقيا وتعتبر من أبرز المنتزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا (SANParks). متل ما هو الحال بكل المتنزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا، في رسوم المحافظة ودخول يومية للحديقة. ممكن يكون من المفيد كمان شراية بطاقة Wild Card، يلّي بتوفر الدخول لمجموعة مختارة من المتنزهات بجنوب إفريقيا أو كل المتنزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa and extends along the borders of Mozambique to the east and Zimbabwe to the north, with the southern boundary being the Sabie River. The park covers an area of 19,500 square kilometres and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, each supporting a different wildlife. It is one of the main tourist attractions in South Africa and one of the largest national parks in South Africa (SANParks). Like all the national parks in South Africa, there is an entrance fee and daily fee for the park. It may be useful to also purchase a Wild Card, which gives access to a selected group of parks in South Africa or all the national parks in South Africa.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: البرج فوق الطرف الشمالي من ماتشو بيتشو هو هيدا الجبل المنحدر، وبيكون غالبا خلفية لعدة صور أثرية. مبين الشي صعب شوي من تحت، وهو صعود منحدر كتير وصعب، بس معظم الأشخاص الرشقين بشكل معقول لازم أن يكونوا قادرين على الوصول له بـ45 دقيقة تقريباً. بتم وضع خطوات حجرية على معظم طول المسار، أما بالأقسام المنحدرة كتير، بتم توفير كابلات فولاذية كدرابزين داعم. ومع هيك، من المتوقع أنّو تكون عم تلاقي صعوبة بالتنفس، وأن تهتم بأجزاء أكتر حدة، خاصةً لمّا تكون رطبة، وين من الممكن أن تصير خطيرة بسرعة. في كهف صغير بالقرب من القمة لزم المرور منه، فهو منخفض كتير ومضغوط لحد ما.
mt: The northern peak of Machu Picchu is this steep slope, and is often the background for many archaeological photos. It is shown somewhat from below, and is a very steep and difficult ascent, but most people with reasonable fitness should be able to reach it in about 45 minutes. Most of the trail is paved with stone steps, but on the steeper sections, steel cables are provided as handrails. However, it is expected that there will be difficulty breathing, and to pay attention to more critical parts, especially when they are wet, and it can become dangerous quickly. There is a small cave near the summit that must be passed through, as it is very low and cramped.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: بيعتمد مطبخ مايوركا، متل مطابخ المناطق المماثلة بالبحر الأبيض المتوسط، على الخبز والخضرا واللحمة (خاصة لحم الخنزير)، وبيستعمل زيت الزيتون بكل شي. عشا شعبي بسيط، خاصة بفصل الصيف ، هو Pa amb Oli: خبز بزيت الزيتون والبندورة وأي توابل متوفرة متل الجبن والتونفيش وغيرها.
mt: The Majorcan kitchen, like those of other Mediterranean regions, relies heavily on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and uses olive oil in everything. A simple popular summer supper is Pa amb Oli: bread with olive oil, tomatoes and any available seasonings such as cheese and tuna.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: بتم طبخ وجبة هانجي بجورة سخنة بالأرض. بتم تسخين الجورة بالحجار السخنة من النار، أو ببعض المحلات بتخلّي الحرارة الجوفية مناطق الأرض سخنة بشكل طبيعي. غالبًا تُستعمل الهانجى لطبخ عشا تقليدي على الطريقة المشوية. بتقدم عدو مطارح بروتوروا هانجي الحرارية الأرضية، بينما فيك تاخد عينات تانية من الهانجي بكرايستشيرش وويلنغتون ومطارح تانية.
mt: A hanji meal is cooked on a hot stone. The stones are heated by hot rocks from the fire, or some stores use geothermal heat to naturally warm the ground. Hanji is often used to cook traditional barbecue. The company Ado Matapuro offers geothermal hanji, while in Christchurch and Wellington, New Zealand, and other airports, samples are taken from hanji.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: خلال زيارة الأديرة، بيُطلب من السيدات يلبسوا تنانير بتغطي الركبتين ويغطوا أكتافهن كمان. بتوفر معظم الأديرة شلحات للنسوان اللي مش مجهزين بس إذا جيتي ومعك شلحة وخاصة إذا كان ألوانها فاتحة، رح يبتسملك الراهب أو الراهبة بالمدخل. على نفس المنوال، يبينطلب من الرجال لبس بنطلونات بتغطي الركبتين. ويمكن استعارة التياب من المخزن عند المدخل، إلا إنه التياب ما بتم غسلها بعد كل مستخدم لهيك ممكن ما تشعر بالراحة لما تبلس التنورة. وهي بمقاس واحد بيناسب كل الرجال!
mt: During a visit to a convent, women are asked to wear skirts that cover the knees and cover their shoulders as well. Most convents provide robes for women who do not have them, but if you bring your own robe, it may not be washed after each user so you may not feel comfortable when wearing the dress. It is of one size and fits all men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: إذا بتزور القطب الشمالي أو المناطق القطبية الجنوبية بالشتا، فرح تختبر الليل القطبي، يلّي بيعني أن الشمس ما بتشرق فوق الأفق. وبيوفر فرصة منيحة لمشاهدة الشفق القطبي لما تكون السما أقل أو أكتر عتمة على مدار الساعة. بما أن المناطق قليلة السكان، التلوث الضوئي ما بكون مشكلة بكتير من الأحيان، رح تقدر كمان تستمتع بالنجوم.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic during the winter, you will experience polar night, meaning the sun will not rise above the horizon. This provides a great opportunity to see the aurora borealis, as the sky will be darker or lighter throughout the day. As the regions are sparsely populated, light pollution is not a problem most of the time, so you can also enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: بالمواقع البعيدة، بدون تغطية التلفون الخلوي، ممكن يكون التلفون يلّي بيشتغل بالأقمار الصناعية هو خيارك الوحيد. التلفون يلّي بيشتغل عبر الأقمار الصناعية بشكل عام ما يعتبر بديل عن التلفون المحمول، لأن لازم أن تكون بالهوا الطلق مع وجود خط رؤية واضح للقمر الصناعي لإجراء مكالمة هاتفية. بتم استعمال الخدمة بشكل متكرر عن طريق الشحن، بما فيها قوارب النزهة، وكمان الرحلات الاستكشافية يلّي بكون في الها احتياجات بيانات وصوت عن بعد. لازم يكون موظف خدمة التلفون قادر على تقديم معلومات زيادة عن الاشتراك بهيدي الخدمة.
mt: In remote locations, without cellular coverage, satellite phone may be your only option. Satellite phone, in general, is a backup for mobile phone, as it requires you to be in line of sight with the satellite to make a call. It is commonly used by cruisers, and expeditionary trips where you need to have off-site data and voice communications. The service provider must be able to provide additional information about subscribing to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: بالمواقع البعيدة، بدون تغطية التلفون الخلوي، ممكن يكون التلفون يلّي بيشتغل بالأقمار الصناعية هو خيارك الوحيد. التلفون يلّي بيشتغل عبر الأقمار الصناعية بشكل عام ما يعتبر بديل عن التلفون المحمول، لأن لازم أن تكون بالهوا الطلق مع وجود خط رؤية واضح للقمر الصناعي لإجراء مكالمة هاتفية. بتم استعمال الخدمة بشكل متكرر عن طريق الشحن، بما فيها قوارب النزهة، وكمان الرحلات الاستكشافية يلّي بكون في الها احتياجات بيانات وصوت عن بعد. لازم يكون موظف خدمة التلفون قادر على تقديم معلومات زيادة عن الاشتراك بهيدي الخدمة.

src: عاصمة مولدوفا هي كيشيناو وعلى الرغم من انّو اللغة المحلية هي الرومانية، بس الروسية مستعملة على نطاق واسع. مولدوفا جمهورية متعددة الأعراق عانت من صراع عرقي. سنة 1994، أدى هيدا الصراع لإنشاء جمهورية ترانسنيستريا المعلنة من جانب واحد بشرق مولدوفا، ويلّي عندها حكومتها وعملتها الخاصة فيها بس ما بتعترف فيها أي دولة عضو بالأمم المتحدة. أعيدت الروابط الاقتصادية بين هودي الجزأين من مولدوفا على الرغم من فشل المفاوضات السياسية. الديانة الرئيسية بمولدوفا هي المسيحية الأرثوذكسية.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău, and although the local language is Romanian, Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic strife. In 1994, this strife led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Republic of Transnistria in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency, but is recognized by no other United Nations member state. Economic links between the two parts of Moldova were restored despite the failure of political negotiations. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "بما إنو مونتيفيديو موجودة على جنوب خط الاستواء، بيكون الصيف هونيك لما يكون الشتا بنص الكرة الشمالي والعكس. مونتيفيديو موجودة بالمناطق شبه الاستوائية. بأشهر الصيف بتوصل درجات الحرارة لأكتر من 30 درجة مئوية. ممكن يكون الشتا بارد بشكل محير: نادراً ما بتنزل درجات الحرارة لتحت الصفر، إلا إنه الرياح والرطوبة بخلوا الطقس أبرد مما متوقع. ما توجد مواسم ""ممطرة"" و ""جافة"" بتظل كمية الشتي متل ما هي تقريبًا طول السنة."
mt: "Because Montevideo is located south of the equator, summer here is the same as winter in the northern hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is located in the subtropics. In the summer months, temperatures can reach over 30 degrees Celsius. Winter can be surprisingly cold: temperatures rarely drop below freezing, but the wind and humidity make the weather colder than expected. There are no "wet" and "dry" seasons, but the amount of rain is roughly the same throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "جرافيتي هي كلمة بتدل على الجداريات والخربشات غير المرغوب فيها. بالرغم من إنها ظاهرة مش حديثة ، إلا إنو معظم الناس بيربطوها على الأرجح بتخريب الشباب للممتلكات العامة والخاصة باستعمال سبراي الدهان. بالوقت الحاضر موجود فنانين جرافيتي معروفين ، ومناسبات للكتابة على الحيطان وحيطان ""قانونية"". لوحات الكتابة على الحيطان بهيدي الطريقة عادةً بتكون بتشبه الأعمال الفنية بدلاً من العلامات يلّي ما بتنقرى."
mt: "Graffiti is a term for paintings and scratches that are unwanted. Although it is not a new phenomenon, most people probably associate it with vandalism by young people on public and private property using spray paint. Today there are known graffiti artists, occasions for writing on walls and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings are usually similar to works of art rather than signs."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: بالنسبة لبعض المهرجانات، فالغالبية الكبيرة من الحاضرين بالمهرجانات الموسيقية بقرروا يخيموا بالموقع، ومعظمهم بيعتبروا جزء حيوي من التجربة. إذا بدك تكون قريب من الحدث، فلازم تفوت بكير كرمال تاخد موقع تخييم قريب من الموسيقى. تذكر إنو بالرغم من إنو الموسيقى بالمسارح الرئيسية يمكن تكون انتهت، يمكن تلاقو أقسام من المهرجان بتضل تشغل الموسيقى لوقت متأخر من الليل. بتحتوي بعض المهرجانات على مناطق تخييم خاصة للعيل اللي عندها ولاد زغار.
mt: For some festivals, the majority of the attendees at music festivals have decided to camp on site, and most of them consider themselves an integral part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, don't miss out on getting a camping spot close to the music. Remember that although the main stages may have ended, you can find sections of the festival that are still playing music late into the night. Some festivals have special family-friendly camping areas.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: نظرًا لمدى بُعد كتير من البيبلو، فما رح تقدر تلاقي كمية كبيرة من الحياة الليلية من دون السفر لالبوكيرك أو سانتا في. كل الكازينوهات المذكورة فوق تقريبًا بتقدم المشروبات، وكتار منها بجيبوا ضيافة بتحمل اسم علامة تجارية (بشكل رئيسي الكبيرة منها يلّي بتحيط مباشرة بألبوكيرك وسانتا في). انتبه: بارات المدن الصغيرة هون ما بتكون دايماً أماكن جيدة للزاير من برّات الولاية للتنزه فيها. لسبب واحد، بعاني شمال نيومكسيكو من مشاكل كبيرة بسبب السواقة تحت تأثير الكحول، فعدد السائقين المخمورين هو عالي كتير بالقرب من بارات المدن الصغيرة.
mt: Because of the distance between the pueblos, you won't be able to find a large amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. Most of the casinos mentioned above also serve drinks, and some of them have a lounge with a brand name (mostly the larger ones that are directly adjacent to Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Note: Small-town bars are not always good places to visit for out-of-state tourists. One reason is that northern New Mexico has a serious problem with drunk driving, so the number of drunk drivers is high near small-town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "البيرة المحلية الرئيسية هي ""رقم واحد""، وهي مش بيرة معقدة، بس ممتعة ومنعشة. البيرة المحلية التانية اسمها ""مانتا"". في أكتر من نوع نبيد الفرنسي، بس النبيد النيوزيلندي والأسترالي ممكن يكونوا أفضل للسفر. مي الصنبور المحلية آمنة تمامًا للشرب، بس هيّن انك تلاقي المي المعباية بقنانا إذا كنت بتخاف من مصدر ونضافة هيدي المي. بالنسبة للأستراليين، ففكرة القهوة ""فلات وايت"" هي أجنبية. الأسود القصير هو ""إسبريسو""، بيجي الكابتشينو مليان كريمة (ومش الرغوة)، والشاي يُقدم بدون حليب. الشوكولاتة السخنة بتوصل للمعايير البلجيكية، أما عصاير الفواكه فهي غالية بس ممتازة."
mt: "The main local beer is "Number One", which is not a complicated beer, but it is pleasant and refreshing. The second local beer is called "Manta". In more than one type of French beer, but the New Zealand and Australian beer may be better for travel. The local tap water is completely safe to drink, but you may encounter water with a strange taste if you are afraid of the source and the addition of water. For Australians, the idea of "flat white" coffee is foreign. Short black is "espresso", the cappuccino is full of cream (and not foam), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate meets Belgian standards, while fruit juices are expensive but excellent."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "كان الغوارانيون أهم مجموعة أصلية بتسكن بيلّيالآن بباراغواي الشرقية، وبعيشوا كصيادين شبه رحل وبمارسوا كمان زراعة الكفاف. كانت منطقة تشاكو موطن لمجموعات تانية من قبائل السكان الأصليين متل غوايكيرو وباياغوا، يلّي نجو بفضل اللجوء للصيد وتجميع المواد الصالحة للاكل وصيد السمك. بالقرن الـ16، ولدت باراغواي، يلّي كانت معروفة سابقًا باسم ""المقاطعة العملاقة لجزر الإنديز""، نتيجة لقاء الغزاة الإسبان مع مجموعات السكان الأصليين. بلّشوا الأسبان فترة الاستعمار يلّي ضلّت تلات قرون. من لما ما تأسست أسونسيون سنة 1537، قدرت باراغواي تحافظ على جزء كبير من طابعها الأصلي وهويتها."
mt: "The Guaraní were the most important indigenous group in what is now eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers and practicing subsistence agriculture. Other indigenous groups, such as the Guayaki and Payagua, survived by hunting and gathering and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, previously known as the "Great Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter between the Spanish invaders and the indigenous groups. The Spanish period of colonization lasted three centuries. Asunción was founded in 1537, and Paraguay managed to preserve much of its original character and identity."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "الباريسيين مشهورين بأنانيتن ووقاحتن وعجرفتن. بالرغم من إنو هيدي مجرد صورة نمطية مش دقيقة، إلا إنو أفضل طريقة لتريح راسك بباريس إنك تتصرف باحترام وأدب، وتتصرف متل شخص ""bien élevé"" (مربّى منيح). هيدا الشي بخلي الموضوع أهين. رح تتبخر التصاميم الخارجية المفاجئة للباريسيين بسرعة إذا عرضت بعض المجاملات الأساسية."
mt: "Parisians are known for their selfishness, rudeness and arrogance. Although this is just a stereotype and not entirely accurate, the best way to relax in Paris is to act with respect and politeness, and to act like a "bien élevé" (well brought up) person. This will make the subject go away. The Parisians' flashy exterior designs will quickly disappear if you show some basic flattery."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: في فئتان لميترو رايل بقطارات الركاب بكيب تاون وحواليها: فئة مترو بلاس (وبتتسما كمان الدرجة الأولى) والمترو (بتتسما الدرجة التالتة). ميترو بلاس مريح أكتر وفي عجقة أقل بس أغلى بشوي، مع إنو بعدو أرخص من تذاكر المترو العادية بأوروبا. كل قطار عندو عربات MetroPlus و Metro؛ فعربات MetroPlus دايماً بتكون بنهاية القطار الأقرب لكيب تاون.
mt: 2 classes of Metro Rail passenger trains in Cape Town and vicinity: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but more expensive than standard Metro fares in Europe. Each train has MetroPlus and Metro cars; MetroPlus cars are always at the end of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: ممكن يواجه المسافرين حيوانات خطيرة مش متعودين عليها ببلدهم الأساسي. ممكن تفسد الأوبئة الأكل أو تسبب التهيج أو بحالة أسوأ تسبب الحساسية أو تنشر السم أو تنقل العدوى. الأمراض المعدية بحد ذتها، أو الحيوانات الخطيرة يلّي ممكن تصيب أو تقتل الناس بالقوة، ما بتنوصف عادة بأنها آفات.
mt: Travelers may encounter dangerous animals unfamiliar to their home country. They may contaminate food or cause irritation or worse, cause allergies or spread toxins or transmit disease. Pathogenic diseases, or dangerous animals that may kill or injure people with force, are usually called pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: كل متجر زاوية مليان بمجموعة كبيرة من بطاقات التلفون المدفوعة مسبقًا يلّي ممكن استعمالها من التلفونات المدفوعة أو التلفونات العادية. بالرغم من أنو معظم البطاقات منيحة للاتصال من أي كان، إلا إنو بعضها بيقدم أسعار مكالمات مناسبة لمجموعات محددة من البلدان. غالبًا بكون الوصول لهيدي الخدمات من خلال رقم تلفون مجاني ممكن الاتصال فيه من معظم التلفونات بدون مقابل.
mt: Every corner store is full of a large selection of prepaid phone cards that can be used from payphones or regular phones. While most cards allow you to call anyone, some offer special rates for calling certain groups of countries. Often, access to these services is available through a toll-free number that can be called from most phones without charge.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: حديقة بليتفيتش ليكس الوطنية مليانة بالغابات ، بشكل أساسي بشجر الزان والراتنجية الشبيهة بشجر الصنوبر والتنوب، وبتتميز بمزيج من نباتات جبال الألب والبحر الأبيض المتوسط. عندها مجموعة كبيرة ومتنوعة من المجتمعات النباتية، بسبب مجموعة من المناخات المحلية والتربة المختلفة ومستويات الارتفاع المتفاوتة. تعتبر المنطقة كمان موطن لمجموعة متنوعة من أنواع الحيوانات والطيور. فيكم تلاقو الحيوانات النادرة متل الدب البني الأوروبي والذئب والنسر والبومة والوشق والقط البري وطائر الكابر كيلي، إلى جانب عدة أنواع أكثر شيوعًا
mt: The national park is covered by forests, mainly spruce and fir, with a mix of alpine and Mediterranean flora. It has a wide variety of plant communities, due to a range of local climates, different soils and varying altitudes. The area is also home to a variety of animals and birds. Rare animals include the brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, hawk, wild cat and capercaillie, along with several more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. src: "وكذّبت الشركات الإعلامية بشكل روتيني بخصوص الغرض من هيدا الشي، مُدعيةً أنّو الهدف هو ""منع القرصنة"". بالواقع، ما بتأثر رموز المنطقة أبداً على النسخ غير القانوني؛ رح يتم تشغيل نسخة بت مقابل بت من القرص بشكل منيح على أي جهاز وين رح يتم تشغيل النسخة الأصلية. الهدف الفعلي هو منح هيدي الشركات أكتير سيطرة على أسواقها وهيدا الشي كله بيتعلق بتدوير المصاري."
mt: "And the media companies routinely denied the purpose of this, claiming that the goal was to "prevent piracy." In fact, the region codes never affected the unauthorized copies; a properly modded copy would run on any machine, and the original would run as well. The real goal was to give the companies more control over their markets, and all of this was about turning a profit."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: مع إنه فحص الهجرة ما بيكون موجود أو بكون إجراء شكلي لما توصل عبلدك، إلا إنه تفتيش الجمارك ممكن يكون مشكلة. تأكد من أنك بتعرف شو فيك وشو ما فيك تفوّت والتصريح عن أي شي بيتجاوز الحدود القانونية.
mt: While immigration may not be present or be a mere formality, customs inspection may be a problem. Make sure you know what you have and what you have missed and declare any item that exceeds legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: وادي كوشامو - هو وجهة التسلق الأولى بتشيلي، والمعروف باسم يوسمايت بأمريكا الجنوبية، مع مجموعة متنوعة من الحيطان والصخور الجرانيتية الكبيرة. بس نطلَّع من القمم منشوف مناظر خلابة. والمتسلقين من كل أنحاء العالم دايماً بيعملوا طرق جديدة بين حيطانو يلّي ما الها نهاية.
mt: Wadi Koshamou is the first climbing destination in Chile, known as Yosemite in South America, with a variety of cliffs and large granite rocks. From the peaks, we can enjoy breathtaking views. Climbers from all over the world are always working on new routes between the cliffs.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: إذا كنت حابب تسافر حول العالم بنصف الكرة الجنوبي بالكامل، فاختيار الرحلات والوجهات محدود بسبب عدم وجود طرق عبر المحيط. ما بيغطي ولا تحالف من شركات الطيران كل معابر المحيط التلاتة بنص الكرة الأرضية الجنوبي (وما بتغطي سكاي تيم ولا معبر من المعابر). تحالف ستار بغطي كل شي من عدا شرق جنوب المحيط الهادئ من سانتياغو دي تشيلي لتاهيتي، وهي رحلة LATAM Oneworld. هيدي الرحلة مش الخيار الوحيد إذا كنت حابب تتخطى جنوب المحيط الهادئ والساحل الغربي لأمريكا الجنوبية. (شوف الخيارات المذكورة تحت).
mt: If you want to circumnavigate the entire Southern Hemisphere, your flight and destination choices are limited due to the lack of routes across the ocean. No airline alliance covers all three Southern Hemisphere crossings (and none cover the Southern Hemisphere SkyTeam or Southern Hemisphere Oneworld). Star Alliance covers everything except the east of the South Pacific from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, a LATAM Oneworld flight. This is not the only option if you want to circumnavigate the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (See the options below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: دولياً، في تقريباً 200 منظمة سياحية جارية. بتشتغل معظمهم بشكل مستقل. خلفت شركة غو رانينغ تورز Go Running Tours، العشرات من مزودي خدمات إدارة المعالم السياحية بأربع قارات. مع إنو أصل جولات الركض Go Running Tours مرتبط بـ Running Tours Barcelona و Running Copenhagen إلا إنه انضم إليها بوقت قصير Running Tours Prague ومقرها ببراغ وغيرها من البلدان.
mt: 200+ tourism companies are running. Most of them are independent. Go Running Tours, a company that provides tourist attractions services in four continents, has left dozens of service providers. Although the origin of Go Running Tours is related to Running Tours Barcelona and Running Copenhagen, it joined them shortly after Running Tours Prague and other countries.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "ممكن تكون رحلات السفاري أكبر عامل جذب سياحي بأفريقيا والأهم بالنسبة لكتير من الزوار. استعمال مصطلح رحلات السفاري الشائع بدل على السفر البري لشوفة الحياة البرية الأفريقية الرائعة، بالأخص بالسافانا. بعض الحيوانات متل الفيلة والزرافات بتقرب من السيارات كتير، وبتسمح للمعدات النموذجية تشوفها منيح. الأسود والفهود والنمور بتكون خجولة أوقات وبتشوفها بشكل أحسن بس تستعمل الناضور. رحلة سفاري مشي (تُسمى كمان ""المشي يالأدغال""، أو ""سفاري المشي لمسافات طويلة""، أو ""التمشاية"") بتضمن المشي لمسافات طويلة أو لبضع ساعات أو عدة أيام."
mt: "Safari trips may be the biggest tourist attraction in Africa, and the most important for many visitors. Using the term safari trips instead of overland travel to see African wildlife, especially in the savanna. Some animals such as elephants and zebras are very close to the cars, and allow the equipment to see them well. Lions, leopards and tigers are shy at times and see them better with the naked eye. A safari walk (also called "walking in the jungle", or "safari walking for long distances", or "hiking") will include walking for long distances or a few hours or several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: بتكون الجولات أرخص بالنسبة للمجموعات الأكبر، لهيك إذا كنت لوحدك أو مع رفيق واحد بس، حاول تقابل أشخاص غير وشكل مجموعة من أربعة لستة أشخاص لتحصل على سعر أفضل لكل شخص. ما لازم هيدا الشي ما يكون بهمك، لأنه غالبًا بتم تبديل السياح لتعباية السيارات. مبين أن بالواقع أنه طريقة لخداع الناس كرمال يفكروا أن لازم يدفعوا أكتر.
mt: It is cheaper for larger groups, so if you are alone or with one friend, try to meet people and form a group of four to six people to get a better price for each person. This should not be a problem, as people are often switched to avoid car wear. It is also a way to trick people who think they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. src: الحجز المسبق بقدم راحة البال للمسافر لأنه رح يكون عنده محل للنوم بمجرد وصوله لوجهته. أغلب وكلا السفر بكون عندهم عروض مع أوتيلات محددة، إلا إنك ممكن تحجز بأماكن غير متل أماكن التخييم من خلال وكيل سفر. بيقدموا وكلا السفر عادة باكيجز بتشمل الترويقة، وترتيبات النقل من/ لـ المطار أو كمان باكيجز طيران وأوتيلات. وممكن يحجزوا عنك إذا كنت بحاجة لوقت لتفكر بالعرض أو يساعدوك بالحصول على مستندات بتحتاجها بسفرتك (متل الفيزا). على الرغم من هيدا الشي، لازم مراجعة أي تعديلات أو طلبات من قبل وكيل السفر بالأول ومش مباشرة مع الفندق.
mt: 1. Book your flight with a layover in your destination. Most travel agents will offer packages that include the flight, and arrangements for transportation to/from the airport or hotel. They can also help you obtain any documents you need for your trip (such as a visa). However, it is always best to check with your travel agent first before making any changes or requests.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: "تطبيقات مترجم النصوص بالوقت الفعلي هي تطبيقات بتقدر تترجم أجزاء كاملة من النص تلقائيًا من لغة للغة تانية. يمكن لبعض التطبيقات بهيدي الفئة ترجمة نصوص بلغات أجنبية على لافتات أو أشيا تانية بالعالم الحقيقي لما يوجه مستهمل التلفون الذكي نحو هيديك الأشيا. تحسنت محركات الترجمة بشكل كبير، وصارت تقدم اليوم ترجمات صحيحة لحد ما (ونادرًا ما تكون الترجمة ركيكة)، ومع هيك لازم نتأكد منها لأنها ممكن تكون غلطت بكتير إشيا. واحد من أبرز التطبيقات بهيدي الفئة هو ""غوغل ترانسلايت"" اللي بيسمح بالترجمة من دون إنترنت بعد تنزيل بيانات اللغة المطلوبة."
mt: "Real-time text translation applications are applications that can automatically translate entire texts from one language to another. Some applications in this category can translate foreign texts on signs or other objects in the real world that a smartphone user is directed towards. Translation engines have improved greatly, and today provide translations that are correct to a large extent (and rarely incorrect), so we must be careful to check them because they may be wrong in many cases. One of the most prominent applications in this category is "Google Translate" which allows translation without an Internet connection after downloading the required language data."
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: الانهيارات الثلجية مش شي مش طبيعي. ممكن للمنحدرات شديدة الانحدار أن تحمل كمية كبيرة من الثلج، ورح تنخفض الأحجام الزايدة على شكل انهيارات ثلجية. المشكلة هي أن التلج بكون لزج، لهيك فهو بيحتاج لبعض المحفزات لينزل، ويمكن أن يكون نزول شوية التلج هو الحدث المحفز للبقية. أوقات كتير بيكون الحدث الأصلي هو تحماية الشمس للتلج، وأوقات نزول تلج أكتر، وأحيانًا أحداث طبيعية تانية، وغالبًا بتكون بشرية.
mt: Avalanche is not a natural phenomenon. Steep slopes can hold a large amount of snow, and the increased sizes can fall as avalanches. The problem is that snow is viscous, so it needs some triggers to fall, and the initial event can be the sun melting the snow, and more snow falling, and sometimes other natural events, and often human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "الكاري هو طبق بيعتمد على الأعشاب والتوابل مع اللحمة أو الخضرة. ممكن يكون الكاري إما ""جاف""‎ أو ""رطب"" حسب كمية السائل. بالمناطق الداخلية من شمال الهند وباكستان، غالباً بيستعملوا اللبن بالكاري؛ بجنوب الهند وبعض المناطق الساحلية التانية بشبه القارة الهندية، غالباً بيستعملوا حليب جوز الهند."
mt: "Kari is a dish that relies on herbs and spices with meat or vegetables. It can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, milk is often used in kari; in southern India and some coastal regions of the other subcontinent, coconut milk is often used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
