src: يقع South Pole Traverse أو الطريق السريع على مسافة 1600 كم من محطة McMurdo على بحر روس للقطب. هو تلج مضغوط مع شقوق مليانة ومعلمة بالأعلام. مش ممكن السفر فيها إلا بالقاطرات المتخصصة، وسحب الزلاجات بالبانزين والإمدادات. هيدي منا كتير سريعة، لهيك لازم أنو ياخد المسار انحراف طويل حول جبال ترانسانترتيك للوصول للهضبة.
mt: 1600 km long South Pole Traverse or road from McMurdo Station on Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is a compressed ice road with many cracks and marked with flags. It is not possible to travel there except with specialized snowmobiles, pulling sleds with gasoline, supplies. It is very fast, so it is necessary to take a long detour around Transantarctic Mountains to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: تعتبر الفوتة لجنوب إفريقيا بالسيارة طريقة رائعة لمشاهدة جمال المنطقة بالكامل وكمان للوصول للأماكن البعيدة عن الطرق السياحية العادية. ممكن تعمل هيدا الشي بسيارة عادية بتخطيط دقيق إلا إنه يُفضل استعمال سيارة دفع رباعي. وما فيك توصل لعدة مواقع إلا باستعمال قاعدة دواليب عالية الدفع 4x4. تذكرو إنتو وعم تخططو إنو بالرغم من استقرار جنوب أفريقيا ، إلا إنو كل البلدان المجاورة مش مستقرة. بتختلف تكاليف الفيزا ومتطلباتها من بلد لبلد وبتعتمد على البلد الجاي منه. كل دولة عندها كمان قوانين فريدة بتحدد شو عناصر الطوارئ يلّي من المفترض تكون بالسيارة.
mt: 4x4 is a great way to see the whole region and get to remote places off the beaten track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning, but a 4x4 is preferable. You can reach many places with a high ground clearance 4x4. Remember to plan ahead as, despite South Africa's stability, all neighbouring countries are unstable. Visa costs and requirements vary from country to country and depend on the country of origin. Each country also has its own unique laws that dictate what emergency equipment must be carried in the vehicle.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: الحمل لغير أشخاص - ما تخلّي شنطك بعيدة عن عينك، خاصة عند قطع الحدود الدولية. وممكن يتم استعمالك كناقل مخدارات بدون علمك وهيدا ممكن يوقعك بكتير مشاكل. وهيدا بيشمل النطرة بالدور، نظرا لإنه ممكن يستعملوا كلاب لشم المخدرات بأي وقت بدون إنذار. بعض البلدان عندها عقوبات قاسية كتير حتى بالنسبة لجرايم بتصير لأول مرة؛ ممكن تشمل هيدي الأحكام السجن لأكتر من 10 سنين أو الإعدام. تعتبر الشنط المتروكة دون رقابة هدف للسرقة وممكن تلفت انتباه السلطات اللي بتشعر بالقلق من تهديدات القنابل.
mt: 1. Don't leave your luggage out of your sight, especially when crossing international borders. You may be used as a drug mule without your knowledge, which may lead to serious problems. This may include random sniffs at the airport, as dogs can be used to sniff for drugs at any time without warning. Some countries have harsh penalties even for first-time offenses; these may include sentences of more than 10 years in prison or execution. Unattended luggage is a target for theft and may attract the attention of authorities who are concerned about bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: املأ بيتك بقهوة غنية الصبح وشوية شاي البابونج المريح بالليل. لما تكون برحلة، بكون عند وقت كافي لتدلل حالك وتحضر إشيا مميزة. إذا حابب تغامر أكتر، فاغتنم الفرصة لشرب أو مزج بعض العصاير: يمكن تكتشف مشروب بسيط فيك تحضّرو للترويقة لما ترجع لروتينك اليومي. إذا كنت عايش بمدينة فيها ثقافة شرب متنوعة، فروح على البارات أو الحانات بالأحياء يلّي ما بتزورها كتير.
mt: Fill your home with rich morning coffee and soothing evening chamomile tea. When you're on a trip, make sure you have enough time to indulge yourself and prepare special drinks. If you're feeling adventurous, take advantage of the opportunity to drink or mix some cocktails: you can find a simple cocktail in your repertoire to make for your guests when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a diverse drinking culture, visit bars or pubs in the neighborhoods you frequent.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: املأ بيتك بقهوة غنية الصبح وشوية شاي البابونج المريح بالليل. لما تكون برحلة، بكون عند وقت كافي لتدلل حالك وتحضر إشيا مميزة. إذا حابب تغامر أكتر، فاغتنم الفرصة لشرب أو مزج بعض العصاير: يمكن تكتشف مشروب بسيط فيك تحضّرو للترويقة لما ترجع لروتينك اليومي. إذا كنت عايش بمدينة فيها ثقافة شرب متنوعة، فروح على البارات أو الحانات بالأحياء يلّي ما بتزورها كتير.
mt: Fill your home with rich morning coffee and soothing evening chamomile tea. When you're on a trip, make sure you have enough time to indulge yourself and prepare special drinks. If you're feeling adventurous, take advantage of the opportunity to drink or mix some cocktails: you can find a simple cocktail in your repertoire to make for your guests when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a diverse drinking culture, visit bars or pubs in the neighborhoods you frequent.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: تطل قرية Haldarsvík على جزيرة Eysturoy القريبة وبتضم كنيسة فريدة من نوعها. بساحة الكنيسة، في تماثيل حمامات رخامية مهمة فوق بعض المقابر. تستحق نصف ساعة للتجول بالضيعة المثيرة للاهتمام.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík overlooks the nearby island of Eysturoy and contains a unique church. In the churchyard, important marble sculptures stand above some graves. It is worth spending half an hour strolling around the interesting village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: بالرغم من إنو ممكن ما تحتاج فيزا للزيارات القصير لبلدان محدة كسايح أو للشغل، إلا إنو السفر لهونيك كطالب دولي بيتطلب عمومًا إقامة أطول من إنك تسافر كسايح عادي. بشكل عام، بيتطلب البقاء بأي بلد أجنبي لفترة طويلة الحصول على تأشيرة مقدمًا. بتتطلب تأشيرات الطلاب عمومًا متطلبات وإجراءات تقديم مختلفة عن تأشيرات السياحة أو العمل العادية. بالنسبة لمعظم البلدان، رح تكون بحاجة لرسالة عرض من المؤسسة يلّي حابب تدرس فيها، وكمان دليل على رصيد مصرياتك لإعالة نفسك للسنة الأولى على الأقل من دراستك. استشير المؤسسة ، وكمان قسم الهجرة للبلد يلّي حابب تدرس فيه للحصول على المتطلبات المفصلة.
mt: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries such as the Schengen Area or for work, travelling as a foreign student usually requires a longer stay. In general, staying in any foreign country for a long time requires obtaining a visa in advance. Student visas usually have different requirements and application procedures than tourist or regular work visas. For most countries, you will need a letter of acceptance from the institution you wish to study at, and proof of your financial resources to support yourself for at least the first year of your studies. Consult the institution, and also the immigration department of the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: بالأخص بالصيف، رح تضطر تنتبه من البرغش إذا قررت تمشي بالغابات المطيرة. حتى إذا كنت سايق سيارتك بالغابات المطيرة شبه الاستوائية، ففتح الأبوال لثوان كرمال تطلع بالسيارة هي وقت كاف ليفوت البرغش على السيارة معك.
mt: Especially in the summer, you will have to be aware of the leeches if you decide to walk in the rainforests. Even if you drive your car in the rainforests, opening the doors for a few seconds to look inside the car is enough time for the leeches to attach themselves to the car with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: بالأخص بالصيف، رح تضطر تنتبه من البرغش إذا قررت تمشي بالغابات المطيرة. حتى إذا كنت سايق سيارتك بالغابات المطيرة شبه الاستوائية، ففتح الأبوال لثوان كرمال تطلع بالسيارة هي وقت كاف ليفوت البرغش على السيارة معك.
mt: Especially in the summer, you will have to be aware of the leeches if you decide to walk in the rainforests. Even if you drive your car in the rainforests, opening the doors for a few seconds to look inside the car is enough time for the leeches to attach themselves to the car with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: يعتبر سونداربانس أكبر زنّار ساحلي لأشجار القرم بالعالم، وبيمتد لمسافة 80 كيلومتر 50 ميل بالمناطق النائية من بنجلاديش والهند من الساحل. تم إعلان Sundarbans كموقع للتراث العالمي لليونسكو، ويسمى جزء الغابة جوات الأراضي الهندية منتزه سونداربانس الوطني. الغابات مش مجرد مستنقعات منغروف - هي بتشمل بعض المدرجات الأخيرة المتبقاية من الأدغال العظيمة يلّي غطت سهل الغانج. بغطي Sundarbans مساحة 3850 كيلومتر مربع، تلتها تقريباً مغطى بالمي / المسنتقعات. كانت سانباردانز من سنة 1966 محمية للحياة البرية، ويقدر إنو فيها هلق 400 نمر بنغالي ملكي وحوالي 30 ألف غزال مرقط بالمنطقة.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, extending over 80 kilometres (50 mi) into the remote areas of Bangladesh and India from the coast. Sundarbans was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and the Indian part of the forest is called Sundarbans National Park. The mangrove forests are not just mudflats - they also include some of the last remaining patches of the great tropical forests that once covered the Ganges Delta. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 square kilometres (1,480 sq mi), followed by approximately 2,100 square kilometres (810 sq mi) of mudflats. Sundarbans was declared a wildlife sanctuary in 1966, and it is estimated that there are 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: في بالعالم أمتر من 5000 لغة مختلفة، وبتشمل عشرين لغة مع 50 مليون أو أكتر من المتحدثين. الكلمات المكتوبة بتنفهم بطريقة أسهل من الكلمات المحكية. وهيدا بينطبق على أسامي المناطق والعنوانين اللي من الصعب نطقها بشكل صحيح. عدد كبير من الدول بيحكو إنكليزي بطلاقة، وبعدد أكبر من الدول، فيك تتوقع معرفة محدودة خاصة بين الشباب. تخيل، إذا صح التعبير، شخص من مانكون، وواحد من بوسطن، وواحد من جامايكا، وواحد من سيدني سايدر قاعدين حول طاولة عم يتعشوا بمطعم بتورنتو. بسلّوا بعضهم بقصص من بلدهم بخبروها بلهجاتهم وعاميتهم المتميزة.
mt: 5000 different languages are spoken in the world, with twenty languages having more than 50 million speakers. Written words are easier to understand than spoken words. This applies to place names and titles that are difficult to pronounce correctly. Many countries speak English fluently, and a larger number of countries, especially among the young, have limited knowledge of English. Imagine, if you will, someone from Manchester, someone from Boston, someone from Jamaica, and someone from Sydney sitting around a table eating in a restaurant in Toronto. They would be speaking to each other in their own dialects and accents.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: بتفل الباصات من محطة الباصات بين المناطق (عبر النهر) طول اليوم، على الرغم من أن معظمها، خاصة يلّي متجهة للشرق وجاكار/بومثانج بتفل بين الساعة 06:30 و 07:30. لأن الباصات بين المناطق عادةً بتكون مليانة، فمن الأفضل شراء تذكرة قبل أيام قليلة. معظم المناطق بتخدمها باصات كوستر يابانية زغيرة ومريحة ومتينة. تعتبر التاكسيات المشتركة وسيلة سريعة ومريحة للسفر عالمطارح القريبة، متل بارو (رقم 150) وبوناخا (رقم 200).
mt: Buses from the intercity bus terminal (across the river) run all day, although most of them, especially those heading east and Jakkrapet/Pomthong, run between 6:30 and 7:30. Because intercity buses are usually full, it is better to buy a ticket a few days in advance. Most intercity routes are served by small, comfortable, and reliable Japanese buses. Taxis are a fast and comfortable way to travel to nearby airports, such as Baro (number 150) and Bonnaka (number 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "مع عدم قدرة الوصول النسبي، صار ""تمبكتو"" يُستعمل كتعبير مجازي للأراضي الغريبة البعيدة. ليوم ، تمبكتو مدينة فقيرة، بالرغم من إنو سمعتها وامتلاكها لمطار بخلوها منطقة جذب سياحي. سنة 1990، تم إضافته لقائمة المواقع التراثية المعرضة للخطر بالعالم، بسبب رمل الصحرا. كانت وحدة من المحطات الرئيسية ببرنامج هنري لويس غايتس لعجايب العالم الأفريقي على قناة بي بي أس. عم تواجه المدينة تناقض صارخ مع بقية المدن بالبلاد، لأنها بتتميز بطابع عربي أكتر من كونها أفريقية."
mt: "With limited access, "Timbuktu" has become a metaphor for remote, foreign lands. Timbuktu is a poor city, despite its fame and ownership of an airport, and a tourist attraction. In 1990, it was added to the list of endangered World Heritage Sites, due to desert sand. It was one of the main stations in the Henry Louis Gates African World Heritage series on BBC. The city faces a stark contrast with the rest of the country, as it is more Arab than African."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: الألعاب الأولمبية لذوي الاحتياجات الخاصة رح تنعمل بالفترة ما بين 24 أب لــ 5 أيلول 2021. ورح تنعمل بعض الأحداث بمواقع تانية بكل أنحاء اليابان. حتكون طوكيو أول مدينة آسيوية بتستضيف دورتين من الألعاب الأولمبية الصيفية بعد ما استضافت الألعاب بسنة 1964. إذا حجزت رحلات الطيران والإقامة لسنة 2020 قبل الإعلان عن التأجيل، فممكن تواجه موقف صعب. بتختلف سياسات الإلغاء، بس اعتبارًا من أواخر أذار، ما بتمتد معظم سياسات الإلغاء لفيروس كورونا حتى تموز 2020، بس تم تحديد موعد الألعاب الأولمبية. من المتوقع أن تكلف معظم تذاكر المناسبات من بين 2500 و 130.000 ين، مع تكلفة التذاكر العادية 7000 ين تقريباً.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held at venues across Japan. Tokyo will be the first Asian city to host two Summer Olympic Games after hosting the 1964 Summer Olympics. If you have booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may be in a difficult situation. Most coronavirus cancellation policies will be extended until July 2020, but the date of the Games has been set. Most event tickets are expected to cost between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, with regular tickets costing around 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "الإعصار هو عمود دوار من هوا منخفض الضغط كتير بيمتص الهواء المحيط لجوا وللأعلى. بتولّد رياح قوية (غالبًا 100-200 ميل / ساعة) وممكن ترفع إشيا تقيلة بالهوا، وتحركها مع الإعصار. بتبلش كمسارات بتنزل من غيمة العواصف، وبتصير ""أعاصير"" لما توصل عالأرض."
mt: "A hurricane is a column of low-pressure air that sucks in the surrounding air. It produces strong winds (often 100-200 miles per hour) and can lift light objects, moving them with the hurricane. It can be seen as a "cloud" when it reaches the ground."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: إذا صارت الدولة يلّي رح تزورها خاضعة لحظر السفر، فممكن يتأثر التأمين الصحي للسفر أو تأمين إلغاء الرحلة. وممكن ترجع لنصايح حكومات بلدان غير حكومتك، إلا إنو نصايحهم بتكون مخصصة لمواطنيهم. مثلاً، ممكن يواجه المواطنين الأمريكيين بالشرق الأوسط مواقف مختلفة عن مواقف الأوروبيين أو العرب. الاستشارات هي مجرد ملخص صغير للوضع السياسي ببلد واحد. غالبًا ما بتكون الآراء المقدمة سريعة وعامة وبسيطة مقارنة بالمعلومات المفصلة والمتوفرة بغير مطارح.
mt: If your country is subject to a travel ban, your travel insurance or trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also receive advice from governments other than your own, but their advice may be tailored to their citizens. For example, Americans in the Middle East may face different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Advice is often quick, general, and simple compared to detailed information available to non-governmental organizations.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: كانت وكالات السفر موجودة من القرن التسعتعش. وبيكون وكيل السفر عادة خيار منيح إذا كانت الرحلة بتتجاوز خبرة المسافر السابقة بالطبيعة أو الثقافة أو اللغة أو البلدان اللي عندها دخل قليل. على الرغم من أن معظم الوكالات مستعدة لإجراء معظم الحجوزات المنتظمة، إلا أن عدة وكلا متخصصين بأنواع معينة من السفر أو نطاقات الميزانية أو الوجهات. ممكن يكون من الأفضل الاستعانة بوكيل بيحجز كتير رحلات متل رحلتك. ألق نظرة على الرحلات يلّي عم بروج لها الوكيل، إن كان على موقع ويب أو من شبابيك المحلات.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is often a good choice if your trip exceeds your previous experience in terms of nature, culture, language, or countries with low income. Although most agencies are ready to make most regular bookings, several agencies specialize in certain types of travel or budget ranges or destinations. It may be better to consult an agent who books a lot of trips like yours. Look at the trips that the agent is promoting, whether on a website or from the storefronts.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "في عدة أشيا يلّي لازم تاخدها بعين الاعتبار قبل ولمّا تسافر لأي مطرح. لما تسافر توقع إنو الإشيا ما رح تكون متل ما متعود ""ببلدك"". رح تختلف طريقة التعامل والقوانين والأكل والسير والسكن والمعايير واللغة عن البلد اللي بتعيش فيه. هيدا الشي لازم عطول يكون ببالك حتى تتجنب خيبة الأمل وممكن كمان تنفر من عادات البلد المحلية."
mt: "There are many things to consider before and when you travel to any country. When you travel, expect that things will not be like what you are used to in your country. The way of dealing, laws, food, transportation, accommodation, standards, and language will be different from the country you live in. This should be in your mind until you avoid disappointment and may also be afraid of the local customs."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: إذا عم تسافر بدولة نامية لأول مرة - أو بجزء جديد من العالم - فممكن تصاب بصدمة ثقافية كبيرة. استحوذت حداثة السفر للعالم النامي على العديد من المسافرين المستقرين والقادرين، وين ممكن إضافة العديد من التعديلات الثقافية الزغيرة بسرعة. بالأخص بأيامك الأولى، فكر بالإسراف على الاوتيلات والأكل والخدمات بالنمط والجودة الغربية للمساعدة بالتأقلم ما تنام على مرتبة أو مخدية على الأرض بالمناطق يلّي ما بتعرف فيها الحيوانات المحلية إذا رحتخيِّم بالهوا الطلق، جيب معك تخت تخييم أو مرجوحة شبكية لإبعادك عن الحيايا والعقارب وغيرها.
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country for the first time - or a new part of the world - you may be in for a big culture shock. The rise of travel to developing countries has attracted many settled and affluent travelers, and you can add many small cultural adjustments quickly. Especially on your first days, consider splurging on hotels, food, and services in the Western style to help you acclimate, from sleeping on a bed or floor in areas where you may encounter local wildlife if you're camping in the open, bring a tent or mosquito net to keep you away from the vermin and scorpions, etc.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "عمول نسخات من وثيقتك وتفاصيل الاتصال بشركة تأمينك واحملها معك. لازم يعطوا لشركة التأمين إيميالاتهم وأرقام تلفوناتهم الدولية حتى يحصلوا على نصيحة / تريصحات ويقدموا طلبات. احتفظ بنسخة تانية بشنطتك وعبر الإنترنت (ابعن لنفسك بريد إلكتروني مرفق فيه، أو خزّنه الـ ""cloud""). إذا كنت مسافر مع لابتوب أو تابليت، فاحتفظ بنسخة بذاكرته أو قرصه (يمكن الوصول له بدون الإنترنت). قدم كمان نسخ من السياسة / جهات الاتصال لرفاق السفر والأقارب أو الرفاق بالوطن المستعدين للمساعدة."
mt: "Carry copies of your documents and insurance details with you. Insurers need to know their policy numbers and international contact details so they can provide advice and make claims. Keep a second copy in your suitcase and online (save it to a cloud). If you're travelling with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy on its hard drive or disc (you can access it without the internet). Give copies of the policy/contacts to travelling companions and relatives or friends at home who are prepared to help."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: في كتير من تنسيقات الأفلام المختلفة يلّي بتم استعمالها على مر السنين. والفيلم القياسي 35 مم 36 × 24 مم هو الأكتر شيوعاً. ممكن عادةً تجديدها بسهولة كتير إذا خلصت، وبتعطي دقة تقريبًا متل الـ DSLR الحالية. بتستعمل بعض كاميرات الأفلام متوسطة الحجم تنسيق 6 بـ 6 سنتيمتر، وبصورة أدق 56 بـ 56 ملليمتر سلبي. هيدا بيعطي أربع مرات دقة عن دقة شريط الفيلم (نيجاتيف)بطول 35 مم (3136 مم 2 مقابل 864).
mt: 35 mm film is the standard film gauge used by the motion picture industry. It is 35 mm wide (1.378 in) and has a frame size of 24 mm × 36 mm (0.945 in × 1.417 in). It can be easily reused if properly processed, and gives a quality of image similar to that of current DSLRs. Some medium-format cameras use a 6 cm × 6 cm (2.362 in × 2.362 in) or, more precisely, 56 mm × 56 mm (2.205 in × 2.205 in) negative, which gives four times the resolution of 35 mm film (2,136 mm2 vs. 864 mm2).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: أهين طريقة للتبليش بمجال كتابة السفر هي صقل مهاراتك على موقع إلكتروني خاص بمدونة السفر. بعد ما تتعود على التنسيق والتحرير على الويب، فيك بعدين تنشئ موقع الويب تبعك.
mt: A good way to practice your writing skills is to hone your skills on a travel blog website. After you get used to formatting and editing on the web, you can then create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: أهين طريقة للتبليش بمجال كتابة السفر هي صقل مهاراتك على موقع إلكتروني خاص بمدونة السفر. بعد ما تتعود على التنسيق والتحرير على الويب، فيك بعدين تنشئ موقع الويب تبعك.
mt: A good way to practice your writing skills is to hone your skills on a travel blog website. After you get used to formatting and editing on the web, you can then create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: بالبيت، بسبب التعرض المستمر للجراثيم المحلية، فمن المحتمل كتير أن يكون عندك مناعة ضدها بالفعل. بس بغير أجزاء من العالم، وين تكون الكائنات البكتريولوجية هو شي جديد بالنسبة الك، فمن المرجح أن تواجه مشاكل. كمان، بالمناخات الأدفى، بتنمى البكتيريا بسرعة أكبر وبتعيش لفترة أطول برّا الجسم. ومن هون ظهر عذاب دلهي بيلي، ولعنة الفرعون ، وانتقام مونتيزوما ، وغيرهم من الأشخاص. متل ما هو الحال مع مشاكل الجهاز التنفسي بالمناخات الباردة، فالمشاكل المعوية بالمناخات الحارة شائعة لحد ما وبمعظم الحالات بتكون مزعجة بشكل واضح بس ما بتكون فعلاً خطيرة.
mt: At home, because of constant exposure to local germs, it is likely that you already have immunity to them. But in other parts of the world, where the microorganisms are new to you, you may face problems. Also, in colder climates, bacteria grow faster and live longer in the body. From this came the Delhi Belly, the Curse of the Pharaoh, Montezuma's Revenge, and other people. Like problems with the respiratory system in cold climates, gastrointestinal problems in hot climates are common until they are clearly annoying but not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: أوروبا قارة صغيرة نسبيًا بس فبها عدة دول مستقلة. بالظروف العادية، السفر عبر عدة بلدان ممكن يتطلب تقديم طلبات التأشيرة ومراقبة الجوازات عدة مرات. ومع هيم، فإن منطقة شنغن بتشتغل لحد ما متل دولة وحدة بهيدا المجال. طالما بقيت بهيدي المنطقة، فيك عمومًا تقطع الحدود بدون المرور عبر نقاط تفتيش مراقبة جوازات السفر مرة تانية. ونفس الشي، لما تحصل على فيزا شنغن، منك بحاجة تقدم للحصول على فيزا لكل دولة من الدول الأعضاء بشنغن بشكل منفصل، وهيك بتوفر الوقت مصاري ووراق رسمية.
mt: Europe is a small continent with several independent countries. Under normal circumstances, traveling through several countries may require submitting visa applications and passport checks several times. With Schengen, however, the area works somewhat like a single country within this zone. As long as you stay within this area, you can usually cross borders without going through passport checkpoints a second time. Likewise, if you obtain a Schengen visa, you will need to apply for a visa for each member state separately, saving you time and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: قبرة توت عنخ آمون (KV62). ممكن تكون مقبرة KV62 أشهر مقابر بالوادي وهو مكان اكتشاف هوارد كارتر سنة 1922 لمقبرة ملكية شبه سليمة للملك الشاب. بالمقارنة مع معظم المقابر الملكية التانية، فقبر توت عنخ آمون بالكاد بيستحق الزيارة، لكونه أصغر بكتير وفيه زخارف محدودة. أي شخص مهتم بشوفة دليل على الأضرار يلّي أصابت المومياء عند محاولة إزالتها من التابوت رح ينصاب بخيبة أمل لأن الراس والكتفين بس ظاهرين. بطلت الثروات الرائعة للمقبرة موجودة فيها، نُقلت للمتحف المصري بالقاهرة. من الأفضل للزوار اللي ما عندهم وقت إنو يزوروا مكان تاني.
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). This may be the most famous of the royal tombs, discovered by Howard Carter in 1922 in a near-intact state. In comparison to the other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is much smaller and has limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage done to the mummy when it was removed from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The magnificent treasures of the tomb are now in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors short on time may wish to visit another site.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: جزيرة بوين هي رحلة نهارية شهيرة أو رحلة عطلة نهاية الأسبوع تقدم التجديف بالكاياك والمشي لمسافات طويلة والمتاجر والمطاعم وغيرها. هيدا المجتمع الأصيل بيتواجد بـHowe Sound مقابل فانكوفر، وممكن توصله بسهولة بالتاكسي البحري اللي بتنطلق من جزيرة Granville بوسط مدينة فانكوفر. بالنسبة للأشخاص يلّي بيستمتعوا بالأنشطة بالهوا الطلق، فعمل برحلة عبر ممر Sea to Sky هي أمر ضروري. مدينة Whistler (ساعة ونصف بالسيارة من فانكوفر) غالية كتير بس مشهورة بسبب استضافة دورة الألعاب الأولمبية الشتوية سنة 2010. بالشتي، استمتع ببعض من أفضل التزلج بأمريكا الشمالية، وبالصيف جرب ركوب الدراجات الجبلية الأصيلة.
mt: The Sea to Sky Gondola is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, long-distance trekking, shopping, and dining. This community is located in Howe Sound near Vancouver, and can be easily reached by water taxi departing from Granville Island in the heart of Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trip through the Sea to Sky Gondola is a must. Whistler (an hour and a half drive from Vancouver) is expensive but famous for hosting the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the summer, try some of the best mountain biking in North America, and in the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: فيكتوريا فالز هي مدينة موجودة بالجزء الغربي من زيمبابوي، عبر الحدود من ليفينجستون، وزامبيا، وبالقرب من بوتسوانا. بتتواجد المدينة بالقرب من الشلالات مباشرة اللي يبعتبروا أهم منطقة سياحية، إلا إنو هيدي المدينة الشهيرة بتوفر لمحبي المغامرات والسياح عدة فرص ليبقوا فترة أطول. بموسم الشتي (من تشرين التاني لآذار)، رح يكون حجم المي أعلى ورح تكون الشلالات دراماتيكية أكتر. رح تتبلل بالتأكيد إذا قطعت الجسر أو مشيت على طول الممرات المتعرجة القريبة من الشلالات. من ناحية تانية، هيدا لإنو مستوى المي عالي كتير لدرجة إنو المي بتحجب رؤية الشلالات الفعلية!
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in the western part of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The city is near the falls themselves, which are the most important tourist area. However, the city is famous for providing adventure seekers and tourists with several opportunities to stay longer. In the summer (from November to March), the water level will be higher and the falls will be more dramatic. It will certainly be wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the winding paths near the falls. On the other hand, the water level is so high that the falls themselves are hidden!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: بتنطبق القواعد المتعلقة بالتصوير العادي كمان على تسجيل الفيديو، ويمكن أكتر من هيك. إذا كان مش مسموح أخد صورة لشي، فما لازم تفكر تسجل مقطع فيديو له. إذا كنت عم تستعمل طيارة بدون طيار، فتأكد مسبقًا شو مسموح لك تصوره وشو هي التصاريح أو التراخيص الإضافية المطلوبة. التحليق بطيارة بدون طيار بالقرب من مطار أو فوق حشد من الناس هو دايماً فكرة سيئة، حتى لو ما كان هالشي مخالف للقانون بمنطقتك.
mt: The same rules that apply to still photography also apply to video recording, and more. If it is not allowed to take a picture of something, you should not think about recording a video of it. If you are using a drone, make sure beforehand what you are allowed to photograph and what additional permits or licenses are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd of people is always a bad idea, even if this is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: التسجيل هو مطلب إضافي لعملية الفيزا ببعض البلاد، لازم تسجل حضورك وعنوانك عند السلطات المحلية. وممكن يتطلب إنك تعبي استمارة عند الشرطة المحلية أو تزور مكاتب الهجرة. بعدة بلدان يلّي موجود فيها متل هيدا القانون، بتتولى الاوتيلات المحلية عملية التسجيل (تأكد أن تسأل). بغير حالات، بس الأشخاص الساكنين برّات أماكن الإقامة السياحية هن بحاجة للتسجيل. ومع هيك، فهيدا بخلّي القانون غامض أكتر، منهيك اكتشف هالشي من قبل.
mt: The registration is an additional requirement for the visa process in some countries, you must register your presence and address with local authorities. In some countries, you must fill out a form with the local police or visit the immigration office. In some countries where this law exists, local hotels will process the registration (ask). Otherwise, people living in tourist accommodation are required to register. However, this is a confusing law, you may not have discovered this.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: التطوع خلال السفر من أفضل الإشيا اللي ممكن تغير بالعالم. إلا إنه التطوع ما بيعني إنو لازم أعطي بس. العيش والتطوع ببلد أجنبي طريقة رائعة لتتعرف على ثقافة مختلفة وتتعرف على ناس جداد وتتعرف على حالك وتشوف القصص من غير منظور وتكتسب مهارات جديدة. ممكن تكون كمان طريقة منيحة لتمديد الميزانية للسماح بإقامة أطول بمحل ما لأن عدة وظايف تطوعية بتوفر غرفة وأكل وعدد قليل منهم بيدفع راتب صغير.
mt: Volunteering during travel is one of the best things that can change the world. But volunteering doesn't mean you have to give up everything. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, get to know yourself, and see stories from a different perspective, and gain new skills. It can also be a cost-effective way to extend your stay in a place because many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a small salary for some.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: التطوع خلال السفر من أفضل الإشيا اللي ممكن تغير بالعالم. إلا إنه التطوع ما بيعني إنو لازم أعطي بس. العيش والتطوع ببلد أجنبي طريقة رائعة لتتعرف على ثقافة مختلفة وتتعرف على ناس جداد وتتعرف على حالك وتشوف القصص من غير منظور وتكتسب مهارات جديدة. ممكن تكون كمان طريقة منيحة لتمديد الميزانية للسماح بإقامة أطول بمحل ما لأن عدة وظايف تطوعية بتوفر غرفة وأكل وعدد قليل منهم بيدفع راتب صغير.
mt: Volunteering during travel is one of the best things that can change the world. But volunteering doesn't mean you have to give up everything. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, get to know yourself, and see stories from a different perspective, and gain new skills. It can also be a cost-effective way to extend your stay in a place because many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a small salary for some.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "بيمثل السفر لعالم والت ديزني رحلة حج رئيسية لكتير من العيل الأمريكية. بتتضمن الزيارة ""النموذجية"" السفر لمطار أورلاندو الدولي، والانتقال لأوتيل ديزني الموجود بالموقع، وتقضية حوالي أسبوع بدون مغادرة ديزني، والرجعة عالبلد. في اختلافات ممكنة ما الها حدود، بس بضل هيدا يلّي بيقصدوا معظم الناس بس يتحدثوا عن ""الرايح لعالم ديزني"". العديد من التذاكر المنباعة على الإنترنت من خلال مواقع المزادات متل إيباي أو كرايغليست هي تذاكر بارك هوبر متعددة الأيام المستعملة جزئياً. مع إنو هيدا النشاط منتشر كتير إلا أنو ديزني بتمنعه: التذاكر ما بتتحول من شخص لتاني."
mt: "Disney World is a major pilgrimage for many Americans. The typical trip includes a visit to Orlando International Airport, a stay at a Disney hotel on site, spending about a week without leaving Disney, and returning home. In variations possible what the limits, but this is what most people mean by "going to Disney World." Many tickets sold online through auction sites such as eBay or Craigslist are used multi-day park hopper tickets. While this activity is widespread, Disney prohibits it: tickets do not transfer from person to person."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: "لازم أي شخص بخطط لزيارة بلد ممكن اعتباره منطقة حرب أن يتلقى تدريب احترافي. من المحتمل أن البحث على الإنترنت عن ""دورة بيئة معادية"" يزودك بعنوان شركة محلية. رح تغطي الدورة عادةً كل القضايا يلّي تمت مناقشتها هون بتفصيل أكبر بكتير، وعادةً بكون هيدا من خلال الخبرة العملية. عادةً بتكون الدورة من 2-5 أيام ورح تتضمن لعب الأدوار والكتير من الإسعافات الأولية وأحيانًا التدريب على الأسلحة. الكتب والمجلات يلّي تحكي عن بقاء الحياة البرية هي شائعة، بس المنشورات يلّي بتحكي عن مناطق الحرب قليلة."
mt: "Anyone with plans to visit a country that could be considered a war zone should receive professional training. It is likely that searching the Internet for "hostile environment training" will provide you with the address of a local company. The course will usually cover all the issues discussed here in greater detail, and usually through practical experience. The course is usually 2-5 days long and will include role play and a lot of first aid, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines about survival in the wild are common, but publications about war zones are rare."
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: في طرق مختلفة لتنقية المي، وبعضها بكون أكتر فعالية ضد تهديدات معينة. ببعض المناطق بيكفي غلي المي لمدة دقيقة، وبمناطق تانية بيحتاج لعدة دقايق. بتختلف الفلاتر بفعاليتها، وإذا كنت قلقان، فلازم تفكِّر بشراية المي بقنينة مسكرة منيح من شركة سمعتها منيحة.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, and some are more effective against certain threats. In some areas, boiling water for a minute is enough, while in others it may take several minutes. Filters vary in effectiveness, and if you're concerned, you should consider buying bottled water from a reputable company with a good reputation.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: تيارات الصدع هي التدفق الراجع من الموج اللي بتقطع الشط، غالبًا حد الشعاب المرجانية أو شي بيشبها. بسبب الطوبولوجيا تحت المي، بيتركز التدفق الراجع ببعض من الأقسام الأعمق، وممكن يتشكل تيار سريع للمي العميقة هنيك. معظم الوفيات بتصير نتيجة الإرهاق بمحاولة السباحة عكس التيار، وهيدا الشي ممكن يكون مستحيل. بمجرد ما تطلع من التيار، فبتصير السباحة للخلف مس أصعب من العادة. حاول تتجه على مكان ما علقت فيه، وبحسب مهاراتك وإذا في حدا انتبهلك أو لأ، ممكن تنطر لينقذوك.
mt: Currents are the return flow of the wave that breaks on the shore, often over a coral reef or something similar. Because of the topography under the sea, the return flow tends to concentrate in some of the deeper sections, and a deep-sea current may form here. Most deaths occur due to exhaustion while trying to swim against the current, which may be impossible. Once you emerge from the current, swimming back may be harder than usual. Try to head for a place where you can hang on, and depending on your skills and if someone notices you or not, you may be able to be rescued.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: ممكن تكون الممرات المائية الداخلية موضوع منيح للتفكير فيها بالعطل. مثلاً زيارة القلاع بوادي لوار أو وادي الراين أو عمل رحلة بحرية لمدن مثيرة للاهتمام على نهر الدانوب أو ركوب الزوارق على طول قناة إيري. كمان بتحدد مسارات الهايكنج وركوب البسيكلات الشهيرة.
mt: The internal waterways may be a good subject for thinking about. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley or the Rhine Valley, or making a boat trip to interesting cities on the Danube, or canoeing along the Erie Canal. You also determine the routes of hiking and famous bicycles.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: بيحد المنطقة من الشمال منطقة الساحل، ومن الجنوب والغرب المحيط الأطلسي. السيدات: من الأفضل تقول أي مسافرة إنها متزوجة، بغض النظر عن حالتها الاجتماعية الفعلية. من المفيد كمان لبس خاتم (بس مش خاتم مبيّن غالي كتير. لازم تعرف السيدات إنو الاختلافات الثقافية ممكن تسببلهم مضايقات متل معاكستها أو الإمساك بإيدها وغير إشيا. كوني صارمة برفض الرجال، وما تخافي من التمسك برأيك (الاختلافات الثقافية أم لا، مش ما عليه!).
mt: The area is bordered to the north by the coast, to the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Ladies: It is advisable to tell any traveler that she is married, regardless of her actual social status. It is also helpful to wear a ring (but not an expensive one. Women should know that cultural differences can cause problems such as harassment or grabbing her hand, etc. Be firm in rejecting men, and do not be afraid to stick to your opinion (whether cultural differences or not, it does not matter!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: تعتبر الحياة البرية تحدي صعب بالنسبة للمصور الفوتوغرافي، وبتحتاج لحظ حلو وصبر وخبرة ومعدات منيحة. غالبًا ما بتم اعتبار تصوير الحياة البرية أمر محسوم ،إلا إنو متل أي تصوير فوتوغرافي بشكل عام ، الصورة بتساوي ألف كلمة. بيتطلب تصوير الحياة البرية عدسة طويلة مقرّبة، إلا إنو إشيا متل سرب الطيور أو المخلوقات الصغيرة بتحتاج لنوع تاني من العدسات. صعب تلاقي عدد كبير من الحيوانات الغريبة، وأوقات بيكون للمتنزهات قواعد بخصوص التصوير لأغراض تجارية. ممكن تكون الحيوانات البرية إما مسالمة أو عدوانية. وممكن تكون البيئة باردة أو ساخنة أو ببعض الأوقات عدائية.
mt: Wildlife photography is a difficult challenge for the photographer, requiring patience, skill, and expensive equipment. Like any photography, the photograph is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography requires a long telephoto lens, but birds and small creatures require a different type of lens. It is difficult to find large numbers of exotic animals, and park rules may prohibit commercial photography. Wildlife can be either peaceful or aggressive. The environment can be cold or hot or sometimes hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: لازم كل شخص عم يسوق سيارته على خطوط العرض العالية أو فوق الممرات الجبلية أن يفكر بإمكانية نزول الثلج أو الجليد أو درجات الحرارة العالية. على الطرق الجليدية والتلجية، بيكون الاحتكاك واطي وما فيك تسوق متل لما بتكون على الزفت. بالعواصف التلجية، ممكن ينزل كمية كافية من التلج تخليك تعلق بوقت كتير قصير. ممكن تنحجب الشوفة بسبب التلج أو بسبب الضباب أو الجليد على شبابيك السيارة. من ناحية تانية، تعتبر الظروف الجليدية والتلجية طبيعية ببلدان كتيرة، وبتكفي حركة المرور بدون ما تنقطع طول السنة.
mt: Everyone who drives on high-altitude roads or through mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow or ice or high temperatures. On icy and snowy roads, friction is low and driving is like being on ice. In snowstorms, enough snow can fall to leave you stuck for a long time. The view can be obscured by snow or by fog or ice on the car windows. On the other hand, snowy and icy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic can continue without interruption throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: الشغل برا البلد بيعني عمومًا إنه لازم تدقع ضريبة لدخل بالبلد الساكن فيه، إلا إذا كنت دبلوماسي. بتم تنظيم ضريبة الدخل بشكل مختلف بالبلدان المختلفة، وبتختلف معدلات الضرايب وفئاتها بشكل كبير من بلد للتاني. ببعض البلدان الفيدرالية، متل الولايات المتحدة وكندا، بتم فرض ضريبة الدخل على المستوى الفيدرالي والمستوى المحلي، لهيك ممكن تختلف المعدلات والأقواس من منطقة للتانية.
mt: In most countries, a person is generally required to pay income tax in the country in which they reside, unless they are a diplomat. Income tax is organized differently in different countries, and tax rates and brackets can vary greatly from country to country. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at the federal and local levels, so rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: الشغل برا البلد بيعني عمومًا إنه لازم تدقع ضريبة لدخل بالبلد الساكن فيه، إلا إذا كنت دبلوماسي. بتم تنظيم ضريبة الدخل بشكل مختلف بالبلدان المختلفة، وبتختلف معدلات الضرايب وفئاتها بشكل كبير من بلد للتاني. ببعض البلدان الفيدرالية، متل الولايات المتحدة وكندا، بتم فرض ضريبة الدخل على المستوى الفيدرالي والمستوى المحلي، لهيك ممكن تختلف المعدلات والأقواس من منطقة للتانية.
mt: In most countries, a person is generally required to pay income tax in the country in which they reside, unless they are a diplomat. Income tax is organized differently in different countries, and tax rates and brackets can vary greatly from country to country. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at the federal and local levels, so rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: المعرض العالمي (أو ببساطة المعرض) هو مهرجان دولي كبير للفنون والعلوم. بتقدم الدول المشاركة عروض فنية وتعليمية بالأجنحة الوطنية لعرض قضايا العالم أو ثقافة وتاريخ بلادن. المعارض البستانية الدولية هي أنشطة متخصصة بعرض الزهور والحدايق النباتية وأي شي تاني بيتعلق بالنباتات. على الرغم من أنها ممكن تصير سنويًا من الناحية النظرية (طالما أنها موجودة ببلدان مختلفة)، إلا أنها مش هيك من الناحية العملية بتضل هيدي الأحداث عادة بين تلاتة وستة أشهر، وبتصير بمواقع ما بتقل مساحتها عن 50 هكتار.
mt: The World's Fair (or simply the Fair) is a large international exhibition designed as an expository event. Exhibits at such events typically include a wide range of items, from newly invented products to works of art. The various national pavilions showcase each country's culture, history, and achievements. The international horticultural exhibitions are specialized events showcasing flowers, gardens, and other plant life. Although they may be held annually in theory (as long as they are held in different countries), in practice they are usually held between three and six months, and occupy sites of less than 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: بالرغم من إنو كتير من الحيوانات بالحديقة متعودة تشوف أشخاص، إلا أنو الحياة البرية بتبقى برية ومش لازم نطعميهم أو نزعجهم. بحسب السؤولين عن الحديقة، خليك على بعد 100 ياردة / متر على الأقل من الدببة والذئاب و25 ياردة / متر من كل الحيوانات البرية التانية! قد ما كانت سلسة، حيوانات البيسون والظبي الموظ والدببة وكل الحيوانات الكبيرة تقريباً يمكن تهاجمكن. بينصاب العشرات من الزوار كل سنة لأنهم ما حافظوا على مسافة مناسبة. هيدي الحيوانات كبيرة وبرية ومن المحتمل أن تكون خطرة، لهيك تروك مساحة بينك وبينهم. بالإضافة لهيك، لازم تعرف أن الروايح بتجذب الدببة والحيوانات البرية التانية، لهيك تجنب حمل أو طبخ الأكل يلّي عندو ريحة وحافظ على نضافة المخيم.
mt: Although many animals in the park are used to seeing people, wildlife remains wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park officials, keep at least 100 yards (meters) away from bears and wolves and 25 yards (meters) away from all other wildlife! It may seem harmless, but bison, moose, bears, and most large animals can attack. Hundreds of visitors are injured each year because they did not keep a safe distance. Wildlife is large and wild and potentially dangerous, so give them space. In addition, you should know that scents attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking food that has a strong smell and keep your campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
